This will require an understanding of tagging process and Jira', 'Increase transaction rates', 'Location: Greenwood Village, CO (Currently Remote)', 'Title:\xa0Data Product Analyst', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Dedication to keep an open line of communication and provide full transparency.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Our Fortune 75 MSO Client is in need of a Data Product Analyst to join a full stack self-support and Billing/Change Service team across their mobile platform.\xa0This includes working with full stack teams to manage business processes, systems, tools, analysis, and reporting that optimize business functions to meet organizational goals and initiatives. ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with the Team: Many projects will require collaboration with colleagues (other analyst, developers, managers and etc.) to properly identify and implement data processes that require being a strong team-player.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Data setups and ingestion for client dashboards.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Need to have analytical skills, communication skills, problem-solving skills, mathematical and statistical knowledge, and familiarity with CRM applications.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tableau or other data visualization software experience preferred.', 'As a Data Operations Analyst, you must work with the client, account services, operations and technology teams. Your goal within the team is to make sure the agency’s data work flows smoothly across campaigns. This is a professional who will have constant interaction, communication, and follow-up with internal and external clients in relationship to data protocols, issues, requests and all other pertinent campaign information related to data, data operations and data quality.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Build and assist with data validation processes for internal and Client teams.', '\ufeffQualifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Establish ideal data ingestion and management processes for Client business.', 'Profile:', 'Reports To:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Product Development and Data Operations Manager', 'Role Accountabilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Identify problems: As an Operations Analyst, identifying operational issues and potential concerns are major responsibilities. Need to discuss these concerns with stakeholders and clients. Main role is to improve the overall data process, data management, and data optimization efficiency of the agency, so you need to be very observant to determine where the data gaps and potential issues lie.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Research issues: In identifying data and data operations, you will identify the source of data issues assigned to you and resolve the issues through various modeling strategies and agency software tools for data analysis. Work with Technology departments to create tools to store data effectively and efficiently within the organization for analytical processing and platforms for immediate and long-term initiatives.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Documentation:\xa0Will need to create, update, or advise on documentation that will require updating for new or revised processes proposed.', 'Data Operations Analyst ', 'Reports To:', 'Profile:\xa0Assists in the set up and implementation of all data and data operations related to client campaigns, consumer data and third-party segmentation data. A Data Operations Analyst is a professional who solves problems internally and implements goal-oriented strategies and involves managing data, client reporting, and trade processes. A Data Operations Analyst’s job is to use mathematical and statistical methods to evaluate problems, calculate risks, and predict outcomes.\xa0', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Suggest solutions: Will make presentations and reports which suggest solutions to researched data problems and concerns. Including detailed documentation explaining the entire solution with implementation pros and cons. Need to be able to have effective communication with a variety of departments fluently for research and proposed solutions.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Two-year relevant work experience, Bachelor’s degree preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent Excel and Reporting skills, SQL experience desired. (Skill assessment required)', 'Responsibilities:']

['', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Statistics, Economics, Mathematics or any related fieldThe ability to conduct market researchExcellent writing skills/verbal communication skills\xa0to prepare detailed reportsAbility to synthesize complex data into actionable goals within a set timeframeCoding skills in languages such as SQL, Python and/or RAnalytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to QA and troubleshoot dataExperience with statistical software (e.g., Stata, SPSS)Knowledge of data gathering, cleaning, and transforming techniquesReporting and data visualization skills using software like Looker or TableauUnderstanding of data warehousing and ETL techniqueTechnical writing skills', 'Collaborate with team members to collect and analyze data', 'Technical writing skills', 'Build a source of truth for Marketplace data across numerous inputs incl. consumer, restaurant, operations, and talent', 'The ideal candidate has experience in data analytics, preferably at an e-commerce, marketplace company.\xa0This candidate is someone that has experience working at a mobile-first company with a digital and physical product mix. ['', 'Why work for us?', 'Who Is Helm?', 'Who are we looking for?', 'Helm is seeking a Data Analytics professional to play a key role in creating and advancing the Helm analytics landscape in a fast-paced, agile environment. This individual will be responsible for delivering key business insights through their research in multiple Business Intelligence platforms. One must be excited and encouraged to work with multiple levels of stakeholders to make data actionable and ensure data integrity. We are a rapidly growing organization, and this opportunity will play an important part in our continued evolution.', 'Helm is not a company of individuals. Helm is a team, composed of talented people dedicated to helping brand loyalty strengthen between our clients and their customers. No matter what responsibilities an individual has, each one is supported by and relies upon the strengths of everyone on the team. Through our collective dedication, diligence, professionalism, integrity, grit, and imagination, we help the worlds most recognized brands fit into the everyday lives of their employees, consumers, and franchisees - to build and strengthen affinity. Each member of the Helm team understands and is committed to our philosophy and is empowered to continually discover new and innovative ways to achieve our mission and vision.', 'PM20', 'We offer a culture centered around accountability, integrity, and results; paired with great benefits and competitive salary. Benefits include Health, Dental, and Vision coverage, 401 (k) with company match, PTO, flexible hours and more.']

['', 'Must have requirements: 3-5 Years Tableau and Pharmacy Claims experience: The Tableau analyst will serve as a technical resource to develop and enhance reports and dashboards. He/She will access and integrate data from the various Healthcare systems (QNXT, Medlnsight, (pharmacy ,etc.), create actionable management reports that can be used to analyze costs and quality, analyze results and identify opportunities to manage costs and improve quality. He/She will prepare data for use in Tableau, develop extracts, publish data sources/workbooks, develop custom scripts, coordinate releases of data and workbooks as well as perform complex analytics. Report observations to manager, pointing out areas of concern inaccuracy, cost trends, and efficiency.', ' Required Education: BA or BS in Biostatistics, Public Health, Statistics, Mathematics, or Health Care or related field required. Required Experience: 2-4 years of relevant work experience in data analytics and visualization. Experience with MS Office applications required, especially strong Excel skill. Skill with SQL or SAS. Alternate programming experience may substitute. Experience with data management and analysis preferred. Must have strong quantitative and analytical skills. Some experience in health care industry or pharmacy claims desired.', '*** MUST BE ABLE TO WORK ON W2, NOT C2C ***', ' ', ' Essential Functions: • Extract and upload information including large data sets from various systems to support team needs. • This resource is utilized for ad hoc requests for pharmacy, medical expenses, and enrollment data by other members of the team. • Assist in preparation of reports produced regularly to support executive decision-making. • Research and analyze report results identifying opportunities and trends. • Develop efficient reporting methods. • Support team members when additional analytics are required for pharmacy costs. Knowledge/Skills/Abilities: • Ability to be a self-starter, motivated, energetic worker knowledge of Tableau or other BI software. • Knowledge of healthcare and prescription drug claims data • Proficiency with Microsoft Office, Including Excel, Word and PowerPoint • Ability to use data cubes to extract data and reports from  data warehouse. Intermediate level of programming is desired. • Good verbal and written communication skills • Good interpersonal and problem solving skills. • Ability to abide by policies • Maintain regular attendance based on agreed-upon schedule • Maintain confidentiality and comply with Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) • Ability to establish and maintain positive and effective work relationships with coworkers, clients, members, providers and customers']

['', 'Detail-oriented with superior organizational skills; able to define stakeholder requests into projects and navigate between multiple projects, meet deadlines, and process ad hoc report requests from Product Managers, Leadership, and Engineering as needed.', '2+ years writing SQL.', "What You'll Do:", 'You want to work alongside people who are passionate, friendly, and helpful.', 'About Moz', 'Assist Product Managers and Marketers as they assess product performance.', 'Generous paid parental, medical and family leave policies to support you during major life events.', 'Monitor product, financial, and user metrics for trends, changes, and unexpected behavior.', 'Create repeatable analytic deliverables which tell a compelling story around our customers interactions with our products.', 'Communicate findings to Product Managers and Executives to inform product & product marketing strategy.', 'Design, structure, and monitor A/B testing within our SaaS products.', 'Generous paid time off and flexible work from home policies. ', 'Personal career development including 10 face to face career coaching sessions a year.', 'Creating and maintaining a roadmap for analytic improvements.', 'N', 'You want to play a big part in a small but profitable company who are industry leaders. ', "You're looking for a big challenge that involves lots of variety, collaboration, inventiveness, and on your toes thinking.", " You want to play a big part in a small but profitable company who are industry leaders.  You do your best in a setting where excellent work is what's valued—not face time (a good work-life balance is just how we do things!)  You value authenticity and a work environment that values who you are and what you can do. You're looking for a big challenge that involves lots of variety, collaboration, inventiveness, and on your toes thinking. You want to work alongside people who are passionate, friendly, and helpful. ", 'Enhance the existing product metrics suite at Moz with additional insightful findings.', ' A strong commitment to work-life balance. We provide a US$3,000 per calendar year vacation expense reimbursement for all employees as well as monthly home internet access and cell phone stipends.  Employer match contributions on retirement plans. Generous paid time off and flexible work from home policies.  Personal career development including 10 face to face career coaching sessions a year. 100% match on charitable contributions up to $5,000/year. Generous paid parental, medical and family leave policies to support you during major life events.', 'Work as a member in the larger BI/Data Science team to ensure consistency across all areas of reporting.', 'You value authenticity and a work environment that values who you are and what you can do.', 'Suggest new business and product opportunities based on data insights.', ' Detail-oriented with superior organizational skills; able to define stakeholder requests into projects and navigate between multiple projects, meet deadlines, and process ad hoc report requests from Product Managers, Leadership, and Engineering as needed. Several years of experience doing product and business analytics for large scale datasets. This is not an entry level role, we need someone who has paid industry experience.  Experience with Self-Service SaaS product funnel analysis, descriptive statistics, and A/B testing approaches. 2+ years writing SQL. Expertise in creating reports & write-ups of your findings, and the presentation skills to share them in a coherent format with multiple stakeholders. ', 'Several years of experience doing product and business analytics for large scale datasets. This is not an entry level role, we need someone who has paid industry experience. ['', 'This platform, comprised of our PowerClerk®, WattPlan®, and SolarAnywhere®, enables utilities and the energy industry to inform, streamline and value energy-related decisions and processes. Across our products, a variety of best-in-class, highly unique datasets are growing every day, from a nationwide database of 1 km resolution solar irradiance data derived from satellite image feeds, to a continuous data feed of customer interest in clean energy technologies. ', 'The Data Analyst will also provide internal technical support for marketing, sales and business development functions and may represent the company at technical conferences through publications and presentations. ', 'Identify new potential data sources to enhance model performance ', 'DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES', '**This is an In-House role in our Kirkland, WA office. ', 'Strong working knowledge of statistics fundamentals and aptitude for working with large data sets to perform statistical analysis ', 'Familiarity with advanced techniques in data science, including statistical analysis, data visualization, and some machine learning techniques ', 'We’re a growing company that counts 10 of the top 10 Fortune 500 utilities and many of the largest renewable energy companies in the U.S. as our customers. ', '2+ years of experience in a professional environment having an analytical role involving data analysis techniques ', 'Go from building solutions to being part of the\u202fsolution ', 'Analyze and validate product capability and data accuracy, both for customer engagement and marketing business needs ', 'Superior organizational skills, ability to multitask across several concurrent projects ', 'Identify and evangelize opportunities to leverage data science approaches and key metrics to validate model changes and continuously monitor model performance ', 'Exceptional analytical and problem-solving capabilities, including the ability to logically and efficiently structure ambiguous problems, identify sources of data, conduct complicated analyses, identify key insights and recommend model improvements ', 'Analyze and validate product capability and data accuracy, both for customer engagement and marketing business needs Process, transform, and experiment with high volumes of data to optimize model accuracy Identify new potential data sources to enhance model performance Apply a procedural framework to assess the performance of a variety of models and quickly identify the most suitable approaches Identify and evangelize opportunities to leverage data science approaches and key metrics to validate model changes and continuously monitor model performance Work closely with consultants and researchers to support projects where data science and data analysis expertise is needed Communicate with Clean Power Research customers on the details of our model outputs and approaches ', ' HOW TO APPLY', 'The Data Analyst will help assess and automate the analysis of the quality of different data sets such as energy consumption data from utilities, DER adoption related data sets, and evaluate and troubleshoot the accuracy of models developed based on this data. ', 'the', 'The Data Analyst will work closely with data scientists, software engineers and product managers to design, develop and test data science, machine learning, and statistical methods across our multifaceted, enterprise SaaS platform. ', 'Join a growing company that expects you to grow with us and invests in your growth ', 'Communicate with Clean Power Research customers on the details of our model outputs and approaches ', 'WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING AS A DATA ANALYST ', 'Work in a start-up like environment coupled with the stability and customer base of an established, profitable company ', 'Clean Power Research is leveraging these datasets to solve new customer problems. ', 'Process, transform, and experiment with high volumes of data to optimize model accuracy ', 'At Clean Power Research, every employee has a seat at the table and an important role. ', 'The person in this role will perform the technical analysis of irradiance and weather data, among other data sets, and validate new data models for historical and forecast weather data applications. ', 'BA/BS or MS degree in engineering, mathematics, statistics, computer science or related field ', 'WHY WORK HERE?', 'Use your creativity to solve hard problems and make tough decisions ', ' ', 'WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING AS A DATA ANALYST', 'Clean Power Research offers competitive compensation and benefits to full-time employees including medical/dental/vision, paid vacation, paid holidays, a bonus plan and 401(k) plan with matching. job_title: Data Analyst, Trust & Safety, Google Play
job_text: ['', 'Bachelor degree in a quantitative discipline or equivalent practical experience. ', '7 years of professional experience in an analytical role.', 'Ability to work and influence cross-functionally with multiple teams. Effective organizational skills and attention to detail. ', 'Experience in SQL, and experience in Python or R. ', 'Manage data engineering and analysis, including but not limited to data collection, data ETL, data processing, analysis, and BI dashboard building. Influence evolution of analytics/BI infrastructure and push for upstream data hygiene.', 'Present and communicate data-based insights and recommendations to influence Google Play leadership and cross-functional teams on day-to-day decision makings and strategic directions. ', 'Familiarity with Google products, tools, and data infrastructure. ', 'Take initiative to define what metrics to look at, what data to collect, what analysis to perform for various projects on abuse detection improvement, harm measurement, and operational efficiency optimizations. ', 'About The Job', 'Work with engineering, product, and operations teams to perform analysis to improve Google Play Trust and Safety core metrics. Improve abuse detection, and support new engineering, and operations product launches. ', ' Take initiative to define what metrics to look at, what data to collect, what analysis to perform for various projects on abuse detection improvement, harm measurement, and operational efficiency optimizations.  Work with engineering, product, and operations teams to perform analysis to improve Google Play Trust and Safety core metrics. Improve abuse detection, and support new engineering, and operations product launches.  Present and communicate data-based insights and recommendations to influence Google Play leadership and cross-functional teams on day-to-day decision makings and strategic directions.  Manage data engineering and analysis, including but not limited to data collection, data ETL, data processing, analysis, and BI dashboard building. Influence evolution of analytics/BI infrastructure and push for upstream data hygiene. ', '3 years of experience in an analytical role with experience in one of the following areas: statistical analysis, experimentation design and analysis, or machine learning. ', 'Experience extracting and manipulating, and building data ETL processes.', ' Bachelor degree in a quantitative discipline or equivalent practical experience.  3 years of experience in an analytical role with experience in one of the following areas: statistical analysis, experimentation design and analysis, or machine learning.  Experience in SQL, and experience in Python or R.  Experience extracting and manipulating, and building data ETL processes. ', 'Responsibilities', ' 7 years of professional experience in an analytical role. Familiarity with Google products, tools, and data infrastructure.  Ability to work and influence cross-functionally with multiple teams. Effective organizational skills and attention to detail.  ']

['', 'Project Management ', 'Pandas', 'You will have the opportunity to work closely with stakeholders across clinical, legal, engineering, and analytics teams to refine project scope and requirements, manage project communications, implement criteria to extract and analyze data, and summarize findings. The ideal candidate is highly skilled in executing ad-hoc analyses in both structured and unstructured environments and clearly communicating analysis results.', 'THE OPPORTUNITY FOR YOU ', 'Data Analytics', 'Project Management background', 'About This Featured Opportunity', 'The Data Analyst will be responsible for implementing business processes that transform health researcher data requests into data extracts that can be leveraged for analysis.', 'KEY SUCCESS FACTORS', 'Experience using Python to manage and transform data, specifically with Pandas and/or NumPy', '3-5 years of Data Analytics experience with SQL', 'Experience with reviewing and implementing business processes, tracking project milestones, managing and maintaining correspondence with stakeholders, and managing project scope', '3-5 years of Data Analytics experience with SQLDemonstrated track record and experience performing data extraction, data mining, and data analysis using complex data setsExperience using Python to manage and transform data, specifically with Pandas and/or NumPyProject Management backgroundExperience with reviewing and implementing business processes, tracking project milestones, managing and maintaining correspondence with stakeholders, and managing project scope', 'SQL', 'Python', 'Demonstrated track record and experience performing data extraction, data mining, and data analysis using complex data sets', 'NumPy']

Additionally, we rely on analysts’ judgment to confirm the accuracy and utility of data by cross-referencing information across a variety of independent sources.\xa0', 'Visualization - Tableau (or similar) proficiency is desirable.\xa0At the very least, candidates must demonstrate an aptitude and desire to learn.', 'Intellectual Curiosity - Enjoy tackling challenging problems and developing and honing the necessary skills to do so.Attention to Detail - Demonstrate a problem-solving approach which entails detecting subtle changes which are exhaustively explored until the root cause is determined and nuances are understood.Programming - SQL and Python proficiency are desirable. ['', 'Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills\xa0', 'Minimum of five years’\xa0experience\xa0developing\xa0complex business requirements\xa0documents for a\xa0large, cross functional organization\xa0Ability to ascertain\xa0and\xa0clearly document\xa0the\xa0business requirement details\xa0Strong consensus building and change management skills\xa0Lean Six Sigma certification\xa0or\xa0extensive\xa0process\xa0improvement experiences\xa0Previous experience\xa0with Sales and other CRM\xa0business\xa0requirement development is\xa0highly desirable\xa0', 'Excellent written and verbal communications skills\xa0', 'The Business Analyst (BA) will proactively drive the development and management of detailed business requirements and KPIs for complex, high priority, CRM projects. The BA must be an expert on identifying and eliminating manual efforts in our business processes and requirements. To ensure the systems successfully achieves the project benefits, the individual selected for this position will develop and actively manage the execution of the business user acceptance testing scripts. The incumbent should possess thorough, demonstrable knowledge of and practical experience with the use of iterative and incremental software delivery methodologies with specific experience managing and executing the Requirements Management discipline’s constituent activities, resulting in clear, concise and unambiguous requirement artifacts. The individual selected for this position must have hands-on experience managing the capture and elaboration of well-formed features lists, use case models and supplementary specifications. The ability to effectively facilitate requirements elicitation sessions is critical. ['We are not your run of the mill forest products company, join us and find out why.', '\xa0', 'With your great communication skills, you’ll be able to analyze raw data and lay it out in a way that paints a clear and concise story for the stakeholders. Analytics is your thing and that ability is what helps you see the forest for the trees (industry pun!) and recognize patterns and relationships within the data in front of you.', 'Since you’re a self-starter who enjoys charting their own course, why don’t you come and build your career with Canfor! Canfor is a global forest products company, with operations in the US, Canada, and Europe. Learn more about Canfor on our website www.canfor.com.', 'Canfor’s strength comes from the diversity of our skilled and resilient workforce. As our company continues to grow and diversify, so do our career opportunities. Let us take this opportunity to tell you how you could be the best fit for Canfor.\xa0', 'You are analytical, determined , a self-actualized problem solver. You understand that sound business decisions are based on concrete data and you pride yourself on your ability to disseminate and synthesize data in a way that leads the business in a clear direction. If you found yourself nodding your head in agreement just now, this Business Analyst role at our Sales Office in Mobile, Alabama might just be your calling. ', 'At Canfor, diversity means understanding, recognizing and valuing the differences that make each person unique. We see inclusion and diversity as an essential part of our productivity, creativity, innovation and competitive advantage. We strive for a fair and equitable recruitment process, where hiring decisions are based on the individual qualifications and experience of each applicant. ', 'So you’re curious to know if you’re our ideal candidate? You have a couple years of business analysis experience under your belt, a business degree and are armed with the most up to data analytics tools at your disposal. We have a very complex business, so experience within a complex manufacturing setting would be considered an asset, but not required. This group has responsibility for a small amount of accounting, so some experience with Debits and Credits is also a bonus, but not required.']

['Strategy - Support division strategic initiatives - Recommend solutions to achieve quick wins and Suggest ways to continuously improve operational processes throughout each stage of the SLM - Ensure business readiness (training, awareness, tools provided, etc.) - Update the KPI reports on a scheduled basis and report back to SD Leadership and MDM - Assess validation and business rules - Develop and advise on analytics tools and solutions', 'Strategy', 'Continuous Improvement', "Operations - Collaborate with business units across the enterprise to analyse, design, build, test, deliver and maintain reports, dashboards and other data extracts as requested - Manage internal and external stakeholders' access - Develop SQL and SOQL queries", 'Operations', '"This job is offered on local terms and conditions and is at will."', 'If you are a lifelong learner with a passion for improving K-12 education, and an experienced data analyst with a proven history of sophisticated data manipulation and its transformation into actionable information that supports product development decision practices, you will find this role satisfying and challenging. Are you the self-motivated contributor we are looking for? If so, you would not be intimidated by charting a new frontier and creating a data-driven transformative educator learning experience within an organization dedicated to educators.', 'People Management and Training - Develop training and onboarding materials related to the analytics strategy as needed - Evangelize for the use of data as a decision-making tool throughout the division supporting rapid prototyping, process re-engineering, and KPI driven performance tracking', 'Policy and Process - Ensure that the SD adheres to data governance policies and communicates updates to policies and processes - Develop and document in-depth understanding of data lineage and how it aligns with Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)', 'We are currently seeking a Global Operations Data Analyst who will be responsible for measuring, monitoring, and improving Schools Division data quality as well as developing relevant analytics and BI solutions. This role will be a key contributor, developing and implementing data management measures that will improve our Schools operations on a global scale.', '*The IB is an equal opportunity employer. It provides employment opportunities to employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, ethnicity, national origin, age, physical or mental disability, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic status, or status in any group protected by federal, state, or local laws.*', 'Policy and Process', "- Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Data Science, Data Management, Statistics, Computer Science, or related field - Relevant experience in data analysis or data science projects with quick understanding of new technologies - Strong project management and prioritizing skills with ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment - Strong interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal - Hands on experience and strong knowledge of BI tools and platforms (PowerBI, Tableau or similar tool) - Experience and/or strong knowledge in R, Python, or other programming language that supports data cleaning and analysis - Strong SQL knowledge, running complex queries and joins on data from disparate sources - Hands-on experience with advanced data manipulation techniques in MS Excel - Salesforce experience creating reports, dashboards and Reporting Snapshots - Experience and/or strong knowledge of ETL and Data Warehousing concepts and related activities - Experience optimizing queries with large data sets and data storytelling - Experience with version control systems (Git, Subversion or similar) - Exceptional attention to detail for monitoring and reporting policy adherence with empowerment to take action to ensure compliance - Strong methodical approach to data analysis - Ability to contribute in developing analytics to support the scheduling of Professional Development Delivery", 'People Management and Training', 'Job Requirements:', 'The role reports to the Head of Planning, Design & Data Management, Analytics and ensure accurate data, fit for purpose, is established, maintained, available and transformed to support decisions, planning and other processes. You will collaborate with many stakeholders in different divisions across the organization and work with cross-functional teams to develop, launch, refine data focused initiatives.', 'Job Responsibilities:', "Continuous Improvement - Perform data cleaning and audit schools' data within SalesForce to ensure data integrity, compliance, and protection"]

['', 'Vortex Consulting is seeking an ERP Business Analyst for a full-time direct hire position with our client.\xa0\xa0This position will work remotely.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Function as a key facilitator within the IT organization, acting as a bridge between the business and the IT groups, and accountable for a technology solution that supports the business.\xa0Designs, modifies and creates business processes that will be used to implement the business transformation solutions. This is done through research and fact-finding combined with a basic understanding of applicable business processes, systems, and industry requirements.\xa0Accountable for determining requirements and specify effective business processes, through improvements in information systems, data management, practices, procedures, organization and equipment.Applies and monitors the use of required modeling and analysis tools, methods and standards. Conducts investigations at a high level for strategy studies, requirements specifications and feasibility studies.Defines, plans and justifies projects to develop/implement automated and non-automated components of new or changed processes.Manage and coordinate projects approved by business stakeholders focusing on Operations/Manufacturing/Planning/Logistics/Supply Chain.Assists business owners in defining acceptance tests for automated systems, and takes responsibility for their proper execution.', 'Designs, modifies and creates business processes that will be used to implement the business transformation solutions. job_text: [' Candidate must have very strong Excel skills (this is the MOST important component) Working within systems Heavy data processing and data management Research skills Data analytics-focused Have a broad understanding of complex business processes. Identify, direct and document complex business processes and business requirements to solve business needs in a cost-effective manner. Precedents may be few or do not exist. Typically manage one or more medium-scale, systems projects having cross-functional, global, and organizational implications. Communicate directly and independently with customers, IT professionals, and developers in the analysis and resolution of development and production situations. Analyze and solve complex problem areas and recommend comprehensive global, cross-organizational solutions. Prepare and present feasibility studies, alternative analyses, and cost estimates for proposed projects. Participate in the development of the most effective processes for efficient global user production support. Participate in the implementation strategies and plans including training plans, materials, and documentation. job_text: ['', 'You excel in a fast-past, collaborative startup environment - providing excellent support across multiple simultaneous initiatives while maintaining detail and accuracy. You are excited to go above and beyond when needed to help the team succeed.', 'Business Analysts will be responsible for conducting research on potential buyers within our target industry verticals - health systems, health plans, innovative healthcare industry actors, government and public sector, philanthropic buyers and more.', 'Unite Us is seeking a Business Analyst who will support Unite Us in assessing market opportunity and planning for how we will grow our Social Determinants of Health networks across the country. The Business Analyst role will be part of the Sales Operations team - an organization that is responsible for managing core sales processes and identifying and enabling the sales team on winning growth strategies and approaches.\xa0', "What You'll Do:", "Unite Us is committed to building a diverse team and fostering an inclusive culture, and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We embrace and encourage our employees' differences in race, religion, color, national origin, gender, family status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, veteran status, disability, pregnancy, medical conditions, and other characteristics. If you require assistance in applying for open positions due to a disability please email us at peopleops@uniteus.com to request an accommodation.", 'Support reviews of deal-specific economics, including pricing and margin analysis', 'The Business Analyst should be an analytical thinker who thrives in fast-paced and collaborative environments. Business Analysts will be responsible for conducting research on potential buyers within our target industry verticals - health systems, health plans, innovative healthcare industry actors, government and public sector, philanthropic buyers and more. Business Analysts leverage this research to support sales in building account, state, and territory plans; prioritizing focus and outreach activities; evaluating opportunity and deal economics; and other related activities. Success in this role requires a strong analytical orientation, alongside an ability to think creatively and practically about how to apply the results of analysis to real-world activities.', "Bachelor's degree from an accredited institution; Business, Finance, Economics or similar degree a plus", 'Experience and knowledge of the healthcare industry is a strong plus\xa0', 'This position requires minimal / limited travel', 'You are a solutions-oriented thinker who enjoys applying quantitative skills to real world problemsYou excel in a fast-past, collaborative startup environment - providing excellent support across multiple simultaneous initiatives while maintaining detail and accuracy. You are excited to go above and beyond when needed to help the team succeed.You are a strong written and oral communicator who knows how to advocate for an idea.', 'You are a solutions-oriented thinker who enjoys applying quantitative skills to real world problems', "Bachelor's degree from an accredited institution; Business, Finance, Economics or similar degree a plusExperience and knowledge of the healthcare industry is a strong plus\xa02-4 years of experience in an analyst, strategy, or consulting-style role", 'Coordinate with Sales and Marketing teams to prepare effective outreach and lead generation activities', 'Who we are:', 'You are a strong written and oral communicator who knows how to advocate for an idea.', '2-4 years of experience in an analyst, strategy, or consulting-style role', 'Environmental Job Requirements & Working Conditions:', 'Perform research on Unite Us target buyers and markets. This can include conducting broad market analyses on trends in SDoH investment, including total addressable market / total serviceable market style projects - as well as detailed looks into specific buyer characteristics\xa0\xa0', 'Perform competitive analysis and track industry trends and opportunities that impact Unite Us go-to-market approach', ' ', 'Perform research on Unite Us target buyers and markets. This can include conducting broad market analyses on trends in SDoH investment, including total addressable market / total serviceable market style projects - as well as detailed looks into specific buyer characteristics\xa0\xa0Perform competitive analysis and track industry trends and opportunities that impact Unite Us go-to-market approachProvide input into sales strategy and regional sales plans, for example through opportunity priority scoring, assembling target lists of high-value prospects, developing segmented approaches to approaching different categories of prospects, etc.Coordinate with Sales and Marketing teams to prepare effective outreach and lead generation activitiesSupport reviews of deal-specific economics, including pricing and margin analysisSupport the Sales Operations team in reviewing territory cost and revenue trends\xa0', 'Education and Experience:', "What's Required:", 'As our co-founders transitioned from military to civilian life, they encountered barriers and inefficiencies navigating the most basic health and social services. Together, they set out to improve that experience for others. Recognizing that social care is essential for better health outcomes, they embarked on a mission to connect people to the care they need, when they need it, in communities across the country. Unite Us has developed an intuitive and seamless technology solution that goes beyond the traditional referral method. We work side-by-side with local organizations, and track data and outcomes to build coordinated care networks that support all aspects of community health. Unite Us is boldly changing the nation’s care delivery system. If you want to do well and do good, join Unite Us– we can build healthier communities together.', 'This position is based in New York, NY or Los Angeles, California', 'Provide input into sales strategy and regional sales plans, for example through opportunity priority scoring, assembling target lists of high-value prospects, developing segmented approaches to approaching different categories of prospects, etc.', 'Support the Sales Operations team in reviewing territory cost and revenue trends\xa0', 'Description: ']

['', ' In collaboration with subject matter experts and data stewards, defines and implements data strategy, policies, controls, and programs to ensure the enterprise data is accurate, complete, secure, and reliable.', ' Ensures master data integrity in key systems as well as maintaining the processes to support the data quality. Identifies areas for data quality improvements and helps to resolve data quality problems through the appropriate choice of error detection and correction, process control and improvement, or process design strategies. Ensures quality of master data in key systems, as well as development and documentation of processes with other functional data owners to support ongoing maintenance and data integrity. In collaboration with subject matter experts and data stewards, defines and implements data strategy, policies, controls, and programs to ensure the enterprise data is accurate, complete, secure, and reliable. Provides assistance in resolving data quality problems through the appropriate choice of error detection and correction, process control and improvement, or process design strategies collaborating with subject matter experts (SMEs) and data stewards. Assists in data management, governance, and data quality of master data requirements with other functional data owners to ensure functional master data integrity. ['', 'RavenTek has a current opening for a Data Management Analyst supporting the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Electronic Health Record Modernization (EHRM) program. The Data Management Analyst will provide data analytics support across the CM workstreams, including FFCM, site engagement, training, VITAL and sustainment. Activities may include service line data validation, new survey development and content management, compliance monitoring through standard/ad hoc reporting (e.g., weekly reports, site survey and proficiency check data, training registration/completion reports, training effectiveness), SQL database management.', 'Working Conditions:', 'May be required to lift and carry items weighting up to 25 lbs. Requires intermittent standing, walking, sitting, squatting, stretching, and bending throughout the workday.', '• Performs scientific research, scientific writing and editing, including the writing, and editing of project products to established government standards for the targeted science and lay audiences, proofreading of draft and final documents.', '• SQL experience', 'Employment Type: Full Time / Permanent', '• Minimum of 4 years of experience. An additional 4 years of experience may be substituted for degree requirements.', 'PM20', '• Possesses knowledge of appropriate data sources to address specific requirements of projects for monitoring, characterization, analysis, and modeling.', 'Required Security Clearance: US Citizen with the ability to obtain a Public Trust.', 'Qualifications Requirements:', 'Physical Requirements:', 'Preferred Qualifications:', '• Works under supervision', ' ', '• Experience implementing Electronic Health Records', 'Employment Type:', '• VA experience preferred.', 'ADA:', 'Successful Completion of a Background Screening/Check/Investigation will/may be required as a condition of hire.', 'Required Education and Experience:', 'Background Screening/Check/Investigation:', "• Bachelor's degree in Healthcare, Engineering, Computer Science, Systems, Business, or related scientific/technical discipline.", 'ADA: RavenTek will make reasonable accommodations in compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990.', 'Required Security Clearance:', 'This role will be remote until operations go back to normal with COVID, will be required to report to site 1-2 times a week. Business work hours are set from Monday through Friday 8:00am to 5:00pm.']

job_text: ['', ' Trains and supports clinical staff in the use of the EMR system.', ' The ability to work independently and troubleshoot IT issues.', ' Collaborates with the Patient Access and Patient Financial Services Departments to analyze and provide solutions for duplicates or other inaccuracies in the electronic patient database.', 'Principal Duties', 'What You Will Do', ' Maintains EMR systems and applications user physician database throughout the UMCAP system.', ' Detailed oriented and analytical and critical thinker to assess and problem solve electronic work issues Strong interpersonal skills with ability to communicate with all levels of hospital personnel, including physicians, clinicians and other stakeholders. The ability to work independently and troubleshoot IT issues. Ability to stay abreast of the developing EMR technology and the changing demands of federal regulations and organizational requirements, UMCAP policies and procedures, Joint Commision, state and local mandates.', ' Performs related work as assigned.', 'Skills', ' Provides coordination and supports integration of systems and applications amongst HIM, PFS, Clinicians, Information Technology, Patient Access, Vendors and other stakeholders.', 'What You Need To Be Successful', ' Provides quality management of documents in electronic format. Monitors specific data queues and data mining to assure records have been completely processed for coding, billing and patient care. Collaborates with the Patient Access and Patient Financial Services Departments to analyze and provide solutions for duplicates or other inaccuracies in the electronic patient database. Provides coordination and supports integration of systems and applications amongst HIM, PFS, Clinicians, Information Technology, Patient Access, Vendors and other stakeholders. Trains and supports clinical staff in the use of the EMR system. Develops and conducts data integrity training for HIM staff. Develops reports to measure system performance and status. Maintains and provides user support with electronic forms management. Maintains EMR systems and applications user physician database throughout the UMCAP system. Troubleshoots system utility and interface errors to include printing, report processing, clinical transcription interfaces and other issue for internal and external clients. Monitors the operation of fax servers throughout the UMCAP system facilities. Monitors the Quality Analysis and Validation functions within the EMR system. Performs related work as assigned.', ' Understanding of chart analysis and records completion in an EMR system its workflow and', ' Maintains and provides user support with electronic forms management.', ' Provides quality management of documents in electronic format.', ' Strong interpersonal skills with ability to communicate with all levels of hospital personnel, including physicians, clinicians and other stakeholders.', ' Monitors the operation of fax servers throughout the UMCAP system facilities.', ' Monitors specific data queues and data mining to assure records have been completely processed for coding, billing and patient care.', ' Develops and conducts data integrity training for HIM staff.', ' Monitors the Quality Analysis and Validation functions within the EMR system.', ' Develops reports to measure system performance and status.', ' Troubleshoots system utility and interface errors to include printing, report processing, clinical transcription interfaces and other issue for internal and external clients.', ' Ability to stay abreast of the developing EMR technology and the changing demands of federal regulations and organizational requirements, UMCAP policies and procedures, Joint Commision, state and local mandates.', ' Detailed oriented and analytical and critical thinker to assess and problem solve electronic work issues']

['Minimum of five years of business application or document software business analysis experience with a history of successfully defining and launching products.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0The ability to think differently, challenge conventional wisdom, and drive new best practices.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'RESPONSIBLITIES ', 'THE POSITION:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of concepts related to Microsoft .NET development technologies, Service Oriented Architecture, microservices, understanding of database constructs, Workflow and Rules Engines.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of five years of business application or document software business analysis experience with a history of successfully defining and launching products.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with project management and driving projects from beginning to end.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Actively participate in requirement gathering sessions to capture requirements and key decisions across varying levels of the organization.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Technical aptitude needed to understand the implications of technical product decisions.', 'REQUIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:', '. You must reside in the DFW area', 'The Technical Business Analyst position has responsibility for defining Lanvera’s core processing, client portal, production and delivery systems. The technical business analyst collects, analyzes and maintains business and functional requirements for all development efforts. The position creates and maintains various types of documents, provides testing support and assists in delivery activities. Other responsibilities: Decompose, refine, and document requirements using appropriate graphical and textual techniques, including use cases, user stories, diagrams, process models, wireframes, functional and technical specifications.\xa0The technical business analyst participates in the logical design of the system with the enterprise architecture and development teams, including screen design and specifications, data modeling, and documentation of logical processing flows.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in related field.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Intimate knowledge of the product development process using Waterfall / Scrum / Agile.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent executive and team-level presentation and facilitation skills.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must have experience working for web-based, SaaS, or enterprise software development company(s).', 'THE COMPANY', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Manage multiple projects effectively to meet deadlines.', 'Technical Business Analyst', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work collaboratively in a team environment across all levels of an organization.', 'Lanvera is a leading CCM (Customer Communications Management) outsourcing and technology company specializing in the design, production and delivery of secure customer communications including invoices, statements, tax forms, collection letters, compliance notices and other business critical documents to any delivery channel including print, electronic and mobile platforms. Lanvera has a strong presence in the Financial Services industry and is expanding into other vertical markets.\xa0\xa0', '. NO C2C', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide support to Quality Assurance teams during solution testing and validation.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Analyze business, functional and system requirements and create business process, system and data models/mappings.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Participate in the review and validation of requirements with stakeholders to obtain requirements approval and signoff.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to articulate ideas to both technical and non-technical audiences through excellent written and oral communication.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Document project requirements in the form of business and system specifications and User Stories.']

Disease Registry', '•\tBe responsible for automating clinical, medical utilization, financial, membership, and program evaluation reports independently with strong attention to detail.', 'ESSENTIAL POSITION RESULTS', 'Competencies\xa0', 'The Community Health Center Network (CHCN), sister organization to the Alameda Health Consortium, is made up of the eight federally qualified community health centers in Alameda County.\xa0CHCN functions as the managed care MSO for our health centers, contracting with the Alameda Alliance for Health and Anthem Blue Cross.\xa0In order to help our health centers meet their missions of providing the best possible care to their communities, we also provide a broad range of training, technical assistance, quality improvement, information technology, and data analytic services.', 'WORKING CONDITIONS AND ENVIRONMENT', 'The Senior Data Analyst is responsible for analyzing medical utilization, clinic outcomes, and financial data; and generating meaningful reports. The Senior Data Analyst’s ultimate goal is to provide data driven support to improve the quality of care and operational efficiency, and to facilitate financial decision making.\xa0\xa0', '•\tExperience with business intelligent and visualization tool, such as Tableau', 'POSITION SUMMARY', '•\tApplies appropriate statistical theories and methods to solve practical problems such as care gap identification, quality improvement, utilization and cost reduction, etc.', '\xa0', 'Essential Requirements', '•\tDocuments analysis processes/logic, creates department’s documentation and correspondence for department continuity and cross training.\xa0\xa0\xa0', '•\tWorks with member clinics’ QI staff to improve clinical and utilization performance.', 'PHYSICAL DEMANDS\xa0', '•\tDemonstrated ability to communicate clearly and work cooperatively with diverse social and economic communities.', '•\tContributes to design efficient analytics database / data mart which will provide a comprehensive and efficient foundation for analytics team.', '•\tHigh degree of attention to detail.\xa0', '•\tLeads learning sessions to improve programming and analytics skills at the member clinics by providing SQL, Tableau training using CHCN real data and scenario.', '•\tAbility to work in a team, to give and receive constructive feedback.', 'HIPAA Designated Access']

['', 'Key Responsibilities: Requirements & Business Prioritization * Partner with the business and partner systems to understand strategies and identify underlying business needs, and with development, to propose and design technology solutions, transform them into clear business and design requirements, and collaborate with development to realize successful implementation * Business process design, improvement, primary and secondary research gathering and mapping customer journeys * Produce detailed use cases in Jira to guide the design and development of applications * Detail the technicalities of a project and create documentation and diagrams to represent this; Collaborate with technical and solution architects to define solutions * Negotiate and establish priorities with business and development managers * Engage and interact with internal & external clients during feedback sessions Execution, Monitoring & Communications * Track all deliverables between partner systems & development teams and ensure timelines & milestones are met in all project phases - the ability to work across multiple functional areas is essential * Ensure Project & JIRA artefacts are current; Manage active sprint(s) and backlog to ensure JIRA status is up to date * Usability and testing - User case definition to understand the user journeys and adding detail to this. * Communicate continually with business and IT project managers as to the status of deliverables and potential risks to the successful completion of all projects * Communicate with stakeholders statuses of deliverables and flag potential risks and delays to projects * Key point of contact for Development & Testing team on a daily basis to ensure they have what they need Person Specification Knowledge/Experience: ', 'Job Purpose: Technology is looking for a talented Business Analyst professional with a balance of technical and business acumen to collaborate with business and guide development to conceptualize, design, and deliver innovative, game-changing technology solutions for the Cross Products Technology (CPT). The individual will interact with various technology, product, and business teams across. ', 'Key Responsibilities: ', 'Experience within financial services/markets business domain * 6-8 years business Analyst / PM experience * Experience of delivering products using agile development mythology techniques, working directly with developers/technical teams * Demonstrated evidence of analyzing and documenting complex business processes and system flows * Hands-on knowledge of APIs, API Management and related technology architecture/coding experience is a plus Required Skills: * Proficiency in Atlassian Suites such as JIRA, Confluence * Proficiency in Microsoft Applications: Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Access, Visio, Project ', 'Location: Irving, TX', 'Job Background/context: The Cross Products Technology (CPT) operates globally across Markets, Trade & Treasury Services, and Commercial Bank businesses. The global businesses have a physical presence in NAM, APAC, EMEA, LATAM, and Mexico with a wide product range including equities, FX, Treasury, Cash, Trade, FX/Derivatives and Lending. The technology group develops common services, content, analytics, and platforms across all business divisions for client-facing and internal business users. ', 'PM JOB Description: Senior Program Manager - Release Manager', 'Experience within financial services/markets business domain * 6-8 years business Analyst / PM experience * Experience of delivering products using agile development mythology techniques, working directly with developers/technical teams * Demonstrated evidence of analyzing and documenting complex business processes and system flows * Hands-on knowledge of APIs, API Management and related technology architecture/coding experience is a plus Required Skills: * Proficiency in Atlassian Suites such as JIRA, Confluence * Proficiency in Microsoft Applications: Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Access, Visio, Project Qualifications: * Bachelors degree preferred * Exceptional candidates who do not meet these criteria may be considered for the role provided they have the necessary skills and experience. Competencies * Aptitude to tackle and resolve complex, often ill-defined issues, and translate requirements into functional specs * Agility to simultaneously work well independently and within a team environment across the globe with other stakeholders * Good organizational and multi-tasking skills with tremendous attention to detail * Excellent presentation, interpersonal and communication skills, oral and written, with the ability to tailor messages to a diverse audience, with clarity, impact, purpose, and authority * Self-motivated and Independent thinker * Astute analytical skills', 'Qualifications: * Bachelors degree preferred * Exceptional candidates who do not meet these criteria may be considered for the role provided they have the necessary skills and experience. Competencies * Aptitude to tackle and resolve complex, often ill-defined issues, and translate requirements into functional specs * Agility to simultaneously work well independently and within a team environment across the globe with other stakeholders * Good organizational and multi-tasking skills with tremendous attention to detail * Excellent presentation, interpersonal and communication skills, oral and written, with the ability to tailor messages to a diverse audience, with clarity, impact, purpose, and authority * Self-motivated and Independent thinker * Astute analytical skills', 'Position:  Business Analyst/Project Manager', 'Job description', 'Duration: 12+ Months Contract position']

['', 'SUMMARY ', 'Trilogy Real Estate Group is seeking a Senior Analyst to assist the executive team with analysis, financial modeling and industry research that will inform and guide the strategic direction of the firm.  This position will report to and work closely with the firm’s President.  RESPONSIBILITIES•  Model and forecast financial performance at the asset, fund and corporate level•  Analyze potential new investment products, fund offerings/structures and related corporate investments•  Conduct in-depth industry research and communicate insights/opinions to the executive team•  Collaborate with the asset management, operations and accounting teams to determine appropriate assumptions for Trilogy’s corporate financial model•  Prepare analyses and presentations for current and prospective investorsQUALIFICATIONS•  1-4 years of experience, preferably at a top-tier investment banking, consulting or real estate firm•  Strong analytical, writing and presentation skills•  Advanced excel/modeling skills•  Exceptional attention to detail•  Significant experience creating high quality, client-ready work product•  Strong multi-tasking and time management skills•  Demonstrated ability to work in a dynamic, entrepreneurial and fast-paced environment•  Organized, internally motivated and curiouso  Comfortable working independently to produce key deliverables in a timely mannero  Demonstrated ability to shift seamlessly between strategic and tactical tasks ']

In this role, you will also, partner effectively with partner managers and business stakeholders. job_title: Sr. Data Analyst - Consumer Product Analyst(Product)
job_text: ['', 'Experience supporting the development of analytics solutions leveraging tools like Tableau Desktop and Tableau Online or similar solutions. Fluency in best practices and principles for data visualization, dashboarding, and report design.', 'Still interested? Upload your resume and a Recruiter will check it out as soon as possible.', 'well-funded start-up', 'Direct work experience improving data integrity for web analytics', 'What we need from you…', 'Why Choose RentPath?', 'Immediate 401k matchGenerous PTO and Paid HolidaysPaid volunteering daysMedical, dental, vision plansPaid maternity and parental leaveFlexible spending accountsEmployee discountsCovered parking or Marta stipend (for Atlanta HQ - based employees)On-site gym (for Atlanta HQ - based employees)', 'Comfortable narrating data-driven insights and translating technical concepts into simple terminology for a variety of technical and non-technical stakeholders at various levels.', 'Demonstrated success in supporting a business day to day leveraging embedded behavior tools. Experience with digital product leveraging web traffic and consumer analytics tools; Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, Mixpanel, Heap a plus.', 'attracted talent from leading companies', 'Demonstrated success running and analyzing results from A/B and MVT testing', 'Demonstrated success operating in an environment that required heavy peer, stakeholder, and company leadership influence-ability regarding ideas, methods, and deliverables. Ideally, in support of a digital product or marketing group, collecting requirements, and delivering insight for product improvement.', 'Paid volunteering days', 'Master’s degree in a quantitative fieldSome experience with Python and exposure to data mining, ETL, usage of data warehouses as well as advanced Excel skillsDirect work experience improving data integrity for web analytics', 'What we need from you….', 'make an important difference', 'Preferred', 'RentPath is looking for a Sr. Data Analyst- Consumer Products, who will be responsible for analyzing business trends and consumer behavior data to identify opportunities for optimization of the consumer journey and our products with the goal of providing the best consumer experience and increase visitor engagement, repeat visits, and conversion.', ' A Day in the Life…….', 'You are responsible for the development, deployment, and maintenance of dashboards for the consumer product team including product owners', 'You will drive complex reporting needs like building KPI dashboards for product owners and senior leadership teams and will perform complex deep-dive analysis to troubleshoot or identify the root cause for site issues, changes to conversion, and other KPIs.', 'Advanced experience working with SQL, an expert preferred. This means the candidate can write complex queries pulling from different sources (tables, databases, reports, etc) to answer complex questions efficiently.', 'You provide data analytics/statistical support to the Product Management team and own our testing program to ensure the features proposed are well-understood and observed behavior of them in a test is in line with actual outcomes', 'Demonstrated success performing reporting and statistical analysis for business purposes in order to arrive at conclusions or provide alerts and insight.', 'smart, diverse, and unpretentious ', 'We’re a place where you can make an important difference, from day one. You’ll have the opportunity to grow and build, both professionally and in the communities we serve. You’ll work with smart, diverse, and unpretentious people, as we help renters find and enjoy their ideal home. In fact, we consider ourselves a very well-funded start-up that also has more than 40 years in the industry and strong financial performance. The challenge of leading our digital transformation has attracted talent from leading companies like Google, Microsoft, and Expedia. Will you be next?', 'Demonstrated problem-solving skills, including proven analysis of situations, identify existing or potential problems, and recommending sound conclusions and implementation strategies', 'Flexible spending accounts', 'You prepare clear and concise data visualizations and presentations to enhance business decision making; experience leveraging Tableau or similar software is a must', 'You will protect Rentpath’s bottom line through careful monitoring of our business operating metrics and be responsible for supporting changes that can affect those metrics by working closely with the Product Management team.', 'Covered parking or Marta stipend (for Atlanta HQ - based employees)', 'You work across the organization and leverage cross-functional teams to provide expert analytical service', 'You are responsible for working cross-functionally (product, engineering, design, IT, etc.) to deliver analytics support for the consumer product organization as needed', 'You bring strong organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills', 'Some experience with Python and exposure to data mining, ETL, usage of data warehouses as well as advanced Excel skills', 'Immediate 401k match', 'You use advanced statistical, econometrics, and quantitative analysis techniques to develop an in-depth understanding of consumers', 'You conduct thorough analyses to develop/validate consumer segmentations, develop and compute consumer value metrics and support ad-hoc requests for data extraction, modeling, and analysis cross-functionally.', 'Medical, dental, vision plans', 'Generous PTO and Paid Holidays', 'Paid maternity and parental leave', 'A Few Of Our Perks And Benefits', 'Demonstrated success performing reporting and statistical analysis for business purposes in order to arrive at conclusions or provide alerts and insight.Demonstrated success operating in an environment that required heavy peer, stakeholder, and company leadership influence-ability regarding ideas, methods, and deliverables. Ideally, in support of a digital product or marketing group, collecting requirements, and delivering insight for product improvement.Experience supporting the development of analytics solutions leveraging tools like Tableau Desktop and Tableau Online or similar solutions. Fluency in best practices and principles for data visualization, dashboarding, and report design.Advanced experience working with SQL, an expert preferred. This means the candidate can write complex queries pulling from different sources (tables, databases, reports, etc) to answer complex questions efficiently.Demonstrated success in supporting a business day to day leveraging embedded behavior tools. Experience with digital product leveraging web traffic and consumer analytics tools; Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, Mixpanel, Heap a plus.Demonstrated success running and analyzing results from A/B and MVT testingComfortable narrating data-driven insights and translating technical concepts into simple terminology for a variety of technical and non-technical stakeholders at various levels.Demonstrated problem-solving skills, including proven analysis of situations, identify existing or potential problems, and recommending sound conclusions and implementation strategies', 'You conduct thorough analyses to develop/validate consumer segmentations, develop and compute consumer value metrics and support ad-hoc requests for data extraction, modeling, and analysis cross-functionally.You use advanced statistical, econometrics, and quantitative analysis techniques to develop an in-depth understanding of consumersYou provide data analytics/statistical support to the Product Management team and own our testing program to ensure the features proposed are well-understood and observed behavior of them in a test is in line with actual outcomesYou prepare clear and concise data visualizations and presentations to enhance business decision making; experience leveraging Tableau or similar software is a mustYou are responsible for the development, deployment, and maintenance of dashboards for the consumer product team including product ownersYou work across the organization and leverage cross-functional teams to provide expert analytical serviceYou are responsible for working cross-functionally (product, engineering, design, IT, etc.) to deliver analytics support for the consumer product organization as neededYou validate and update analyses and dashboards periodically and provide reports as neededYou bring strong organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills', 'grow and build', 'Employee discounts', 'You validate and update analyses and dashboards periodically and provide reports as needed', 'On-site gym (for Atlanta HQ - based employees)', 'Master’s degree in a quantitative field']

Our solutions have been implemented in Tier 1 financial institutions around the globe.', 'A successful candidate will likely have the opportunity to advance to a Product Owner in a subsequent role.', '● Relational database (e.g., SQL, Oracle) experience']

Collaborate with the Data and Analytics Organization, various site support teams, and application design and build team members to develop novel techniques for detecting, investigating, and addressing User Experience issues in the EHR. Perform regular real-time UX usage analysis, data visualization, and data validation to monitor the performance and response of UX systems, and to detect potential reporting malfunctions. Support the build and design of new UX initiatives by analyzing and reporting on data elements that could be used to convey the User Experience. Collaborate with the Mass General Brigham Data and Analytics Organization, various site support teams, and application design and build teams to understand data requirements and capabilities that capture functionality and workflows. Maintain, design and develop usage dashboards, reports and functionalities to monitor, correlate and summarize data. Follow data protocols and will alert the User Experience team members of data issues; and share and explain findings. Leverage available data sources including Epic reporting tools (Clarity, reporting workbench) and the Mass General Brigham Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) to support the design, development and maintenance of UX dashboards, reports, and functionalities. Summarize data through statistical analyses, data-visualization techniques, and taxonomy development. Adjust dashboards and reports as needed, monitor fix and report on resulting usage metrics. Plan, communicate, and document changes in a standardized manner to support best change control and maintenance practices.
