job_title: Business Analyst - Medical Device Quality Management Process - Remote Based
job_text: ['', 'Job SummaryThe   Business Systems Analyst provides technical and business process   assistance in identifying and evaluating system solutions and procedures   which meet user requirements.  Interacts with the business to   understand and translate business process and system needs into   functional requirements. Responsible for executing activities and   authoring SDLC deliverables as defined in the Validation Plan,   Compliance Plan or as outlined in the Deliverables List of new   application development. Provides input to the requirements, risk   assessments, system design, testing approach, traceability and other   documentation required as part of software/application development. ', "EDUCATION   AND EXPERIENCE  Requires a Bachelors Degree in a scientific,  technical,  or business discipline with a minimum of 5-7 years  experience working  in computer databases, integrating and translating  business processes  into operational systems. Experience within a  medical, pharmaceutical or  biotechnology environment, or equivalent  combination of related  education and experience is preferred.Bachelor's Degree ", 'The   BA will report directly into the TGS Lead Business Partner for  Medical,  Regulatory and R&D and will support projects for the  Regulatory  group, working under the direction of the Project Manager  and supporting  a cross-functional team. ', 'Quality Mgt processes with additional focus Records Mgt ArchivingMigrations (Data Lineage) DecommissioningGovernance Controls 1. Coordinate with technical and business process owners  2. Discovery:  Lead process discussions to define use cases, high level requirements and critical success criteriaa. Drive discussions/alignment between Quality and IT on GxP archiving requirements  3.   Shape demand:  conduct process/data/technical  assessments, coordinate   with IT teams on solutions, costs, design, delivery.  Build the  business  case and gain review approval(s).a. Deliver archiving/migration/decommissioning  plan/roadmap for GxP applications4. Participate with other IT BAs on mapping data lineage for critical apps 5. Assist IT Global Business Partner in delivering other internal team processes ', '- \xa0  Demonstrated knowledge and skills to gather user requirements and develop URS, traceability matrix and FRS-  guidelines and 21 CFR Part 11.- \xa0  Familiar with project management, Agile and portfolio  management processes- \xa0  Demonstrated knowledge of MS Office.- \xa0  Strong knowledge of Veeva vault functionality.- \xa0  Effective written and oral communication skills- \xa0  Ability to follow established policies and procedures- \xa0  Strong interpersonal skills- \xa0  Demonstrated results oriented capabilities- \xa0  Good analytical and problem-solving skills ', '- \xa0    Provides technical and business process assistance in identifying and   evaluating system solutions and procedures which meet user  requirements.- \xa0  Analyzes cross-functional information dependencies and systems impacts.- \xa0  Documents, implements and validates the translation of business functions to automated processes.- \xa0    Maintains close working relationship with appropriate business  partners  to insure system functionality accurately represents data.Information Integration & Documentation- \xa0  Partners with applicable departments/units to ensure cross-functional integration of information and processes.- \xa0  Identifies integration issues and collaborates with the appropriate business functions.- \xa0  Reviews functional specifications to ensure that business requirements are met.- \xa0  Establishes and communicates data standards, ensuring data integrity is maintained during database conversions.- \xa0  Keeps stakeholders informed on the status of work completion relative to scheduled deadlines.\xa0  Subject Matter Expertise- \xa0  Develops and delivers training on new business solutions.- \xa0  Keeps abreast of the basic requirements for compliance in own area of work and complies with those requirements.- \xa0    Provides subject matter expertise to ensure that activities are in  sync  with the strategic vision and corporate initiatives, proactively   reviewing processes to recommend changes and process improvements where   justifiable.\xa0  Policies and Procedures- \xa0  Follows all Environmental, Health and Safety (EH&S) policiesQualificationsKNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS ', '    Disclaimer:  This job description is intended to describe the general nature and the  level of the work being performed by the people assigned to this  position. It is not intended to include every job duty and  responsibility specific to the position. USDM Life Sciences reserves the  right to amend and change responsibilities to meet business and  organizational needs as necessary.USDM Life Sciences is an equal  opportunity employer. All qualified applicants are encouraged to apply  and will receive consideration for employment without regard to their  protected veteran, disabled, or any other protect', 'USDM  Life Sciences is a premier consulting company with 20+ years of  experience assisting heavily regulated biotech, medical device, and  pharmaceutical companies with their GxP technologies to accelerate  growth. Our deep domain knowledge and technology expertise in life  sciences business processes are what sets us apart. From strategy to  implementation and adoption, we have delivered thousands of GxP projects  globally.As part of the USDM team, you have the opportunity to  work with cutting edge technologies through our many partnerships with  companies like Microsoft, Google, Oracle, DocuSign, Box, and many more.  From molecule to market, you will help connect technology, people, and  data in new ways to generate real-time insights to improve business  outcomes for USDM’s clients. Are you ready to make an impact and drive  real digital transformation in life sciences?Founded in Santa  Barbara in 1999, USDM has grown to a progressive, global company with  300+ remote employees and offices throughout the US, Canada, and  Germany. ', 'Business Systems Development ', 'DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES ', ' ']

We have a dedicated private nursing room available to new mothers.', 'Dogs in the office: We love dogs and we will probably love your dog too. With help from a calendar, we allow employees to bring in their dogs to help guide us through the day.', ' Competitive and fair compensation: We believe in fair pay--equal pay for equal work. For each title, we have consistently applied competitive salary bands based on market data and benchmarks. What you\'ve been paid before, fear of conflict, or willingness to negotiate does not play a part. Company-paid medical: Our medical, dental and vision premiums are covered 100% for you and your dependents.  Paid parental leave: Welcoming new family members is exciting, but it can also be challenging. We offer twelve weeks paid leave for primary caregivers and four weeks for secondary caregivers. We have a dedicated private nursing room available to new mothers. Unlimited vacation: At Storyblocks we take vacation seriously. That means take the time off when you need it. Don\'t worry about tracking hours or accounting for partial days. Typically employees take about three or four weeks each year. Flexible work-from-home options: Much of our workflow is online, and for meetings, we have dedicated video-conferencing setups. As long as you deliver results, you are welcome to get your work done outside of the office or during unusual times when desired. Company-sponsored mentorship and growth: We have a formal mentorship program that involves regular career and growth conversations. "360-degree" feedback is collected twice a year and synthesized into actionable, peer-reviewed, performance reviews. We happily foot the bill for conferences and online courses that will add value to the organization. We encourage attending meetups and are happy to host them as well. Casual Work Environment: Sure we all get dressed up once in a while, but in general we want you to be comfortable at the office – whatever that means to you (flip-flops, shorts, jeans, etc.). Fully stocked kitchen: Everyone gets input on the food and drinks we stock in our shared refrigerators and snack room. We have multiple mechanisms for making coffee and cold-brew kegs are often on tap. Dogs in the office: We love dogs and we will probably love your dog too. With help from a calendar, we allow employees to bring in their dogs to help guide us through the day. manage the collection of intelligence information, coordinating the collection efforts of junior analyst personnel', 'Manage long- and short- term forecasting, working with management to develop clear drivers of call volume', 'The Workforce Management Data Analyst must have solid experience in data systems and be able to go beyond the normal boundaries of those systems to derive extended meaning from the system’s data.\xa0The analyst will need to understand the relations between available data sets and interpret those relationships to support decisions throughout the business.', 'Paid vacation', 'Major Medical, Dental and VisionPaid vacation401KOpportunities for additional training to aid in your professional development', 'Benefits:', 'Make thoughtful and sound recommendations to management around optimal staffing tactics (e.g. shift bids, temporary shift alignments, overtime, etc.)', 'Ogden, Utah', 'Leverage data analysis to identify expense reduction opportunities and reach financial targets through agent efficiencies', 'Must possess a minimum of one (1) year of experience in workforce analytics, forecasting, and staffing tactics.', 'Education, Licenses and Certifications Required:', 'Specific Duties and Essential Functions', 'Workforce Management Data Analyst', 'Develop and improve upon existing statistical models and rules for finding anomalies\xa0assigned assets as necessary across multiple business lines within the client structure', 'Apply analytics models and business rules per business and leadership requirements', 'Strong customer focus in the application of analytic techniques and digital technologies to solve business problems', 'The ability to develop and maintain documentation to describe call center and operational performance', 'Major Medical, Dental and Vision', 'Responsibilities:', 'Opportunities for additional training to aid in your professional development', 'Workforce Management Data Analyst,']

job_title: Senior Data Analyst, Disease Stratification, Translational Bioinformatics
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'Evaluate and adapt latest scientific findings and methods into bioinformatics analysis plans.', 'Familiarity with cloud computing environments (RCE, Docker, AWS) is highly desired.', 'Under the guidance of senior analysts, define and execute data analysis plan for large scale multivariate datasets to support disease stratification and precision medicine.', 'Deep understanding of disease biology in oncology is a strong plus.', 'Summarize analysis results and write analysis report.', 'Ability to work both independently and collaboratively, and to handle several concurrent, fast-paced projects while conforming with rigorous requirements of clinical studies.', 'Experiences working with Next Generation Sequencing datasets, including Whole-Genome, Whole-Exome Sequencing and RNA-seq, is required.', 'Excellent communication, data presentation, and visualization skills.', 'Expertise in application of modern machine-learning/AI approaches is a plus.', 'Perform analysis of Next Generation Sequencing (e.g., RNA-seq, Exome and Whole Genome Sequencing) and derive clinically and biologically meaningful interpretations.', 'Ph.D. or M.S. with 3+ years of experience in computational biology, bioinformatics, statistics or related fields. Experiences in biotech or pharmaceutical industries is a plus.', ' Ph.D. or M.S. with 3+ years of experience in computational biology, bioinformatics, statistics or related fields. Experiences in biotech or pharmaceutical industries is a plus. Strong experience using R for complex data analysis is required. Experiences with other high-level programming language such as Python is a plus. Experiences with reproducible research practices, including GitHub, is required. Experiences working with Next Generation Sequencing datasets, including Whole-Genome, Whole-Exome Sequencing and RNA-seq, is required. Familiarity with cloud computing environments (RCE, Docker, AWS) is highly desired. Expertise in application of modern machine-learning/AI approaches is a plus. Deep understanding of disease biology in oncology is a strong plus. Ability to work both independently and collaboratively, and to handle several concurrent, fast-paced projects while conforming with rigorous requirements of clinical studies. Strong problem-solving and collaboration skills, and rigorous and creative thinking. Excellent communication, data presentation, and visualization skills. ', 'Strong problem-solving and collaboration skills, and rigorous and creative thinking.', ' Under the guidance of senior analysts, define and execute data analysis plan for large scale multivariate datasets to support disease stratification and precision medicine. Perform analysis of Next Generation Sequencing (e.g., RNA-seq, Exome and Whole Genome Sequencing) and derive clinically and biologically meaningful interpretations. Implement quality controls and benchmarking applied to novel NGS workflows to deliver high quality production tools. Summarize analysis results and write analysis report. Evaluate and adapt latest scientific findings and methods into bioinformatics analysis plans. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Experiences with reproducible research practices, including GitHub, is required.', 'Strong experience using R for complex data analysis is required. Experiences with other high-level programming language such as Python is a plus.', 'Implement quality controls and benchmarking applied to novel NGS workflows to deliver high quality production tools.']

['', 'Start Date/Period of Performance: Immediate; this position additionally offers a high likelihood of a follow-on part and/or full-time position beyond 31 August.', 'Educational and Experience Requirements:', '• Write 3-Star GO-level briefs, information papers, and contribute research and writing to the draft and final report.', '• Ability to conduct detailed research and analysis of qualitative data.', 'Company Overview: KSA Integration is a Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Small Business (SDVOSB) that provides business and management solutions through four core capabilities: (1) data analytics, (2) comprehensive veterans support, (3) business process improvement, and (4) training and education. We are a rapidly growing government contractor that has built a reputation on focused customer service, on-time performance, and continuous improvement. To demonstrate this, KSA was awarded the 2019 and 2020 Inc. Best Work Places, a prestigious list of businesses recognized for value placed on company culture, standout worker benefits, and the prioritization of employee well-being. Most recently, KSA received a spot on the 2020 Best for Vets List by Military Times.', 'Location:', 'KSA Integration is seeking a Senior Analyst / Researcher with intelligence and/or operations experience to support a USMC Director of Intelligence (DIRINT)-directed study for a maximum of 20 hours/week through 31 August 2021. The purpose of the study is to examine the impact of the introduction of artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled systems on operational decision-making within the Marine Corps. The study will research the Marine Corps Information Enterprise Environment (MCIEE), examine currently employed AI-enabled systems, identify future AI-enabled decision support requirements for Warfighters, and make strategic-level recommendations designed to support Intelligence-driven, AI-enabled future operations.', '• Former USMC (preferred) or DoD Intelligence Officer or Chief', 'Company Overview:', '• Ability to read and interpret policy, regulations, and directives.', '• Knowledge and understanding of USMC / DoD Intelligence processes.', 'Additional Required Knowledge and Skills: ', 'KSA Integration is an equal opportunity employer.', '• Perform research on USMC AI systems, initiatives, concepts, and their employment in operational scenarios.', 'Senior Analyst / Researcher', '• Conduct team interviews with Marine Corps General Officers (GOs) and MEF-level staffs.', '• Ability to communicate effectively, both orally and in writing while dispelling complex concepts into concise, easily understood, fact-based, data-supported briefs and / or prose.', '• 15 –20 years’ experience in the fields of operations analysis, intelligence, or AI systems', '• A solid comfort level with engaging study interviewees from senior General Officers to junior Enlisted by asking informed questions and guiding research on a given topic area.', '• Knowledge and familiarity with strategic guidance requirements for use of AI-enabled systems within the Marine Corps (i.e. JP 2.0, CPG 2019, FD 2030, MCDP 1.4, MCDP 2.0, FY21 AI Roadmap).', 'The Researcher should clearly possess the following knowledge and skills:', '• Active Secret-level security clearance.', '• Please submit 1-2 writing samples along with application, consistent with senior-level GO staff products (i.e. information papers, written briefs, scholarly or journal articles, association articles).', '• Master’s degree and 5 years’ experience OR', 'Location: Remote', '• Bachelor’s degree and 10 years’ experience OR', '• Great work ethic and intellectual curiosity; ability to stay on task.', 'Preferred Skills/Experience:', '• Proficient in the following Microsoft applications: Word, Teams, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook.', 'Start Date/Period of Performance:', 'Required Submission Documents:', 'Responsibilities:']

job_title: Sr. Data Analyst - SQL/ACL/Python OR Alteryx
job_text: ['', 'Great Benefits; Collaborative Teams; and Excellent Growth Potential.', 'Job Title:\xa0\xa0Senior Finance Business Analyst - Coding in SQL/Python/Tableau OR Alteryx', 'The Senior IT/Audit Data Analyst will be responsible for planning, organizing, and executing analytics related to internal audits throughout the Company (including IT, financial, operational, compliance, quality and fraud).\xa0The role will develop repeatable data analytics processes to provide real time audit assurance and improve audit efficiency.\xa0This position will drive analytics and strategy for Internal Audit and will collaborate with Internal Audit management and business functions within the organization in order to improve control, create efficiency, and add value to the business.\xa0\xa0', 'Ability to inspire and instill a common vision and framework.', 'A minimum of 5 years of relevant experience is required to be considered\xa0a Senior Data Analyst.\xa0Consideration will be given to candidates who have a minimum of 3-5 years of relevant experience to join the company as a Data Analyst.', 'Designs and creates data visualizations (reports and dashboards) using Tableau as required.', 'Experience with Python', 'Partners with the Internal Audit team members and IT team to develop and deliver a data analytics strategy in all phases of the audit process including risk assessment process, planning and scoping, fieldwork and reporting.\xa0', 'What You Will Do', "Experience working with a data warehouse. (5+ Years'\xa0Experience)", 'What You Need to be Successful', 'Provides an understanding of business and data requirements, and design visualizations for initial concepts and prototypes that can be presented to Internal Audit and the business.Performs detailed data analysis (determine data structures, content, and quality of the data through examination of source systems like: Oracle, SAP, ADP Payroll Systems, Inventory Systems and SAP, HR systems)Designs and creates data visualizations (reports and dashboards) using Tableau as required.Maintains a controlled repository of data visualization templates and views in Tableau.\xa0Develops Tableau-based ad-hoc user interfaces.Contribute to the planning, sampling, and testing of Sarbanes-Oxley controls.Contributes innovative ideas in an effort to continuously improve the audit methodology and audit procedures including the strategic deployment of technology to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of audit procedures and increase value to the business.Partners with the Internal Audit team members and IT team to develop and deliver a data analytics strategy in all phases of the audit process including risk assessment process, planning and scoping, fieldwork and reporting.\xa0Supports the training and usage of data analytics capabilities within the Internal Audit team.Work with Internal Audit colleagues to continuously improve the department and achieve department goals.', 'Audit Experience Preferred.', 'Must have excellent communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Provides an understanding of business and data requirements, and design visualizations for initial concepts and prototypes that can be presented to Internal Audit and the business.', 'Contribute to the planning, sampling, and testing of Sarbanes-Oxley controls.', 'Experience developing reports and dashboards using Tableau. (3+ Years´ Experience)', '*No sponsorship', 'Performs detailed data analysis (determine data structures, content, and quality of the data through examination of source systems like: Oracle, SAP, ADP Payroll Systems, Inventory Systems and SAP, HR systems)', 'Maintains a controlled repository of data visualization templates and views in Tableau.\xa0', 'Fortune 500 global, publicly traded; health/technology company seeking Sr. IT/Audit Business Analyst', 'Position Summary', '*Prefer Local Candidate but will consider Regional Candidates that can work remote but report in to office on a consistent basis', 'Work with Internal Audit colleagues to continuously improve the department and achieve department goals.', '5+ years within in accounting, finance, information technology, or other related roles.\xa0', 'Certifications such as CPA, CIA, CISA, CFE or other big data type certifications are bonus', 'Supports the training and usage of data analytics capabilities within the Internal Audit team.', 'Bachelors degree in accounting, finance, information systems, or other related degree.', '\xa0', '*Excellent growth potential! Join the audit team in this newly created IT role that will help with Risk Management; Fraud; Sarbanes Oxley, Quality and Merchant Accounts and define and grow this area within the company. This successful candidate will be skilled in IT coding in SQL and Python and will be able to gather raw data from disparate systems (Oracle, SAP, ADP, Nicola and More); extract the right data and visualize the data in Tableau. Should be comfortable presenting the data to other professionals and Sr. Management. Should also have strong understanding of Accounting Principles.', '*Excellent growth potential!', 'Advanced skills related to SQL, ACL (Auto Command Language)', 'Contributes innovative ideas in an effort to continuously improve the audit methodology and audit procedures including the strategic deployment of technology to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of audit procedures and increase value to the business.', "Bachelors degree in accounting, finance, information systems, or other related degree.A minimum of 5 years of relevant experience is required to be considered\xa0a Senior Data Analyst.\xa0Consideration will be given to candidates who have a minimum of 3-5 years of relevant experience to join the company as a Data Analyst.Experience working with a data warehouse. (5+ Years'\xa0Experience)Experience with PythonExperience developing reports and dashboards using Tableau. (3+ Years´ Experience)5+ years within in accounting, finance, information technology, or other related roles.\xa0Advanced skills related to SQL, ACL (Auto Command Language)Audit Experience Preferred.Certifications such as CPA, CIA, CISA, CFE or other big data type certifications are bonusAbility to inspire and instill a common vision and framework.Must have excellent communication and interpersonal skills.", 'Develops Tableau-based ad-hoc user interfaces.', 'Northeast Cleveland area – Base + bonus - 70 to 100K depending on experience level']

['', 'ABOUT FLUENCE', 'The Functional Business Analyst is responsible for working alongside Fluence’s IT and the respective functional unit to drive the execution of strategic programs and initiatives.\xa0\xa0Initiatives/Projects are typically defined to support the achievement of the Company’s strategic objectives, both financial and operational.\xa0\xa0', 'This role will bridge IT and the Functional Business units to organize and prioritize demand initiatives.', 'Do others come to you for your subject matter expertise? Are you excited by the challenge of working in a start-up atmosphere with a purpose? ', 'The role can span a variety of topics including process optimization, change management, technology evolution planning, standing up new business capabilities within the organization, or improving operational efficiencies.\xa0', 'Fluence, a Siemens and AES company, is the global market leader in energy storage technology solutions and services, combining the agility of a technology company with the expertise, vision and financial backing of two well-established and respected industry giants. Building on the pioneering work of AES Energy Storage and Siemens energy storage, our goal is to create a more sustainable future by transforming the way we power our world. Providing design, delivery and integration, Fluence offers proven energy storage technology solutions that address the diverse needs and challenges of customers in a rapidly transforming energy landscape. ', 'Minimum 3-4 years’ experience, ideally with Consulting firm or in a Finance, Operations, or Strategy function preferred.', 'Fluence currently has more than 2.4 gigawatts of projects in operation or awarded across 24 countries and territories worldwide. We topped the Navigant Research utility-scale energy storage leaderboard in 2018 and were named one of Fast Company’s Most Innovative Companies in 2019. In 2020, our sixth-generation Tech Stack won Commercial Technology of the Year at the 22nd annual S&P Global Platts Global Energy Awards.', 'Fluence IS AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER and fully subscribes to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity to ensure that all applicants and employees are considered for hire, promotion, and job status without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, marital or familial status.', '1-2 years of experience with business process redesign, business analysis and change management is highly desired.', 'Strong knowledge of Project Management principles and controls.\xa0', 'GET IN TOUCH', 'Anticipated projects will have high visibility and require that the ability to manage the scope and communications up and across the organization.', 'Agile', 'Fun', 'Leading ', 'Here at Fluence, we strive to continuously improve, be intellectually curious and be adaptive to our customers and employee’s needs. Collaboration is key, both in our partnerships with our customers, and with each other. Fluence prioritizes the most critical efforts that allow for the greatest impact. For this role you will have the following qualifications:', 'Bachelor’s degree required in Finance or Accounting or Corporate Tax with a minor in Computer Science or Information Technology.\xa0\xa0', 'This Functional Business Analyst position will serve as a connection point to align the IT delivery of services and tools to the Functional Business needs of the Finance and Tax teams. You will lead the collection and the translation of the functional business needs into technical specifications and tool configurations.\xa0\xa0', ' ', 'Bachelor’s degree required in Finance or Accounting or Corporate Tax with a minor in Computer Science or Information Technology.\xa0\xa0Minimum 3-4 years’ experience, ideally with Consulting firm or in a Finance, Operations, or Strategy function preferred.Strong knowledge of Project Management principles and controls.\xa0More than 3 years of experience with managing large, cross-functional projects including defining operational plans, business requirements, setting project objectives and deliverables, establishing project timeline and budget, and managing execution.1-2 years of experience with business process redesign, business analysis and change management is highly desired.Good and broad knowledge of Finance, Accounting and Tax corporate functions. General analytical skills for project evaluation including analysis of projects with economic, financial, risk and decision analysis.Experience in business case development and ability to effectively present business cases to business unit leadership.Customer driven with good oral and written communications skills and strong project management skills.General knowledge of the practices, procedures, and principles of performance analysis (trending, root cause and gap analysis) benchmarking and audit compliance.Ability to analyze organizational data and problems, interpret and recommend alternative courses of action, and implement intervention strategies to attain performance targets.', 'Good and broad knowledge of Finance, Accounting and Tax corporate functions. ', 'Project activities include the framing of the business requirements of the initiative scope and strategy, as well as leading the analysis, communications, planning and execution of the solution.\xa0This role will bridge IT and the Functional Business units to organize and prioritize demand initiatives.The role can span a variety of topics including process optimization, change management, technology evolution planning, standing up new business capabilities within the organization, or improving operational efficiencies.\xa0Anticipated projects will have high visibility and require that the ability to manage the scope and communications up and across the organization.', 'General analytical skills for project evaluation including analysis of projects with economic, financial, risk and decision analysis.', 'Working on transforming a fundamental part of our society is exciting and fulfilling. It requires creativity, diversity of ideas and backgrounds, and building trust to effect change and move with speed. We respect our coworkers and customers. We listen to what others have to say, and we are inclusive.', 'Experience in business case development and ability to effectively present business cases to business unit leadership.', 'Project activities include the framing of the business requirements of the initiative scope and strategy, as well as leading the analysis, communications, planning and execution of the solution.\xa0', 'Responsible', 'Ability to analyze organizational data and problems, interpret and recommend alternative courses of action, and implement intervention strategies to attain performance targets.', 'More than 3 years of experience with managing large, cross-functional projects including defining operational plans, business requirements, setting project objectives and deliverables, establishing project timeline and budget, and managing execution.', 'Location: Arlington, VA or continental US', 'Customer driven with good oral and written communications skills and strong project management skills.', 'You will also lead the authorship of presentations, memorandums, and other deliverables to audiences that span multiple levels of the organization (including senior leadership).', 'Please send your resume and cover letter to careers@fluenceenergy.com.', 'General knowledge of the practices, procedures, and principles of performance analysis (trending, root cause and gap analysis) benchmarking and audit compliance.', 'Fluence is defined by its unwavering commitment to safety, quality, and integrity. We take personal ownership in what we do, developing trust in our relationships with internal and external stakeholders. We firmly believe in having honest, forthcoming, and fair communications. In this position you will:', 'Finance & Tax Functional Business Analyst']

job_title: Senior Analyst, Finance Technology Solutions, NA
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'Knowledge and experience with customization and enhancements in SAP ECC system, and developing Functional design specifications etc. is required', 'Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills are required', 'Knowledge and experience working with SAP tables, sets, standard configuration, transactions, validation, and substitution rules, ALE & IDocs and interfaces with non-SAP systems is required', 'Experience with system enhancement process, project implementation, IT Service Management and testing protocols and tools such as HP ALM, Jira, Service Now etc. is preferred', 'Passion for data analytics, data modeling and custom data warehouse development, statistical analysis using cutting-edge financial tools and technologies is preferred', 'Must possess the ability to build strong relationships with business partners.', 'Minimum of 3 years of applicable work experience is required, including minimum of 3 years hands on experience in technical / finance roles in SAP ECC focusing on SAP FI/CO modules. (G/L, A/P, A/R, Fixed Assets).', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Working knowledge of reporting and planning tools and applications such as SAP BI/BW, HANA, TM1, Anaplan, Tableau, Blackline, and Alteryx is preferred', 'Must be able to work independently, handle multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively take on leadership roles.', 'Must be able to think creatively, maintain and improve sound business processes while working in a dynamic, team environment.', 'Knowledge and experience of other SAP systems/applications such as S/4 HANA, Central Finance and FSCM etc. is preferred', 'Must be highly motivated, committed, effective and supportive team member, able to work flexibly, quickly, and accurately under tight deadlines.', 'Minimum of a bachelor’s degree is required, preferably in Business, Computer Science, MIS, Finance or Accounting. ', 'Finance Technology Solutions (FTS) North America', 'Strong accounting/finance background and have a technical mindset, with experience in financial systems is required', 'Johnson & Johnson is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.', 'Must be very methodical and accurate, displaying a strong desire for high quality, with attention to detail.', ' Minimum of a bachelor’s degree is required, preferably in Business, Computer Science, MIS, Finance or Accounting.  Minimum of 3 years of applicable work experience is required, including minimum of 3 years hands on experience in technical / finance roles in SAP ECC focusing on SAP FI/CO modules. (G/L, A/P, A/R, Fixed Assets). Knowledge and experience working with SAP tables, sets, standard configuration, transactions, validation, and substitution rules, ALE & IDocs and interfaces with non-SAP systems is required Knowledge and experience with customization and enhancements in SAP ECC system, and developing Functional design specifications etc. is required Ability to drill down into SAP ECC to gain an understanding of the financial postings that are occurring, identify processes driving those postings as well as exceptions to standard configuration is required Strong accounting/finance background and have a technical mindset, with experience in financial systems is required Strong analytical, critical thinking, problem solving, and systems skills are required Prior experience in data analysis, complex data mapping, and data reconciliation is required Must be able to think creatively, maintain and improve sound business processes while working in a dynamic, team environment. Must be able to work independently, handle multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively take on leadership roles. Must possess the ability to organize workload, and the capacity to progress a range of tasks and projects simultaneously. Must possess the ability to build strong relationships with business partners. Must be highly motivated, committed, effective and supportive team member, able to work flexibly, quickly, and accurately under tight deadlines. Must be very methodical and accurate, displaying a strong desire for high quality, with attention to detail. Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills are required Knowledge and experience in SAP Cost accounting modules such as Internal Orders, Product Costing and Profitability Analysis is preferred Technical knowledge of integration of FI/CO with MM and SD modules is preferred Knowledge and experience of other SAP systems/applications such as S/4 HANA, Central Finance and FSCM etc. is preferred Passion for data analytics, data modeling and custom data warehouse development, statistical analysis using cutting-edge financial tools and technologies is preferred Working knowledge of reporting and planning tools and applications such as SAP BI/BW, HANA, TM1, Anaplan, Tableau, Blackline, and Alteryx is preferred Experience with system enhancement process, project implementation, IT Service Management and testing protocols and tools such as HP ALM, Jira, Service Now etc. is preferred This position may require up to 10% travel ', 'Strong analytical, critical thinking, problem solving, and systems skills are required', 'Job Description', 'Must possess the ability to organize workload, and the capacity to progress a range of tasks and projects simultaneously.', 'Knowledge and experience in SAP Cost accounting modules such as Internal Orders, Product Costing and Profitability Analysis is preferred', 'This position may require up to 10% travel', 'Prior experience in data analysis, complex data mapping, and data reconciliation is required', 'Technical knowledge of integration of FI/CO with MM and SD modules is preferred', 'Ability to drill down into SAP ECC to gain an understanding of the financial postings that are occurring, identify processes driving those postings as well as exceptions to standard configuration is required']

The focus of this position is to work closely with the People Team, Culture and People Development, and key stakeholders across BW to gain in-depth understanding of their strategy, processes, services and the context in which the business operates. Additional reimbursements are in place for work boots and prescription safety glasses  Rogue Team Member Perks: Merchandise Discounts, Employee Gym Membership, Exclusive Access to Special Events, Professional Development Programs and more', ' Rogue Fitness is the leading manufacturer of strength and conditioning equipment, including barbells, power racks, sleds, and accessories ', ' Everyone puts their boots on the same way ', ' Read more about The Rogue Way ', ' Compensation: We like to reward Rogue team members for their hard work and commitment to our company. Rogue has a competitive pay structure that offers team members room to grow. We conduct annual compensation reviews to ensure Rogue team members are receiving compensation commensurate with their performance ']

['', 'Qualifications', 'Duties And Responsibilities', 'An understanding of the data flow from the data layer through Google Tag Manager to Google Analytics and how to identify tagging inconsistencies.', 'Strong business acumen in finance, marketing, statistics, or project management and ability to understand business problems, develop hypothesis, design tests and learn', 'Experience interacting directly with user experience, onsite search, merchandising, and/or digital marketing teams is desired.', 'Familiarity with visualization tools and methodology (Looker, Power BI, Tableau).', 'Develop insights on relevant web purchase behavior, customer onsite search behavior, customer segments, customer journey, and purchasing trigger points.', 'Assist in the on-going improvement of tagging and analysis related to Google 360. ', 'Comprehensive knowledge of the entire Google 360 analytics suite including:An understanding of the data flow from the data layer through Google Tag Manager to Google Analytics and how to identify tagging inconsistencies.Power user of Google Analytics with complete understanding of enhanced ecommerce, segments, audiences, product lists, custom dimensions, events, and data imports.Clickstream analysis using Google Bigquery.', '3-6 years of experience in digital analytics, digital marketing analytics, and/or e-commerce analytics.Comprehensive knowledge of the entire Google 360 analytics suite including:An understanding of the data flow from the data layer through Google Tag Manager to Google Analytics and how to identify tagging inconsistencies.Power user of Google Analytics with complete understanding of enhanced ecommerce, segments, audiences, product lists, custom dimensions, events, and data imports.Clickstream analysis using Google Bigquery.Strong business acumen in finance, marketing, statistics, or project management and ability to understand business problems, develop hypothesis, design tests and learnExperience with data manipulation languages is required (SQL, R, Python, etc.).Experience interacting directly with user experience, onsite search, merchandising, and/or digital marketing teams is desired.Familiarity with visualization tools and methodology (Looker, Power BI, Tableau).Knowledge of Google Adwords, Google Doubleclick, or Clicktale is a plus.Academic background in analytics, statistics, marketing, business, or related field. Undergraduate college degree required; MA or MBA preferred', 'Power user of Google Analytics with complete understanding of enhanced ecommerce, segments, audiences, product lists, custom dimensions, events, and data imports.', 'Clickstream analysis using Google Bigquery.', 'Company Summary', 'An understanding of the data flow from the data layer through Google Tag Manager to Google Analytics and how to identify tagging inconsistencies.Power user of Google Analytics with complete understanding of enhanced ecommerce, segments, audiences, product lists, custom dimensions, events, and data imports.Clickstream analysis using Google Bigquery.', 'Primary Function', 'Assist in analytic projects that uncover actionable customer insights to guide short-term and long-term acquisition and retention efforts.Develop insights on relevant web purchase behavior, customer onsite search behavior, customer segments, customer journey, and purchasing trigger points.Assist in the on-going improvement of tagging and analysis related to Google 360. Analyze customers’ on site behavior to identify areas of opportunity, quantify impact, and make recommendations for future site enhancements. Assist the customer acquisition and customer experience teams with A/B and Multivariate testing.', 'Assist the customer acquisition and customer experience teams with A/B and Multivariate testing.', 'Academic background in analytics, statistics, marketing, business, or related field. Undergraduate college degree required; MA or MBA preferred', 'Analyze customers’ on site behavior to identify areas of opportunity, quantify impact, and make recommendations for future site enhancements. ', 'Knowledge of Google Adwords, Google Doubleclick, or Clicktale is a plus.', 'Final note: ', 'Zoro is an Equal Opportunity Workplace and an Affirmative Action Employer.All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status.', 'Experience with data manipulation languages is required (SQL, R, Python, etc.).', 'Assist in analytic projects that uncover actionable customer insights to guide short-term and long-term acquisition and retention efforts.', '3-6 years of experience in digital analytics, digital marketing analytics, and/or e-commerce analytics.']

B im Bereich der Immobilienbranche', ' Erfahrungen mit Schnittstellenbeschreibungen zwischen verschiedenen CRM-Systemen', 'Must- Haves', 'Anforderungen', ' Erfahrung im Bereich Finanzierung (nicht zwingend Immobilienfinanzierung)', ' Derzeit sind wir auf der Suche nach einem Business Analyst für Finanzierungssysteme.Die Aufgabe besteht im Lesen und Verknüpfen der Schnittstellenbeschreibungen zwischen dem CRM-System des Kunden und dem fremden CRM-System des Partners. Es soll der Datenaustausch für das bereits programmierte CRM-System unter Berücksichtigung der Finanzierungsanforderungen erfolgen und ein Konzept zur Anbindung des Partnersystems geschrieben werden sowie die Funktionsfähigkeit getestet werden.Das Projekt erfolgt zu 100% in Remote. Die Auslastung beträgt mind. 80%. ', 'Aufgaben']

['', 'Flexible paid time off for full-time employees & paid leave for new parents', '4+ years of experience as an information security analyst or data analyst with a focus on application or cloud security.', 'Experience with AWS or application security monitoring.', 'Monitor, detect, contain, and investigate incidents involving Rally assets or data.Ingest and parse a variety of log sources into Splunk to create custom alerts and dashboards covering the cloud environment and Rally applications.Automate Automate Automate redundant processes.Interpret systems logs, audit logs and access history to uncover anomalous activities.Extract meaningful insights from data and identify the stories behind the patterns.', "If you don't think you meet all of the job criteria and are still interested in the job, please apply! Nobody checks every box, and we're looking for someone excited to join our team.", 'You Will:', 'Ingest and parse a variety of log sources into Splunk to create custom alerts and dashboards covering the cloud environment and Rally applications.', '*The expected salary range for this position in CO will be: $89,550-$118,667.', 'Individuals with disabilities and veterans are encouraged to apply. Applicants who require an accommodation related to the application or review process should notify Talent Acquisition (recruiting@rallyhealth.com).', 'Great compensation package', 'Employees in this position may also earn performance-based bonuses', 'Wellness programs, including physical and mental health services', 'Automation and scripting experience with Python or other scripting languages (Go).', 'Our Benefits:', 'Rally Health believes in a policy of equal employment and opportunity for all people. It is our policy to train and promote individuals in all job titles, and administer all programs, without regard to race, color, religion, national origin or ancestry, citizenship, sex, age, marital status, pregnancy, childbirth or related medical conditions, personal appearance, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, family responsibilities, genetic information, disability, matriculation, political affiliation, veteran status, union affiliation, or any other category protected by applicable federal, state or local laws.', 'Great compensation packageComprehensive benefits package for full-time employees, including medical, dental, vision coverage, stock purchase plan, and 401(k)Wellness programs, including physical and mental health servicesFlexible paid time off for full-time employees & paid leave for new parentsEmployees in this position may also earn performance-based bonuses', 'You Have:', '4+ years of experience as an information security analyst or data analyst with a focus on application or cloud security.Experience with AWS or application security monitoring.Advanced knowledge of Splunk or other SIEM tooling.Automation and scripting experience with Python or other scripting languages (Go).Please note that hiring for this position will only be considered in the following states: AZ, CA, CO, DC, FL, IL, MD, MN, NC, NJ, NV, NY, OR, PA, TN, TX, VA, or WA.*The expected salary range for this position in CO will be: $89,550-$118,667.', 'AZ, CA, CO, DC, FL, IL, MD, MN, NC, NJ, NV, NY, OR, PA, TN, TX, VA, or WA.', 'Interpret systems logs, audit logs and access history to uncover anomalous activities.', 'Extract meaningful insights from data and identify the stories behind the patterns.', '\ufeffPursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.', 'Rally Health® is about putting health in the hands of the individual. With our easy-to-use online and mobile tools, we empower people by helping them take charge of their health and health care. Our culture is built on a belief in helping people live healthier lives, and we know that a diverse workforce enriches us with the talent, perspective, and inspiration we need to achieve our mission. Rally knows that we are strongest when our teams reflect the diversity of the world around us and when Rallyers can do their best work in a workplace where they feel a sense of belonging.', 'Please note that hiring for this position will only be considered in the following states: AZ, CA, CO, DC, FL, IL, MD, MN, NC, NJ, NV, NY, OR, PA, TN, TX, VA, or WA.', 'Comprehensive benefits package for full-time employees, including medical, dental, vision coverage, stock purchase plan, and 401(k)', 'Automate Automate Automate redundant processes.', 'Monitor, detect, contain, and investigate incidents involving Rally assets or data.', 'Advanced knowledge of Splunk or other SIEM tooling.', 'Join Rally Health as a Senior Cloud and Application Information Security Analyst working on the Security Operations team to protect the integrity, and availability of Rally information systems. As part of the Security team, you will report to the Security Operations Manager, work with experienced team leaders, and mentor junior analysts. We recognize that people come from diverse backgrounds and skills and welcome all to apply.']

['', 'Career development: We’re always growing, and will expect your scope & responsibilities to grow alongside your impact.', 'Reporting into the Senior Director of Product for Supply and Systems, you will be responsible for making sure our data is accurate, timely and accessible to internal employees, and eventually to property managers and renters. You will work closely with a wide range of stakeholders, understanding the business needs and making insights available to meet those needs. You will also be the evangelist for a stronger data-driven organization.', 'We’re on a mission to help everyone find a home they love while making the search simple and painless. Together, we can change the narrative around what it means to be a renter. And while we have grown very quickly over the past few years, your job will be to take our data infrastructure and processes to the next level, making data an internal strategic advantage.', 'Massive impact and visibility: You’ll have a ton of visibility at all levels of the company. You will be helping everyone from the sales people making better use of data during their pitch to the CEO being more impactful with the right use of data.Career development: We’re always growing, and will expect your scope & responsibilities to grow alongside your impact.An exceptional team: our hiring bar is high and your colleagues are talented, motivated, self-starters.Meaningful impact: Homes are core to all of us - they’re not just a big financial responsibility; homes are a place of safety and shelter, as well as a place where renters can hope to launch their hopes and dreams. Finding a home is a daunting, emotional process, and your work will make a real difference in renters’ lives.', 'Work with data engineering and analytics teams to deliver a best in class data infrastructure that yields timely, accurate and actionable insights for all internal and external consumers.', 'Build processes and policies with organization-wide support that ensures the long term success of your data strategy.', 'Massive impact and visibility: You’ll have a ton of visibility at all levels of the company. You will be helping everyone from the sales people making better use of data during their pitch to the CEO being more impactful with the right use of data.', 'Analytically and technically fluent - you can spend hours discussing architecture trade-offs with senior engineers while understanding the analytics implications.', "Being user-centric as the first principle: whether it’s property managers, leasing agents, renters or fellow apartment listers, you can articulate the pain points of data's customers - you thrive on crafting insights from qualitative and quantitative research, and then brainstorming solutions with the team.", 'Build the roadmap to make data our competitive advantage, identifying where our customers can make better decisions and providing them actionable insights along the way.', 'We are focused on building a diverse and inclusive workforce. If you’re excited about this role, but do not meet 100% of the qualifications listed, we encourage you to apply.', "Here are the skills and experience you'll need to be successful:", 'Excellence is important to you - you want to be amongst kind, passionate people who push each other to be better.', "And here's what's in it for you:", 'You believe that the best work comes from a team that’s unified in their mission - you prioritize getting everyone on the same page, and take pride that your teammates all feel the ownership and hunger to create the best experience for our users.', 'Build the roadmap to make data our competitive advantage, identifying where our customers can make better decisions and providing them actionable insights along the way.Work with data engineering and analytics teams to deliver a best in class data infrastructure that yields timely, accurate and actionable insights for all internal and external consumers.Build processes and policies with organization-wide support that ensures the long term success of your data strategy.Evangelize what the future of our data-driven organization looks like to the entire company and build excitement behind your vision.Partner with product teams to collect data in a clean and actionable manner, helping them define how to best structure their dashboards and reporting needs.', '2-5 years of experience in product management working on data products or as a Product Analyst or Data Engineer with some Product Management experience.', 'An exceptional team: our hiring bar is high and your colleagues are talented, motivated, self-starters.', "You believe that the best work comes from a team that’s unified in their mission - you prioritize getting everyone on the same page, and take pride that your teammates all feel the ownership and hunger to create the best experience for our users.Being user-centric as the first principle: whether it’s property managers, leasing agents, renters or fellow apartment listers, you can articulate the pain points of data's customers - you thrive on crafting insights from qualitative and quantitative research, and then brainstorming solutions with the team.Excellence is important to you - you want to be amongst kind, passionate people who push each other to be better.", 'Meaningful impact: Homes are core to all of us - they’re not just a big financial responsibility; homes are a place of safety and shelter, as well as a place where renters can hope to launch their hopes and dreams. Finding a home is a daunting, emotional process, and your work will make a real difference in renters’ lives.', 'Track record of building excitement about internal infrastructure projects and launching on time.', 'Evangelize what the future of our data-driven organization looks like to the entire company and build excitement behind your vision.', "Here's what you'll do as the Product Manager for Data:", 'Self-starter: you and the head of analytics will own the strategy and will define what your own success is.', '2-5 years of experience in product management working on data products or as a Product Analyst or Data Engineer with some Product Management experience.Self-starter: you and the head of analytics will own the strategy and will define what your own success is.Knowledge of data pipeline design and previous experience developing or upgrading an internal Data infrastructure.Track record of building excitement about internal infrastructure projects and launching on time.Analytically and technically fluent - you can spend hours discussing architecture trade-offs with senior engineers while understanding the analytics implications.', 'Partner with product teams to collect data in a clean and actionable manner, helping them define how to best structure their dashboards and reporting needs.', 'Knowledge of data pipeline design and previous experience developing or upgrading an internal Data infrastructure.', 'What you believe in / stand for:', 'Apartment List is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of race, gender, religion, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.']

job_title: Senior Business Analyst, E&A - Business Growth
job_text: ['', '  Total Rewards  Total Rewards All employees at UL are eligible for bonus compensation. UL offers a generous 401k matching structure of up to 5% of eligible pay. Additionally, we invest an additional 4% into your retirement saving fund after your first year of continuous employment. We provide Healthcare Reimbursement Accounts and Health Savings Accounts that UL contributes to twice per year! Depending on your role, you can work with your manager on flexible working arrangements. We also provide employees with paid time off including vacation, holiday, sick and volunteer time off. ', ' Interesting work ', ' Interprets information to determine the costs and potential benefits of entering markets. ', '  People  Ask any UL employee what they love most about working here, and you’ll almost always hear, “the people.” Going beyond what is possible is the standard at UL. We’re able to deliver the best because we employ the best. ', ' Examines corporate strategies and goals to determine areas where business analysis should be focused. ', ' Prepares research analyses and reports regarding business retention and development. ', 'At UL, we know why we come to work. ', ' Prepares customer, competitor, and industry profiles, as well as business venture studies and research reports. ', '  Grow & Achieve  We learn, work and grow together with targeted development, reward and recognition programs as well as our very own UL University that offers extensive training programs for employees at all stages, including a technical training track for applicable roles. ', ' Mission ', ' Assists with communicating business and strategic plan objectives to regional and local management. ', 'What You’ll Learn & Achieve', ' Prepares analyses of new business ventures and expansions of current lines of business, including analyses of markets, costs, benefits, and growth potential. ', 'What Makes You a Great Fit', ' Grow & Achieve ', ' Prepares studies on new and current business opportunities, including collecting and analyzing economic, technological, industry, customer, competitor, and other similar data.  Evaluates the potential of new business ventures or additions to current business lines by analyzing markets, costs, benefits, and growth potential.  Prepares research analyses and reports regarding business retention and development.  Analyzes information regarding customers, products, markets, geographies, and competitors to assist in developing new and current business studies.  Interprets information to determine the costs and potential benefits of entering markets.  Examines corporate strategies and goals to determine areas where business analysis should be focused.  Prepares customer, competitor, and industry profiles, as well as business venture studies and research reports.  Prepares analyses of new business ventures and expansions of current lines of business, including analyses of markets, costs, benefits, and growth potential.  Assists with communicating business and strategic plan objectives to regional and local management.  Performs other duties as assigned. ', '  Mission  For UL, corporate and social responsibility isn’t new. Making the world a safer, more secure and sustainable place has been our business model for the last 125 years and is deeply engrained in everything we do. ', '  Mission  For UL, corporate and social responsibility isn’t new. We’re inspired to take on the challenge that will transform how people live, work and play. And as a global company, in many roles, you will get international experience working with colleagues around the world. ['', 'Qualifications', ' Monitor Deferred Defect (DD) Program – CAT A, B, C, D,CDL and Extension discrepancies, interface with Maintenance Control, and track discrepancy rates for DD’s to effectively identify significant system trends, as defined in Section 9.3.', 'Experience and understanding of regulatory compliance of regulations, manuals, policies and procedures', 'Mathematical Skills', ' Be familiar with all phases of the operational data collection and reporting for which he/she has responsibility and identify to the CASS Manager any continuous process improvements.', 'EDUCATION And/or EXPERIENCE', 'Essential Duties And Responsibilities', 'Language Skills', 'Supervisory Responsibilities', 'Strong ability in written/oral communications, and interpersonal skills', 'Possess knowledge and understanding of statistics, able to research and use analytical skills', 'Summary', 'Must be capable of simultaneously managing multiple projects', ' Responsible for compliance with CASS Department processes. job_title: Business System Analyst - Health and Benefits
job_text: ['', ' Analyzes pre and post conversion data and provides recommendations to optimize post conversion outcome.', ' Works with other departments to coordinate interdepartmental activities and projects.', ' Manipulate data in Excel, and other software, comparing codes and determining appropriate recommendations for field users/offices.', ' Insurance industry experience and/or P&C Insurance licensing a plus.', " Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience in technical or business discipline preferred. Familiarity with Agency Software Systems a plus. Demonstrated expertise with MS Office Suite, with exceptional MS Excel skills. Experience with MS Project a plus. Demonstrated ability to interpret and apply standard policies, procedures and other established guidelines. Insurance industry experience and/or P&C Insurance licensing a plus. Ability to test, review, and analyze data between systems. Ability to develop and adhere to project timelines and to work under deadlines. Must be able to work independently with minimal supervision. Effective analytical/problem solving and research skills; effective communication skills. Occasional travel of 10-15% may be required to USI business offices.", ' Familiarity with Agency Software Systems a plus.', ' Ability to develop and adhere to project timelines and to work under deadlines.', ' Effective analytical/problem solving and research skills; effective communication skills.', ' Uses the information gathered to develop standard, repeatable and documented processes and reporting.', ' Develop and maintain project plan with dates and deliverables.', " Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience in technical or business discipline preferred.", ' Coordinate resource scheduling with internal departments and external vendors.', ' Demonstrated expertise with MS Office Suite, with exceptional MS Excel skills.', 'General Description', ' Ability to test, review, and analyze data between systems.', ' Manage acquisition system integration projects, including', 'Knowledge, Skills And Abilities', ' Occasional travel of 10-15% may be required to USI business offices.', ' Develop/run queries to extract data/information from various insurance applications and systems.', 'Responsibilities', ' Must be able to work independently with minimal supervision.', ' Conduct analysis by qualitatively analyzing data/information and then mapping according to Enterprise standards.', ' Perform special projects as requested by Manager.', ' Offer solutions and alternatives for issue resolution.', ' Develop and maintain strategic relationships with other departments including operations, finance, and infrastructure.', ' Experience with MS Project a plus.', ' Review and manage plan and issues with stakeholders', ' Develop rapport with regional, operational leaders to facilitate change management.', ' Demonstrated ability to interpret and apply standard policies, procedures and other established guidelines.', ' Manage acquisition system integration projects, including Develop and maintain project plan with dates and deliverables. Review and manage plan and issues with stakeholders Develop and maintain strategic relationships with other departments including operations, finance, and infrastructure. Coordinate resource scheduling with internal departments and external vendors. Analyzes pre and post conversion data and provides recommendations to optimize post conversion outcome. Manipulate data in Excel, and other software, comparing codes and determining appropriate recommendations for field users/offices. Conduct analysis by qualitatively analyzing data/information and then mapping according to Enterprise standards. Develop/run queries to extract data/information from various insurance applications and systems. Prepare data for test phases and evaluate pre and post conversion data continuity. Develop rapport with regional, operational leaders to facilitate change management. Uses the information gathered to develop standard, repeatable and documented processes and reporting. Offer solutions and alternatives for issue resolution. Perform special projects as requested by Manager. Works with other departments to coordinate interdepartmental activities and projects.', ' Prepare data for test phases and evaluate pre and post conversion data continuity.']

job_title: Business Analyst/Project Manager - BANKING INDUSTRY EXP
job_text: ['', 'From the hiring manager:', 'Experience working in both traditional Project Manager and Business Analyst positions is strongly preferred as this position requires a high degree of flexibility, creative problem solving and working with little direction. This position will be working within an agile team and will have exposure to many different products and technologies.', 'Really want someone with solid banking experience and understands the processes, software, etc.\xa0Would ideally like someone with Money Movement technology (wire systems) experience (Fiserv, Q2 Online, etc.)', 'Must be able to work with a fast paced highly technical team and write technical as well as business requirements/user stories\xa0', "Good Agile project experience--writing\xa0user stories, acceptance criteria, supporting testing etc.;\xa0can't be die-hard Agile evangelist though, since they're not fully Agile--need to be flexible and have a good attitude", 'THIS POSITION REQUIRES SOMEONE WITH BANKING INDUSTRY EXPERIENCE', 'Strong Business Analysis skills with blend of business process projects, application management/development projects and vendor management experience', "Strong Business Analysis skills with blend of business process projects, application management/development projects and vendor management experienceGood Agile project experience--writing\xa0user stories, acceptance criteria, supporting testing etc.;\xa0can't be die-hard Agile evangelist though, since they're not fully Agile--need to be flexible and have a good attitudeExperience working in both traditional Project Manager and Business Analyst positions is strongly preferred as this position requires a high degree of flexibility, creative problem solving and working with little direction. This position will be working within an agile team and will have exposure to many different products and technologies.Adaptable and flexible person--still wrapping up some Waterfall projects and transitioning to Agile processes, but not mature yet and may be 6 months before they're operating Agile on all cylindersAbility to fit in with fast-paced, energetic team and deliver is far more important than Agile/Scrum certifications and rigid processesReally want someone with solid banking experience and understands the processes, software, etc.\xa0Would ideally like someone with Money Movement technology (wire systems) experience (Fiserv, Q2 Online, etc.)", "Adaptable and flexible person--still wrapping up some Waterfall projects and transitioning to Agile processes, but not mature yet and may be 6 months before they're operating Agile on all cylinders", 'Would ideally like someone with Money Movement technology (wire systems) experience (Fiserv, Q2 Online, etc.)', 'Our client in the banking industry in Richardson, TX is looking for a Sr. IT Business Analyst for a six months contract to hire opportunity! This position is remote through the end of the year.', 'Experience working in both traditional Project Manager and Business Analyst positions', 'Ability to fit in with fast-paced, energetic team and deliver is far more important than Agile/Scrum certifications and rigid processes', 'A driver but someone that is patient, team centric, communicates very well & does not require hand holding, good listening and question skills are essential\xa0', 'Needs to be an experienced BA with some Project Management experience. Would be ideal if they had experience with waterfall and Agile process and could help with the transition to AgileA driver but someone that is patient, team centric, communicates very well & does not require hand holding, good listening and question skills are essential\xa0Must be able to work with a fast paced highly technical team and write technical as well as business requirements/user stories\xa0', '\xa0', 'Needs to be an experienced BA with some Project Management experience. Would be ideal if they had experience with waterfall and Agile process and could help with the transition to Agile', 'Requirements of the Senior Business Analyst:', "can't be die-hard Agile evangelist though, since they're not fully Agile--need to be flexible and have a good attitude"]
