job_text: ['', 'Meet with key business stakeholders and project members to document business and functional requirements.', 'Essential Job Functions', 'About the Job:', "Meet with key business stakeholders and project members to document business and functional requirements.Work as a liaison among business and technical stakeholders to elicit, analyze, communicate and validate requirements for changes to business processes, policies, information and information systems.Prepare business requirement documents, use cases, proof of concept models and supporting data transformation rules. Coordinate requirement review and signoffs with stakeholders to ensure that documentation accurately portrays business needs.Work with Quality Assurance to ensure appropriate test plans are developed. Assist with testing efforts as required.Assists with the evaluation of changes being proposed in current software systems.Serve as a thought contributor and propose system enhancements or program changes to improve operational efficiencies.Lead business analytics activities for small projects and function as a contributing team member for larger enterprise initiatives.Uphold the KeyBank Vision & Values.Must adhere to pertinent laws, regulations, KeyBank's Compliance Policy and external compliance requirements.", 'Uphold the KeyBank Vision & Values.', 'FLSA STATUS:', 'IT experience required, and client analytics experience preferred.', 'Develop and manage productive working relationships.', 'Working knowledge of SDLC and PMLC.', 'Lead business analytics activities for small projects and function as a contributing team member for larger enterprise initiatives.', 'Coach other team members, as appropriate, within area of expertise.', 'Business analysis thought leader with comprehensive knowledge of requirements elicitation and management methodologies.', 'Strong leadership skills with experience in conflict resolution.', 'Key Accountabilities:', 'Participate fully as a member of the team and contribute to a positive, ethical and respectful working environment and communicate openly with others.', 'Customer', 'Minimum 10 years related experience.', 'Participates in civic activities to promote growth and development of the community and a positive image for Key', 'Required Qualifications', 'Serve as a thought contributor and propose system enhancements or program changes to improve operational efficiencies.', 'Work with Quality Assurance to ensure appropriate test plans are developed. Assist with testing efforts as required.', 'Work in a collaborative fashion with all Business and Technology partners to deliver technology solutions that enhance service and product offerings to our customers. Our solutions and services will provide a quality and cost advantage, leverage our enterprise capabilities, meet business needs and provide high availability in a secure environment.Support the ongoing improvement of the partner/customer experience.Develop and manage productive working relationships.Deliver excellent customer service when dealing with internal partners, vendors or customers.', 'Support the ongoing improvement of the partner/customer experience.', 'Comprehensive understanding of financial services policies, procedures, products and industry practices.', 'Foster a positive employee experience for self and those around you.', 'Knowledge of Hadoop, relational databases (Teradata, Oracle, SQL Server) and business intelligence tools (Cognos, Tableau, SAS).', 'Work as a liaison among business and technical stakeholders to elicit, analyze, communicate and validate requirements for changes to business processes, policies, information and information systems.', "Must adhere to pertinent laws, regulations, KeyBank's Compliance Policy and external compliance requirements.", 'Assists with the evaluation of changes being proposed in current software systems.', 'Job Description', 'Prepare business requirement documents, use cases, proof of concept models and supporting data transformation rules. Coordinate requirement review and signoffs with stakeholders to ensure that documentation accurately portrays business needs.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in related field or equivalent experience.Minimum 10 years related experience.IT experience required, and client analytics experience preferred.Business analysis thought leader with comprehensive knowledge of requirements elicitation and management methodologies.Strong leadership skills with experience in conflict resolution.Comprehensive understanding of financial services policies, procedures, products and industry practices.Excellent and demonstrated skills in meeting facilitation, relationship management, leadership, critical thinking, technical writing and presentation skills.Knowledge of Hadoop, relational databases (Teradata, Oracle, SQL Server) and business intelligence tools (Cognos, Tableau, SAS).Working knowledge of SDLC and PMLC.Working knowledge of Microsoft Office, Project and Visio.Intermediate programming knowledge in Python or SAS is desired.', 'Deliver excellent customer service when dealing with internal partners, vendors or customers.', 'Intermediate programming knowledge in Python or SAS is desired.', 'Work in a collaborative fashion with all Business and Technology partners to deliver technology solutions that enhance service and product offerings to our customers. Our solutions and services will provide a quality and cost advantage, leverage our enterprise capabilities, meet business needs and provide high availability in a secure environment.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in related field or equivalent experience.', 'Excellent and demonstrated skills in meeting facilitation, relationship management, leadership, critical thinking, technical writing and presentation skills.', 'Foster a positive employee experience for self and those around you.Coach other team members, as appropriate, within area of expertise.Participate fully as a member of the team and contribute to a positive, ethical and respectful working environment and communicate openly with others.', 'Working knowledge of Microsoft Office, Project and Visio.', 'Community']

['', 'To help with this, we’re looking for an outstanding VP/Director—someone who can align data-driven strategy with client goals, direct ongoing client relationships, and lead a team of analysts and experienced team members. Sound like you? Read on.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0In-depth knowledge of and passion for online advertising and emerging trends in the digital landscape', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0General knowledge of or direct experience with the media industry or CRM platforms are a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A four-year college degree; advanced degree is a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Creating frameworks and methodologies for approaching major strategic issues, leveraging existing Digitas intellectual capital and developing innovative concepts.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Identifying strategic data-driven services that will allow clients to grow their business', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Open to travel as needed', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa010-12 years of experience in analytics or strategy with an advertising agency, management consulting company, or ad tech company', 'Got what it takes? We’d love to hear from you.', 'What you’ll do:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with modern statistical learning methods (regression techniques, classification models, supervised and unsupervised learning, etc.)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience managing a team', 'Digitas is a highly-caffeinated playground where brilliant minds come together to bring bold, award-winning ideas to life.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of digital data technologies (DMPs, Google Analytics, digital pixel tracking, site tagging, etc.)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Providing support, coaching, and training to assist in the career development of direct reports and the broader team', 'Day-to-day, your role includes:\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven leadership ability with strong client relationship skills', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0The ability to thrive in a fast-paced and deadline-driven environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Building and executing a client specific data strategy including performing gap assessments, creating optimal state data plans, and building execution roadmaps', 'We’re looking for strong, impactful work experience, which typically includes: ', 'The Data & Analysis team uses data-driven insights to fuel strategic growth for clients. We believe that data should never exist in a vacuum; instead, it should be put to work to bring the best ideas and stories to our clients.', 'VP/Director – Data & Analytics', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical, critical thinking, and problem solving skills', ' ', 'As VP/Director, you’ll guide internal teams in driving business growth while consistently exceeding client expectations and strengthening the overall Digitas relationship. Your clients’ needs will vary, and may include integrated marketing, media, CRM, segmentation, and/or primary research. ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assisting clients in defining analytics needs and developing solutions to solve those challenges', 'Digitas is an equal opportunity employer.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Evaluating new online and offline data opportunities in the form of new sources, new technology, client priorities, partnership, etc.', 'Digitas is The Connected Marketing Agency, committed to helping brands better connect with people through Truth. Connection. Wonder. With diverse expertise in data, strategy, creative, media, and tech, we work across capabilities and continents to make better connections and achieve ambitious outcomes through ideas that excite, provoke and inspire. Curious and fully transparent, we are always examining real human behavior to create authentic connections—between brands and consumers, clients and partners, and ideas and outcomes. Digitas has 3,300 employees across 12 countries and 24 offices, with an extended network via Publicis Media of over 23,500 employees present in more than 100 countries worldwide. To connect with Digitas or learn more, visit ', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Determining new opportunities among existing clients, and participating in new business initiatives', 'About Digitas', 'Digitas is The Connected Marketing Agency, committed to helping brands better connect with people through Truth. Connection. Wonder. With diverse expertise in data, strategy, creative, media, and tech, we work across capabilities and continents to make better connections and achieve ambitious outcomes through ideas that excite, provoke and inspire. Curious and fully transparent, we are always examining real human behavior to create authentic connections—between brands and consumers, clients and partners, and ideas and outcomes. Digitas has 3,300 employees across 12 countries and 24 offices, with an extended network via Publicis Media of over 23,500 employees present in more than 100 countries worldwide. To connect with Digitas or learn more, visit www.digitas.com', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fostering creative thinking around how we use data, and we could use data to solve unique business challenges in support of all Marketing activities (Media, Creative, CRM, and eCommerce).']

['', 'Lead the client review of the IRT specifications and supporting documents, making any required updates and obtaining both client and internal approval by the agreed upon milestone date', "Bachelor's degree", 'Analytical and systematic thinking ability', " Bachelor's degree At least 3 years of experience in an applicable role, such as a Business Analyst role At least 2 years of experience in IRT or related field (Strongly desired) Interpersonal and communication skills Time management and organizational skills Analytical and systematic thinking ability Creative problem solving Ability to understand technical details and translate them to non-technical users Attention to detail", ' Work on a cross-functional project team responsible for the delivery of Interactive Response Technology (IRT) for randomization and drug supply management Design the IRT solution to meet the study requirements based on the clinical protocol, the Suvoda proposal/executed work order, and discussions with the client Accurately and completely document all requirements in the specification template(s) Lead the internal team review of the draft specifications; Awareness of and prior experience with ESG reporting frameworks Proven project management skills, meticulous attention to detail in analyzing and managing large data sets Strong written and verbal communication skills Expert-level in Excel spreadsheet and PowerPoint presentation skills Demonstrated ability to distill and manipulate large amounts of complex information to deliver actionable business insights (i.e. Programming skill is an Asset). ['“This role is currently work-from-home and will move to the office environment after the COVID-19 restrictions are lifted.”Job Description: Web Applications IT coordinatorThe position will be responsible for working with a global delivery team working on the Adobe Experience Manager product suite. The ideal candidate must have excellent communication skills and the ability to work on diverse technologies.The responsibilities include ability to partner with business leads to translate business requirements to technical requirements and ensuring smooth integration of all applications, in tune with established reference architecture. Experience in Agile development methodology and 10+ years of technical delivery in general web architectures, preferably with 5+ years in AEM is key for this position.Skill Summary• 10+ years overall IT experience on enterprise-level web content management platforms.• 5+ years experience in Adobe Experience Manager and Adobe Assets.• Experience in migrating websites to AEM from other CMS platforms.• Experience in Adobe Analytics• Have a solid understanding of AEM building blocks, CRX repository, leveraging web content management components for customization and porting of websites.• Experience in Workflow development and integrating AEM with other applications.• Solid experience with Responsive Web Design (RWD)• Experience in tools like JIRA, Confluence, Service Now etc.• Prior experience in implementing and deploying multiple web applications in one AEM instance will be a plus.']

job_title: Commercial Analytics, Data Enablement Senior Analyst
job_text: ['Ongoing', 'Feb 25, 2021, 11:27:35 PMUnposting Date', 'USA-PA-CanonsburgOrganization', 'Commercial Analytics, Data Enablement Senior Analyst (21000171)Job Description Primary Location', 'Mylan Inc. Commercial Analytics, Data Enablement Senior Analyst', "21000171 At VIATRIS, we see healthcare not as it is but as it should be. We act courageously and are uniquely positioned to be a source of stability in a world of evolving healthcare needs.Viatris empowers people worldwide to live healthier at every stage of life.We do so via: Access – Providing high quality trusted medicines regardless of geography or circumstance;Leadership – Advancing sustainable operations and innovative solutions to improve patient health; and Partnership – Leveraging our collective expertise to connect people to products and services. Every day, we rise to the challenge to make a difference and here’s how the Commercial Analytics, Data Enablement Senior Analystrole will make an impact: Key responsibilities for this role include:Has a strong focus on innovation, enablement and team workSupport the development of data availability for the commercial organization such as Sales Excellence, Field Force, Marketing, Global Brand Managers, Omnichannel Teams, Pricing, Tender and Contracting Teams.Assist in the prioritization of the raw data collection from source systemsAssist in the design process and management of data linkage between source systems by using known master data elements and/or create unique identifiers when data elements do not match and / or existAssist in the creation and management of a data dictionary for all data sources / datasets by aligning with the IT organization and the business owner of the data to identify the single source of truth for each data siloAssist in the design and management the self-service reporting catalogs from the business side while working with the IT organization to implement the tools globally Build an understanding of the internal data, metric calculation, and their data sources such as SAP and other ERP systems, Veeva and other SFA systems, Product Pricing and Tendering data, Portfolio data, Supply Chain data, Finance data and other key sourcesBuild an understanding of the external data and their data sources with many local team members across the commercial and IT organization, such as IQVIA, GERS, Insight Health, Website Data, Marketing data and Digital data elementsIdentify data gaps and provide recommendations on addressing these gaps appropriately The minimum qualifications for this role are:Minimum of a Bachelor's degree (or equivalent). However, a combination of experience and/or education will be taken into consideration.Must possess a minimum of two years of Pharmaceutical Data Management. Experience working with Product and Customer Master Data in the pharmaceutical industry. Experience with IQVIA and other commercial system data preferred. Strong knowledge of data governance, understanding data structures, and data needs across a global organization.Must possess a minimum of two years of Pharmaceutical Data Management. Experience working with Product and Customer Master Data in the pharmaceutical industry. Experience with IQVIA and other commercial system data preferred. Strong knowledge of data governance, understanding data structures, and data needs across a global organization.Must possess a minimum of two years of Pharmaceutical Data Management. Experience working with Product and Customer Master Data in the pharmaceutical industry. Experience with IQVIA and other commercial system data preferred. Strong knowledge of data governance, understanding data structures, and data needs across a global organization.Ability to solve problems with complex variables through non-standardized solutions that require independent judgment and analysis.Ability to draw inferences and use deductive reasoning with no prescribed procedures to solve complex problems.Typically sitting at a desk or table.Intermittently sitting, standing, walking or stooping.Normal office situation.Proficiency in speaking, comprehending, reading and writing English is requiredAt Viatris, we offer competitive salaries, benefits and an inclusive environment where you can use your experiences, perspectives and skills to help make an impact on the lives of others. Viatris is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, religion, age, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, disability, or protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by local, state, or federal laws, rules, or regulations.Schedule", 'Full-timeJob Posting']

', ' Demonstrated skills in report authorship ', '  Work as liaison among customers in order to elicit, analyze, communicate and validate requirements for changes to business processes and information systems   Understand business problems and opportunities in the context of the requirements and recommends solutions that enable the business to achieve its goals   Contributes to service enhancement projects, by identifying and quantifying customer requirements, delineating the gaps between customer requirements and the capabilities of existing technology and resources, and recommending proactive improvements   Conducts analysis of business and user needs; Documents functional requirements; Identifies and resolves dependency and integration issues across product and service areas   Analyzes business processes and systems and translates them into written technical requirements. Identifies opportunities to optimize existing solutions, including feature configuration, staff training, development of job aids, and improved documentation.', 'Join our team at Tualatin Valley Fire & Rescue as a Project Manager/Business Analyst!', 'Intermediate understanding of standard principles and practices associated with business systems analysis (e.g, BABOK).', 'Solid knowledge of and ability to operate a personal computer and standard office software applications in addition to any specialized software necessary for the performance of job duties.', 'Week of April 19 - Live virtual interviews (for finalists)\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Week of April 26', 'Tualatin Valley Fire & Rescue is Oregon’s largest fire district and provides fire protection and emergency medical services to more than 530,000 people. ', 'POSITION SPECIFIC REQUIREMENTS:', 'Four years of experience performing analysis of systems, developing solutions, and implementing automated organizational processes.']

job_title: IS Security Analyst - Omaha, NE or Remote
job_text: ['For more information regarding available benefits, please visit our Career Site.', 'WHAT WE CAN OFFER YOU:', 'Responsible for ensuring appropriate security and privacy measures are implemented on technology solutions to protect Company data from intentional or accidental misuse.', 'Consult with business partners and information services teams to build and deploy high quality solutions.', 'The IS Security Infrastructure and Support team is looking for a data security analyst to focus on protecting corporate data assets using technologies and through the implementation of practices and procedures.\xa0 Primary responsibilities will be the development and enforcement of data security standards, enforcement of standards using technical controls, discovery of at risk data assets both in the corporate data center and in various cloud services, data auditing and data protection.\xa0 This role requires partnering with application and infrastructure teams to grow and enforce the data security practice.', 'Oversee and direct the participation of team members in complex hardware and software upgrades across all security platforms; provide security analysis for all hardware/software platforms and provide security resources for operating system and security software upgrades.', 'Identify, define, develop, implement and ensure the ethical administration of all security policies, processes and procedures; investigate possible security policy exceptions; maintain and document security controls.', 'CISSP (Certified Information Systems Security Professional) Certification (or other management approved certification)Experience within a data security program ensuring protection of corporate and customer data stores.Experience administrating security identity technologies to include structured and unstructured data security tools, cloud application security brokers, and data loss products.Scripting / Automation experience.Agile Planning Experience.Proven leadership, business judgment, negotiation skills and customer relations with ability to operate independently but within team, division, operation and corporate guidelines', 'Creation of technical documentation for system functionality and procedural guidance.', 'Providing design, analytical, and programming support for security products and services', 'Report violations (internal and external sources) to the Security CIRT (Computer Incident Response Team) and participate in CIRT activities such as investigating internal and external security incidents, excess individual access authorities, and distributed security responsibilities.', 'Administration and ownership of data security technologies.', 'Proven leadership, business judgment, negotiation skills and customer relations with ability to operate independently but within team, division, operation and corporate guidelines', 'Pay commensurate with experience.', 'This job posting is reflective of the IS Security Analyst essential functions, qualifications, and physical requirements. The Sr IS Security Analyst level has variable essential functions, qualifications and physical requirements. Competency and skill set will determine level of placement within the posted job family.', 'Mentor team members in a collaborative manner.', 'Collecting and analyzing relevant data related to security trends and technologies', 'Agile Planning Experience.', 'This work will include but is not limited to:', 'Process complex requests for network and endpoint technologies. Develop, review and approve security administration guidelines, processes, and procedures.', 'A diverse workplace where associates feel a sense of belonging.', 'Develop auditing and reporting for primary security tools such as authentication directories and distributed authentication systems. Develop auditing and reporting for distributed security responsibilities to include home office, field offices, and the cloud environments.', 'VALUABLE EXPERIENCE:', 'Consult on company-wide projects where security needs are identified.', 'To All Recruitment Agencies: We do not accept unsolicited agency resumes and we are not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.', 'Responsible for complying with all Company policies and standards.', 'Maintain strong professional relations with internal customer areas and outside vendors, keeping abreast of industry trends, threats, risks and controls.', 'Comprehensive benefits plan that includes medical, dental, vision, disability and life insurance.', "WHAT YOU'LL DO:", 'Flexible spending accounts for healthcare and childcare needs.', 'Serve as subject matter expert (SME) for at least one data security technology.', 'You help promote a culture of diversity and inclusion within the department and the larger organization. You value different ideas and opinions. You listen courageously and remain curious in all that you do.', 'MUTUAL OF OMAHA:', 'Scripting / Automation experience.', 'Partner with team members to manage network and endpoint security technologies that support the organization.', 'ABOUT YOU:', 'Join forces with a company that can AMPLIFY YOUR STRENGTHS AND EMPOWER YOUR CAREER.', 'Salary range: $100,000 - $126,000', 'An organization that feels like a small, close-knit community and has the strength of a Fortune 500 company.', '5 years’ experience managing, building, and monitoring security technologies.Proven experience in system design, research, analysis, testing and implementationDetailed knowledge in specialized security technical tools and techniques and their implementation and administrationWorking knowledge of project methodology, and policy development and implementationUnderstanding of government regulations such as security, privacy, audit reporting, etc.You help promote a culture of diversity and inclusion within the department and the larger organization. You value different ideas and opinions. You listen courageously and remain curious in all that you do.You are able to work remotely and have access to high-speed internet.', '5 years’ experience managing, building, and monitoring security technologies.', '401(k) plan with a 2% company contribution and 6% company match.', 'Understanding of government regulations such as security, privacy, audit reporting, etc.', 'Mutual of Omaha and its affiliates are an Equal Opportunity /Affirmative Action Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.', 'Work closely with customer business environments in order to provide appropriate solutions and process improvements.', 'Developing, modifying and implementing test and implementation plans for security products and processes', 'Working knowledge of project methodology, and policy development and implementation', 'Tuition reimbursement, training and career development.', 'Flexible work schedules with a healthy amount of paid time off.', 'Adherence and enforcement of all applicable state and federal regulations.', 'Developing technical and non-technical security designs to satisfy business requirements', 'Perform systems analyst duties related to security architecture and infrastructure to include:', 'Competitive pay with an opportunity for incentives for all associates.', 'A diverse workplace where associates feel a sense of belonging.An organization that feels like a small, close-knit community and has the strength of a Fortune 500 company.Tuition reimbursement, training and career development.Comprehensive benefits plan that includes medical, dental, vision, disability and life insurance.Flexible spending accounts for healthcare and childcare needs.401(k) plan with a 2% company contribution and 6% company match.Competitive pay with an opportunity for incentives for all associates.Flexible work schedules with a healthy amount of paid time off.For more information regarding available benefits, please visit our Career Site.Salary range: $100,000 - $126,000Pay commensurate with experience.', 'CISSP (Certified Information Systems Security Professional) Certification (or other management approved certification)', 'Partner with team members to manage network and endpoint security technologies that support the organization.Identify, define, develop, implement and ensure the ethical administration of all security policies, processes and procedures; investigate possible security policy exceptions; maintain and document security controls.Perform systems analyst duties related to security architecture and infrastructure to include:Providing design, analytical, and programming support for security products and servicesCollecting and analyzing relevant data related to security trends and technologiesDeveloping technical and non-technical security designs to satisfy business requirementsDeveloping, modifying and implementing test and implementation plans for security products and processesWork closely with customer business environments in order to provide appropriate solutions and process improvements.Report violations (internal and external sources) to the Security CIRT (Computer Incident Response Team) and participate in CIRT activities such as investigating internal and external security incidents, excess individual access authorities, and distributed security responsibilities.Develop auditing and reporting for primary security tools such as authentication directories and distributed authentication systems. Develop auditing and reporting for distributed security responsibilities to include home office, field offices, and the cloud environments.Process complex requests for network and endpoint technologies. Develop, review and approve security administration guidelines, processes, and procedures.Oversee and direct the participation of team members in complex hardware and software upgrades across all security platforms; provide security analysis for all hardware/software platforms and provide security resources for operating system and security software upgrades.Consult on company-wide projects where security needs are identified.Identify and evaluate security products to enhance current productivity and effectiveness. Make recommendations to department management based on evaluation and assessment.Maintain strong professional relations with internal customer areas and outside vendors, keeping abreast of industry trends, threats, risks and controls.Responsible for complying with all Company policies and standards.Responsible for ensuring appropriate security and privacy measures are implemented on technology solutions to protect Company data from intentional or accidental misuse.', 'For inquiries about the position or application process, contact our HR Helpline at 1-800-365-1405.', 'Collaborate with team members to set vision and define roadmap in order to enable the growth of the data security practice.Administration and ownership of data security technologies.Creation of technical documentation for system functionality and procedural guidance.Adherence and enforcement of all applicable state and federal regulations.Consult with business partners and information services teams to build and deploy high quality solutions.Assessment of new technologies and enhanced features for implementation.Serve as subject matter expert (SME) for at least one data security technology.Mentor team members in a collaborative manner.', 'Proven experience in system design, research, analysis, testing and implementation', 'Collaborate with team members to set vision and define roadmap in order to enable the growth of the data security practice.', 'Identify and evaluate security products to enhance current productivity and effectiveness. Make recommendations to department management based on evaluation and assessment.', 'Detailed knowledge in specialized security technical tools and techniques and their implementation and administration', 'Experience within a data security program ensuring protection of corporate and customer data stores.', 'If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you have the right to request an accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access our career center as a result of your disability. To request an accommodation, contact a Human Resources Representative at 1-800-780-0304. We are available Monday through Friday 7:00 am to 4:30 pm CST we will reply within 24 hours.', 'From day one, you’ll have the tools to be your best self at work. Here you’ll do meaningful work and your talents will have a positive impact on peoples’ lives as we help our customers protect what they care about and achieve their financial goals.', 'Assessment of new technologies and enhanced features for implementation.', 'Experience administrating security identity technologies to include structured and unstructured data security tools, cloud application security brokers, and data loss products.', 'Mutual of Omaha serves more than 4.8 million individual product customers and 39,000 employer groups. Our legacy of stability creates an environment where every associate is encouraged to experiment, innovate and grow in their own unique career path.', 'Each associate is a unique contributor to creating a diverse, dynamic, thriving and inclusive workplace. We want you to become engaged … feel a sense of belonging … and contribute to the company’s exceptional future.', 'You are able to work remotely and have access to high-speed internet.']

job_title: Research Director, Business Analyst and Decisioning Software
job_text: ['Qualifications', '', "Bachelor's degree required, advanced degree a plus.10+ years of previous data technology-centric market research, product management, product marketing, technology user or related experience.Advanced skills in MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint (SPSS a plus).Strong written and verbal communication skills applied to writing short- and long-form reports and delivering online and in-person presentations to audiences of various sizes.A self-starter with proven project management, and time management capabilities,An eye toward attention to detail and the ability to communicate data analysis through written reports and verbal presentations.\xa0A positive, entrepreneurial attitude with the ability to bring vision, creativity, and strategic thinking to the design and management of high-profile research projects while working under pressure and with competing deadlines.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven business development capabilities needed to build and grow a new research practice area in collaboration with IDC's global sales group.Ability to travel (25-30% of the time, if/when business travel resumes).\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0", 'Coordinate and create the research agenda.', 'Lead and/or contribute research and thought leadership to consulting projects.', 'Requirements:\xa0', 'A self-starter with proven project management, and time management capabilities,', 'Lead business development and the identification of opportunities for syndicated research subscription and custom consulting projects.', 'Share on your newsfeed', 'Assure that the research, inquiry, and market influence requirements of the programs are met.', 'The position demands a combination of quantitative data analysis and qualitative storytelling skills to transform market research from surveys, interviews, briefing, and other data collection initiatives into actionable advice.\xa0You will be expected to:', '\xa0Business Analytics and Decisioning Software.', 'Grow the business analytics and decisioning market research program through thought leadership, world class research execution and innovation, business development, inquiry support, and general business execution both independently, and through collaboration with IDC colleagues worldwide.', 'Grow the business analytics and decisioning market research program through thought leadership, world class research execution and innovation, business development, inquiry support, and general business execution both independently, and through collaboration with IDC colleagues worldwide.Assure that the research, inquiry, and market influence requirements of the programs are met.Support client inquiry related to research deliverables and topics pertinent to research.Coordinate and create the research agenda.Lead and/or contribute research and thought leadership to consulting projects.Lead business development and the identification of opportunities for syndicated research subscription and custom consulting projects.', 'A positive, entrepreneurial attitude with the ability to bring vision, creativity, and strategic thinking to the design and management of high-profile research projects while working under pressure and with competing deadlines.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Advanced skills in MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint (SPSS a plus).', '10+ years of previous data technology-centric market research, product management, product marketing, technology user or related experience.', 'Support client inquiry related to research deliverables and topics pertinent to research.', "Ultimately, your goal will be to grow a market research practice that develops and delivers reports, studies, and custom engagements with IDC's customer base. The Research Director role requires an in-depth understanding of three customer audiences: technology suppliers (executive suite, product management, product marketing, strategy, marketing/competitive intelligence), technology buyers (IT executives and their teams, including data-centric executives and staff such as CIOs, chief data officers, chief analytics officers, data analysts, data engineers, data scientists) and the financial investment research community.", 'IDC is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Applicants and employees are considered for positions and are evaluated without regard to mental or physical disability, handicap, race, color, religion, gender, gender identity and expression, ancestry, national origin, age, genetic information, military or veteran status, sexual orientation, marital status or other categories protected by law.', "The Research Director will be a critical leader and contributor to IDC's world class Analytics and Information Management team, focusing on the creation of unique, insightful, and relevant market research and advisory services for supplier and buyers of business analytics and decisioning solutions. In this role, you will be expected to drive IDC research agenda and fulfill it using both qualitative and quantitative market research methods.", "Bachelor's degree required, advanced degree a plus.", 'Requirements:', 'Our collaborative, innovative, and entrepreneurial culture is the perfect place for you to discover your future!', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills applied to writing short- and long-form reports and delivering online and in-person presentations to audiences of various sizes.', 'Email this job to a friend', 'Responsibilities', "Proven business development capabilities needed to build and grow a new research practice area in collaboration with IDC's global sales group.", 'Come join IDC, the most respected global technology market research firm, recognized by the Institute of Industry Analyst Relations (IIAR) as the\xa02020 Analyst Firm of the Year\xa0for delivering critical, timely insights in coordinated efforts around the world, during a time when our customers faced unprecedented challenges.\xa0We are changing the way the world thinks about the impact of technology on business and society. Our people, data, and analytics create global technology insights that accelerate customer success.', '\xa0', 'Apply for this job online', "IDC's Analytics and Information Management market research and advisory group is seeking a Research Director to lead its market research, customer advisory, and business development efforts on an exciting new research practice covering\xa0Business Analytics and Decisioning Software.", 'Ability to travel (25-30% of the time, if/when business travel resumes).\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'To be effective, the Research Director should have a strong background and a desire to continuously develop expertise in technology market areas such as business intelligence, data warehousing, enterprise planning and performance management, decision management, analytic applications, and related technologies and solutions for supporting a broad range of data analysis and decision-making processes.\xa0', 'An eye toward attention to detail and the ability to communicate data analysis through written reports and verbal presentations.\xa0']

presentations on utilization, leakage, risk performance, care management, and quality metrics to support the operation of SHCN’s Medicaid ACO;', 'Steward Health Care is an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) employer. Steward Health Care does not discriminate on the grounds of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression or any other non-job-related characteristic.', 'Possess an in-depth understanding of claims data, including ICD-9 & CPT codes, DRGs, health status and risk adjusters;', 'Commitment to service excellence', 'Education:', 'Position Purpose:\xa0Reporting to the Senior Manager of Analytics and in support of the Director of Medicaid ACO, the Senior Analyst serves as the key analytic resource to meet the information, reporting, and analytic needs of Steward Health Care Network (SHCN)’s Medicaid Accountable Care Organization.', 'Work with analysts and analytic tool vendors to improve standard report design', 'Identify opportunities to improve and enhance the analysis and information provided to SHCN leadership, participating network providers, and community partner organizations', '3-5 years of relevant experience in healthcare, analytics, or informatics']

job_title: Clinical Practice Data Analyst Specialist (Clinical Research Data Manager) - Mile Square Main (Job ID #124130)
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'REDCap experience is a plus.', 'Develop and maintain large-scale research databases and project related data repositories.', 'Department', 'Job Requirements and Duties: ', 'Use knowledge of programming languages like Java, Net, PHP, Python and statistical software like SAS or R etc. to establish analytical algorithms for research data analysis and perform cohort identification for research.', ' A minimum of 3 years of related research experience in clinical and/or research informatics preferred. Must be proficient in the use of statistical packages for managing data and conducing quality control checks. Requires excellent communication, organization, presentation, analytical and computer/pc skills, to include statistical software like SAS or R, Microsoft Office and other reporting software. REDCap experience is a plus. Advanced skills in data analytics and data mining. Excellent problem solving skills and abilities. ', 'A minimum of 3 years of related research experience in clinical and/or research informatics preferred.', ' kglover@uic.edu. ', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'To Apply:', 'Apply for Position', 'Must be proficient in the use of statistical packages for managing data and conducing quality control checks.', 'Research core literature in the biomedical informatics field to identify appropriate advances and new trends.', 'Advanced skills in data analytics and data mining. Excellent problem solving skills and abilities.', ' Develop and maintain large-scale research databases and project related data repositories. Design and development of databases, tools, developing data management plans and procedures, and study maintenance activities. This includes but is not limited to modifying study databases, developing data queries, producing and reviewing data reports, performing data reviews, resolving data discrepancies, reconciling data from different sources, importing/merging data from various sources, communicating with study staff, receiving external data files, transferring data sets, and conducting study close-out activities such as locking and archiving study databases. Develop, write, and execute code to query data for analysis, discrepancies, and quality control. Use code to automate pre-set reports and dashboards. Contribute to the conceptualization, design, development and delivery of biomedical informatics research projects, addressing all areas of clinical and translational science for UICC. Analyze project results and develop outcomes reports and recommendations. Candidate must be comfortable using a wide variety of databases and tools including: SQL, MS Access, Excel etc. connected to a standard databases like Hadoop, Kaboodle, Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, performs SSIS, ETL processes to integrate data from disparate sources etc. into the OMOP CDM. Use knowledge of programming languages like Java, Net, PHP, Python and statistical software like SAS or R etc. to establish analytical algorithms for research data analysis and perform cohort identification for research. Prepare for and attend weekly project meetings with current and relevant data. Research core literature in the biomedical informatics field to identify appropriate advances and new trends. Interpret critical biological findings and translates biological discoveries into clinical utility. Outcomes from projects provide resources and technologies that facilitate clinical and translational science research at the University and partner institutions. Conduct data entry and data abstraction for Research Council applications and related projects, such as verifying the significance and value add of a proposed project as well as providing support with the abstraction of data for approved projects that request retrospective chart reviews. Propose new research agendas and programs based on independent analysis and in-depth understanding of the field of clinical & translational research. Perform other related duties and participate in special projects as assigned.  ', ' Bachelor’s degree in Science, Information Management, Healthcare Information, Nursing, Information Technology, Computer Science, Statistics, Finance, Management Engineering, Business or closely related fields or as required by the position to be filled in the area of specialization inherent in the position may be required.', 'Analyze project results and develop outcomes reports and recommendations. Candidate must be comfortable using a wide variety of databases and tools including: SQL, MS Access, Excel etc. connected to a standard databases like Hadoop, Kaboodle, Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, performs SSIS, ETL processes to integrate data from disparate sources etc. into the OMOP CDM.', 'The work schedule for this position will be from 8:30am to 5:00pm Monday-Friday.', 'Contribute to the conceptualization, design, development and delivery of biomedical informatics research projects, addressing all areas of clinical and translational science for UICC.', 'Description', 'Perform other related duties and participate in special projects as assigned. ', 'Requires excellent communication, organization, presentation, analytical and computer/pc skills, to include statistical software like SAS or R, Microsoft Office and other reporting software.', 'Minimum Acceptable Qualifications:', 'If an application and all applicable forms, transcripts, and supporting documents are not submitted by the close date, the applicant/employee will not be considered for this position and will be denied.', 'not ', ' One (1) year (12 months) of data management/analyst work experience in a clinical or healthcare related field', 'Develop, write, and execute code to query data for analysis, discrepancies, and quality control. ['', 'Excellent Communication and Interpersonal Skills drive to exceed expectations.', 'Keep abreast of tax and other regulatory changes, and spearhead both system and process related compliance with applicable tax requirements.', 'Continuously evaluate and update accounting processes impacting the Senior Analyst, Accounting’s areas of responsibility to ensure they remain accurate, relevant and efficient.', 'High degree of professionalism and comfort working with external customers.', 'Problem-solving, critical thinking skills with the ability to research and analyze data.', 'Primary Duties, Responsibilities & Technical Requirements', 'Experience with PC and MS Office software such as Word, Excel, & Outlook.', 'Qualifications, Education, & Experience', 'Assess and mitigate risk to reduce the Company’s exposure to potential errors or misstatements in the financial statements.', 'Prior experience in Public Accounting highly preferred.', 'Perform technical accounting research on various GAAP-related issues impacting the reporting, presentation and disclosure in the Company’s external financial statement, including formal documentation of the issues, supporting research, and the resulting conclusions.', 'Is self-motivated and able to work with minimal supervision in a team environment.', 'Rationalize and critically evaluate existing processes and procedures to improve efficiency and quality, including the design and implementation of related solutions.', 'Maintain all source and other documentation according to the standards and policies established for the PAC.', 'Respond in a timely manner to the information needs of management as requested.', 'A Bachelor’s degree in Accounting from a 4 year college or university is required, and 3 years of related experience. ['', 'What You’ll Be Doing (ie. Job Duties)', 'Perform in-depth data analysis and look for patterns and trends to identify potential new security issues, understand attack vectors, and build automated detection systems.', 'You frequently get praise from your peers and coworkers about your communication skills, both written and verbal. ', 'If something happens twice, you’ll write a runbook for it. If it happens three times, you’ll resolve a way to automate that runbook.', 'You can translate complex findings and results into a concise and compelling narrative.', 'You’ve got a passing familiarity with blockchains and cryptocurrency.', ' You’ve been doing data analysis (e.g., SQL, MySQL, MapReduce) for a while now, probably in the realm of 5+ years. You enjoy finding elegant solutions to tricky problems, the trickier the problem the more fun you have solving it.  You frequently get praise from your peers and coworkers about your communication skills, both written and verbal.  You don’t just reflexively open up a Jupyter Notebook during an investigation, you’ve actually got favorite Jupyter Notebooks you’ve built up over the years, because you like backing up your conclusions with data, and you like automating things. You can translate complex findings and results into a concise and compelling narrative. ', 'You’ve worked on or have thought deeply about Internet-based risk, abuse, fraud, data protection or security.', 'You don’t just reflexively open up a Jupyter Notebook during an investigation, you’ve actually got favorite Jupyter Notebooks you’ve built up over the years, because you like backing up your conclusions with data, and you like automating things.', 'You would bring a diverse perspective to the team: for example, maybe you took an unconventional route to get into your current security career.', 'Nice To Haves', ' Define and evaluate user abuse metrics, and come up with novel ways to investigate what’s driving these metrics. Devise, build, and maintain reports, dashboards and visualizations to help the business better understand user abuse at Coinbase. Perform in-depth data analysis and look for patterns and trends to identify potential new security issues, understand attack vectors, and build automated detection systems. If something happens twice, you’ll write a runbook for it. If it happens three times, you’ll resolve a way to automate that runbook. Work on scaling and automating our brand protection and abuse detection initiatives. ', 'Devise, build, and maintain reports, dashboards and visualizations to help the business better understand user abuse at Coinbase.', 'Define and evaluate user abuse metrics, and come up with novel ways to investigate what’s driving these metrics.', 'What We Look For In You (ie. You’ve got a passing familiarity with blockchains and cryptocurrency. You’ve worked on or have thought deeply about Internet-based risk, abuse, fraud, data protection or security.', 'You enjoy finding elegant solutions to tricky problems, the trickier the problem the more fun you have solving it. job_title: Senior Analyst, Financial Planning and Analysis
job_text: ['', 'CPA, CMA, CFA or applicable professional designation\xa0 ', 'Manage risks and opportunities across multiple lines of business to ensure accurate forecasting', 'Master’s degree in Finance/Accounting or Business Administration', 'Generate, maintain, and ensure accuracy of financial and operational scorecards for various lines of businesses as part of the daily/weekly/monthly financial review process; determine key drivers of over/under performance', 'Maintain and ensure the accuracy of forecast models including: KPI’s, Revenue, Margin, EBITDA, operating expenses, Capex and Free Cash Flow', 'What you need to succeed at XPO:', 'Assist in the budgeting, planning and forecasting processes, working cross-functionally to influence stakeholdersMaintain and ensure the accuracy of forecast models including: KPI’s, Revenue, Margin, EBITDA, operating expenses, Capex and Free Cash FlowManage risks and opportunities across multiple lines of business to ensure accurate forecastingGenerate, maintain, and ensure accuracy of financial and operational scorecards for various lines of businesses as part of the daily/weekly/monthly financial review process; determine key drivers of over/under performanceDevelop tools for early identification of cost-savings opportunities and make recommendations\xa0 Assist in Monthly Operating Reviews through preparation of schedules and presentations for senior management that clearly communicate operational and financial performance, and issues requiring intervention, their status and suggested solutionsComplete ad hoc reporting to support multiple stakeholders in a cross-functional matrix environment, balancing their needs and perspectives to maximize the company’s interestsComplete competitive analysis to determine market trends and XPO’s performance against the market', 'Ability to think critically and leverage available resources to troubleshoot reporting issues and data anomalies\xa0 ', 'Strong drive to seek continuous improvement in reports and processes during companywide growth and expansion ', 'You know the future holds endless possibilities, so you like to plan, strategize and dream big. At XPO Logistics, we need people like you to help us find ways to improve, enhance and adapt in an ever-changing marketplace. As the Senior Analyst, Financial Planning and Analysis, you will partner with assigned corporate department leaders by preparing financial reports, analyses, and forecasts, and working with key stakeholders to achieve objectives. In this role, you’ll have the ability to positively affect XPO’s future through advice and counsel while creating long-term success for the company and for yourself.', 'CPA, CMA, CFA or applicable professional designation\xa0 Strong communication skills and the ability to effectively communicate complex financial concepts to various user groupsAbility to think critically and leverage available resources to troubleshoot reporting issues and data anomalies\xa0 Strong drive to seek continuous improvement in reports and processes during companywide growth and expansion ', 'Assist in Monthly Operating Reviews through preparation of schedules and presentations for senior management that clearly communicate operational and financial performance, and issues requiring intervention, their status and suggested solutions', 'What you’ll do on a typical day:', 'Pay, benefits and more.', 'It’d be great if you also have:', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent related work or military experience2 years of experience in Financial Planning and Analysis (FP&A), including budgeting and forecasting experience Experience with Microsoft Office; advanced Excel skills with the ability to create complex formulas", 'Experience with Microsoft Office; advanced Excel skills with the ability to create complex formulas', '2 years of experience in Financial Planning and Analysis (FP&A), including budgeting and forecasting experience ', 'Strong communication skills and the ability to effectively communicate complex financial concepts to various user groups', 'We are eager to attract the best, so we offer competitive compensation and a generous benefits package, including full health insurance (medical, dental and vision), 401(k), life insurance, disability and the opportunity to participate in a company incentive plan. \xa0What you’ll do on a typical day:', 'Logistics done differently.', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent related work or military experience", 'Assist in the budgeting, planning and forecasting processes, working cross-functionally to influence stakeholders', 'At a minimum, you’ll need:', 'Be part of something big.', 'Complete competitive analysis to determine market trends and XPO’s performance against the market', 'Complete ad hoc reporting to support multiple stakeholders in a cross-functional matrix environment, balancing their needs and perspectives to maximize the company’s interests', 'Develop tools for early identification of cost-savings opportunities and make recommendations\xa0 ']

job_title: Senior Business Analyst with MSP (Managed Services Provider) experience
job_text: ['Availability:', 'Skype ID:', 'Work with internal clients to define requirements for system and process enhancements and changes that align with strategic objectives.', 'Research best delivery methods of reports, forms, documents, etc. and create samples for user approval; Facilitate user review and approval.', 'The Business Analyst will work with users to define business rules, associated screens, and field edits required for projects.', 'Position Comments: Resources should have MSP\xa0(Managed Services Provider) experience', 'Protect corporate data assets and intellectual property.', 'Rate: $Open/Hour ', 'Employer Details if Any:', 'Position Comments: ', 'Expected Billing Rate:', 'Email ID:', 'Location: Coppell, TX', 'LinkedIn Profile:', 'Duration: 9 Months ', 'Work Authorization:', 'Assess significant and/or unique issues where analysis of data requires the evaluation of intangibles.', 'Assist in product market research and work with vendors to create comprehensive requirements for all system enhancements and changes.', 'Position: Senior Business Analyst with MSP (Managed Services Provider) experience', 'Contact Details:', 'Work with colleagues, clients, and vendors to interpret, exchange, and/or document administrative and technical information.', 'Current Location:', 'Name in Full:', 'Zip Code:', 'Document reports and obtain approval.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Relocation:', 'POSITION SUMMARY', '\xa0', 'This position will document and obtain approval from management, work with Vendors and IT to determine all systematic interfaces in place that users require for their process, review system functionality to determine user best practices, perform stand-alone testing of interfaces/new functionality to determine change is implemented according to definition, and facilitate user review and approval.', 'Description:', 'Plan and organize', 'Please send your resume in word format to following details to anand.yalla@infolob.com , or call me @ 972-845-7069']

['', "Bachelor's degree or the equivalent combination of education and experience is required.", "Bachelor's degree or the equivalent combination of education and experience is required.Degree in math, engineering, statistics, computational finance or economics preferred.MBA, CFA, or CPA/CA preferred.7-10 years of total work experience preferred.Experience with funds transfer pricing, liquidity stress testing, liquidity risk management, interest rate risk management, capital management and/or asset-liability management within large complex financial organizations preferred.QRM experience preferred.", '7-10 years of total work experience preferred.', 'MBA, CFA, or CPA/CA preferred.', "Our client a large Investment Bank is looking for a Senior Analyst to help with their Funds Transfer Pricing Policies. The Funds Transfer Pricing (FTP) team within Global Treasury supports the firm's business units in pricing and transfer of funding, liquidity and interest rate risk. Global Treasury also manages the Firm's interest rate risk, liquidity and funding strategy, as well as capital issuance and buybacks. The Funds Transfer Pricing team is responsible to affect the pricing and risk transfer of the firm's liquidity, interest rate risk, and funding positions, establish funds transfer pricing policy, and analyzing the impact upon the firm's & line of business structural risk position(s). Reporting to the Director of FTP, the Sr. Analyst is responsible for supporting companywide activity to ensure global consistency in FTP methodologies, process & control, and overall transfer pricing governance, including internal transaction capture, and P&L processes. The individual supports the end-to-end funds transfer pricing process & infrastructure (QRM), partnering with relevant teams in Global Treasury, Line of Business, risk, technology, and finance.\xa0", 'Experience with funds transfer pricing, liquidity stress testing, liquidity risk management, interest rate risk management, capital management and/or asset-liability management within large complex financial organizations preferred.', 'QRM experience preferred.', 'Degree in math, engineering, statistics, computational finance or economics preferred.', 'Qualifications/Requirements:']

You love to deeply analyse data and compile it from multiple sources to deliver insights and a business story that everyone will understand and buy into.\xa0', 'Contribute up to $270 as a tax-free benefit for public transportation or parking expenses', 'Travel Requirements', 'Access to Medical, Dental, Vision, Life and Disability insurance', 'Ability to perform critical analysis, data queries and segmentation and manage extensive amounts of information.', 'The fine print:', '\xa0Avis Budget Group is an equal opportunity employer – M/F/Veterans/Disabled.', 'Avis Budget Group is an equal opportunity employer – M/F/Veterans/Disabled.', 'You identify actions and data points that can be mined from data warehouse to create data-driven strategies to deliver the right content/offer, at the right time, to the right customers and prospects.', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS', '401(k) Retirement Plan with company matched contributions', 'Experience working at complex organizations, with a mix of internal stakeholders and external Agency support to drive revenue.', 'Develop documentation and road maps to accelerate and advance CRM: for processes and methodologies, KPIs, test plans and email campaigns.', 'Keys to Success', 'Competitive salary', 'This is a key role for a Strategic Marketer to develop and optimize CRM strategies that drive business results and revenue, with a focus on our consumer Email, App and SMS digital marketing channels.\xa0', 'Education', 'Analyze marketing efforts from both a qualitative & quantitative perspective. You love to deeply analyse data and compile it from multiple sources to deliver insights and a business story that everyone will understand and buy into.\xa0You possess excellent technical skills and are a strong digital, tech-savvy citizen with working knowledge of marketing automation and martech, such as Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Google Analytics, HTML or other related tools and platforms.You have a great can-do, “roll up your sleeves” attitude whereby you are comfortable building strategy and going into the details for flawless execution. You’re able to make an impact on Day 1 – and you’ve done this before for a Fortune 500 brand.In addition to providing analytic insight, you will be looked to as someone who leads offer and segmentation planning and contributes valuable ideas that can be executed and tested. You are as much a trusted advisor as you are an analyst.You identify actions and data points that can be mined from data warehouse to create data-driven strategies to deliver the right content/offer, at the right time, to the right customers and prospects.You have strong data presentation and visualization skills, including experience with data visualization/BI tools (i.e. Tableau, Power BI, etc.)You are a strategic marketer – a conceptual/analytical/creative thinker able to understand “big picture” problems and help stakeholders think through the art of the possible, guiding partners to the right solution.You possess strong interpersonal skills and an ability to collaborate successfully and build relationships with internal teams, agencies, and vendors - with a strong bias to action and proven track record of delivering results.', 'Extensive knowledge of marketing communication mediums (traditional, digital, social).', 'Access to an Employee Assistance Program for services including counseling, financial and legal consultation, referrals for care service and more', 'Experience with other parts of data warehouse ecosystem a plus (i.e. ETL, Workload Management, Access & Permissioning, etc.).', '10+ years’ digital marketing experience and demonstrated ability in a CRM role required (in-house or agency-side) - with proven past success using data to create strategy and drive revenue through promotional email channel.Digital, direct response, ROI-focused campaign management, preferably for eCommerce/D2C brands (Travel and/or Retail industry experience a plus).Mastery of SQL and database experience, business intelligence tools, and working with a data warehouse. Extensive hands-on experience with large data sets. Ability to build your own datasets and writing queries that are optimized for readability and performance.Experience with other parts of data warehouse ecosystem a plus (i.e. ETL, Workload Management, Access & Permissioning, etc.).Experience working at complex organizations, with a mix of internal stakeholders and external Agency support to drive revenue.', '\xa0Minimal travel required.']

job_text: ['', " PhD in epidemiology +10 or more years with strong record of publication required. Specialization in pharmacoepidemiology and clinical training preferred. ['', 'Data Analyst', '• Interested in early pipeline research and development/prototype efforts', 'Job Title: Data Analyst', '• Solid knowledge of statistics', 'In order to perform the responsibilities of this position, the individual must have:', '• M.S. in Computer Science, Software/Computer Engineering, or Applied Math with minimum of 4 years industry experience or B.S. degree with minimum (7) years industry experience', '• Ability to independently work with services team to gather product requirements and manage development life cycle', '• Proficient in at least two of Python, C#, Java, JavaScript', '• Demonstrated ability to work on large data sets', 'Designs, builds and oversees the deployment and operation of technology architecture, solutions and software to capture, manage, store and utilize structured and unstructured data from internal and external sources. Establishes and builds processes and structures based on business and technical requirements to channel data from multiple inputs, route appropriately and store using any combination of distributed (cloud) structures, local databases, and other applicable storage forms as required. Develops technical tools and programming that leverage artificial intelligence, machine learning and big-data techniques to cleanse, organize and transform data and to maintain, defend and update data structures and integrity on an automated basis. Creates and establishes design standards and assurance processes for software, systems and applications development to ensure compatibility and operability of data connections, flows and storage requirements. Establish product requirements with proper documentation for quality control, and support testing effort.', 'Duration: 12 months (contract + extension)', 'Location: Sunnyvale, California, United States', '• Demonstrated excellent communication skills both written and verbal', 'BS degree: 7-9 years of hands-on experience', 'Responsibilities', '• Proficient with relational SQL ( Microsoft SQL , MySQL, Postgres, Mongo etc.)', 'Job Title:', '\xa0', 'MS degree- 4-5 years of hands-on experience', '• Any experience in the following would be ideal', 'o Database design and management']

['', 'Racial and socioeconomic achievement gaps persist in our schools today. There is a 26% or greater gap in math achievement between white students and students of color. We believe in the power of STEM to offer opportunities to students who need it most. You can change this by becoming a STEM teacher.', 'EnCorps STEM Teachers Program’s vision is to realize a day where all students, regardless of socioeconomic status, are inspired and prepared to pursue their dreams. STEM Teaching Fellows transition to teaching careers within 1-3 years with the support of EnCorps training, guest teaching field experience, credentialing guidance, EnCorps cohort and the EnCorps network of schools. When you become an EnCorps Fellow, you are committing to providing access to quality education within low income schools, supporting students who need your mentorship the most.', 'The EnCorps team will provide guidance as you begin the process to become a teacher and the broad network of fellows provides first hand experience from people who, like you, transitioned into a teaching career.', '*Looking for backgrounds in: Accounting, finance, banking, mathematics, statistics, data analyst, computer programmer, IT, coding, product manager, engineering (civil, mechanical, ALL), healthcare, scientific research, biotech, lab work, etc.', 'Minimum requirements:', 'With the help of EnCorps, you will develop your unique timeline to become a paid teacher, in as little as 9 months, or 3 years depending on your personal goals.', 'EnCorps will place you in a local partner school for 1 semester where you will spend 2-5 hours per week as a volunteer Guest Teacher', 'Financial plan to participate in unpaid Guest Teaching Training for one semester', 'Fellows train online/on-demand and at 3 in-person cohort events each year by participating in enhanced skills preparation workshops', 'Have you considered a career in teaching science, math, engineering or technology (STEM)? EnCorps STEM Teachers Program transitions accomplished career-changers to teaching middle and high school in Colorado’s high need schools through a 1-2 year Fellowship. We are actively seeking our next cohort of aspiring middle and high school teachers who have previous industry experience. As an EnCorps STEM Teaching Fellow, you will have the opportunity to use your leadership and industry experience to inspire the next generation by working as a full-time salaried teacher in an EnCorps partner school.', 'For more specific eligibility and FAQ’s, please see https://www.encorps.org/teaching-fellowship/eligibility', 'Want to empower students and inspire the next generation of STEM leaders? Join EnCorps today!', "Have a bachelor's degree\xa0Have at least 1 year of hands-on STEM industry work experience or have an advanced degree in a STEM field*Financial plan to participate in unpaid Guest Teaching Training for one semester", 'Fellows receive extensive support and mentoring from the EnCorps staff, their cohort, and EnCorps’ network of schools', 'Hear from an EnCorps Fellow about why they decided to teach: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=waf-mAvcNjM', 'Final application deadline: April 30, 2021. Apply today at https://www.encorps.org/application-part1\xa0', "Have a bachelor's degree\xa0", '*Find out more about the timeline and teaching license options at https://encorps.org/teaching-fellowship/', 'Have at least 1 year of hands-on STEM industry work experience or have an advanced degree in a STEM field*', 'or ', 'Job Summary', 'Fellowship details:', 'Posting:', 'Fellows earn their license from a university partner over the course of 4-14 months', 'Fellows earn their license from a university partner over the course of 4-14 monthsEnCorps will place you in a local partner school for 1 semester where you will spend 2-5 hours per week as a volunteer Guest TeacherFellows train online/on-demand and at 3 in-person cohort events each year by participating in enhanced skills preparation workshopsFellows receive extensive support and mentoring from the EnCorps staff, their cohort, and EnCorps’ network of schoolsWith the help of EnCorps, you will develop your unique timeline to become a paid teacher, in as little as 9 months, or 3 years depending on your personal goals.']

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, veteran status or any other status protected by federal, provincial, or local laws.', 'By applying for this role, you are taking the first step in your journey towards becoming a Technical Operations Consultant with FDM. In addition to receiving training in Business Analysis, you’ll learn the skills necessary to take on roles such as Project Management and Coordination, Risk, Regulation and Compliance, SCRUM Master, Financial/Audit Analysis and Security Analysis, among others, giving you maximum flexibility to work across multiple business areas on our client’s site.', 'Business Analysts often have access to business areas in major financial institutions, working on sensitive information and high profile projects, and gaining first-hand exposure to the trade lifecycle. The role is crucial in helping organizations with the accuracy and timely presentation of data, in line with internal process, governance, and regulatory requirements. These opportunities are perfect for those who are team players with strong analytical skills and an aptitude for fast learning.', 'COVID-19 Update: At FDM we are recruiting now and throughout the year. Due to COVID-19 we have implemented alternative working arrangements to ensure that all our people stay safe. These consist of remote working, virtual training, video interviewing, and access to webinars and virtual events. If you’re looking to start your career in technology or business, we want to hear from you now!', '· Ongoing training and development through FDM mentors and virtual learning', '· Able to commit to a two-year contract with FDM upon completion of the training period', '· Eligible to work in The United States', '· Eager, ambitious, and adaptable to change', '· An analytical mindset and problem solving abilities', "Are you looking for a fast-paced and varied career, where you’ll be a critical component to keeping business systems running? A career in Technical Operations is essential to supporting an organization's business objectives.", '· Bachelor’s degree or above', 'Your career starts here.', 'What We Offer You:', '· A strong aptitude for IT and the interest and drive to expand your IT skill set', 'The ideal FDMer has:', 'Still have questions? Don’t worry, your recruiter will discuss all options and help you find the best fit for you.', '· Geographically flexible throughout the US to support our clients']

['', ' In collaboration with subject matter experts and data stewards, defines and implements data strategy, policies, controls, and programs to ensure the enterprise data is accurate, complete, secure, and reliable.', ' Ensures master data integrity in key systems as well as maintaining the processes to support the data quality. Identifies areas for data quality improvements and helps to resolve data quality problems through the appropriate choice of error detection and correction, process control and improvement, or process design strategies. Ensures quality of master data in key systems, as well as development and documentation of processes with other functional data owners to support ongoing maintenance and data integrity. In collaboration with subject matter experts and data stewards, defines and implements data strategy, policies, controls, and programs to ensure the enterprise data is accurate, complete, secure, and reliable. Assists in data management, governance, and data quality of master data requirements with other functional data owners to ensure functional master data integrity. ['', 'Analyze, draft, validate and finalize business and technical requirements.', 'Detail-oriented, yet able to move forward efficiently in the face of unanswered questions.', 'Must have a good knowledge of business process/lifecycle management principles, theories and concepts and a general understanding of industry practices, techniques, and standards.', 'The Business Analyst - Revenue Systems role sits in the Internal Platforms team within Engineering, partnering with our customers to provide scalable, secure, resilient technology platforms that enable every team at Indeed to operate with maximum autonomy, effectiveness, and transparency. This specific role is part of the team responsible for the creation and support of Indeed’s global Revenue Systems, serving as the backbone for how we bill customers, handle taxation, receive payments, and recognize revenue. Some of our key stakeholders include Finance, Marketing, Sales, and Client Success.', 'Assist with support of system changes/ implementation on an as-needed basis.', 'Customer-focused and values end-user satisfaction.', 'Leadership capabilities.', '5 or more years of experience as a business analyst working with technical systems.Experience working closely with Finance stakeholders along with a strong working knowledge of accounting concepts and common Finance processes.Experience would include common back-end revenue cycle processes (Order Management, Billing, Taxation, Payments, Revenue Recognition) and related ERP/Billing systems.Core competencies in the creation of Business Cases, User Stories, and Workflow Diagrams.
