Additional competencies in the creation of Functional Requirements, data mapping, data modeling, and systems migrations are preferred.', 'Monitor and measure the effectiveness of processes post-implementation to ensure they continue to provide a positive impact on the team and are appropriate for the business.', 'Gain in-depth knowledge of current processes and business practices through shadowing, interviewing key participants, and maintaining an understanding of the department(s) you support.', 'Good verbal and written communication and presentation skills to accurately document and report findings to a variety of audiences.', 'Excellent detective and highly curious.Detail-oriented, yet able to move forward efficiently in the face of unanswered questions.Continuously job_title: Sr Data Analyst, Product Insights - HBO Max
job_text: ['', ' Detail oriented and cares about the quality of the input data as well as how the processed data is ultimately interpreted and used ', ' High tolerance for ambiguity and fast-changing environment ', 'Company Overview ', ' Establish a close working relationship with key product stakeholders to understand their needs, identify opportunities for leveraging data in their operational decision making, and define clear roadmaps for business intelligence and/or data visualization solutions. ', " Develop strong cross-functional partnerships across the company (Data Engineering, Data Technology, Product, Content, Operations) to drive our team's success ", ' Delivering business intelligence and data visualization dashboard solutions  Looker or Tableau data visualization design and development  Analyzing, compiling, cleansing, interpreting, joining and staging data ', ' Candidate should be a SQL expert; must be able to optimize queries and join datasets efficiently ', ' 5+ years of relevant experience: Delivering business intelligence and data visualization dashboard solutions  Looker or Tableau data visualization design and development  Analyzing, compiling, cleansing, interpreting, joining and staging data ', ' Develop and maintain beautifully designed dashboards consumed by the HBO Max Product Leadership team, and build interactive dashboards to best support self-service BI to users ', ' Work closely with the product insights team under the guidance of the Sr. Product Insights lead to deliver business requirements, interact with product stakeholders and developers based on reporting needs. ', " Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineer, Mathematics or similar required (masters degree is a plus) ", ' Proven track record of performing comprehensive analyses independently ', ' Synthesize large volumes of data and complex concepts into clear accessible learnings ', ' Job ', ' Excited to work in the entertainment industry and, in particular, at a premiere video streaming service ', ' The Daily ', ' Work closely with key product stakeholders to perform ad hoc analyses and also deliver key reporting & insights for the recurring monthly/quarterly business reviews ', ' Strong communicator, for both technical and non-technical audiences ', ' The ', ' The Essentials ', ' Assist in building compelling presentations that communicate clear actionable insights ', ' For Looker, must be able to configure the entire pipeline - create Views/Models/Explores ', " Work closely with the product insights team under the guidance of the Sr. Product Insights lead to deliver business requirements, interact with product stakeholders and developers based on reporting needs.  Establish a close working relationship with key product stakeholders to understand their needs, identify opportunities for leveraging data in their operational decision making, and define clear roadmaps for business intelligence and/or data visualization solutions.  Collaborate with engineering partners in creating technical requirements, database design, and reporting solutions.  Develop and maintain beautifully designed dashboards consumed by the HBO Max Product Leadership team, and build interactive dashboards to best support self-service BI to users  Work closely with key product stakeholders to perform ad hoc analyses and also deliver key reporting & insights for the recurring monthly/quarterly business reviews  Rapidly deliver on concepts through prototypes that can be presented for feedback  Synthesize large volumes of data and complex concepts into clear accessible learnings  Assist in building compelling presentations that communicate clear actionable insights  Act as a visualization subject matter expert providing support to team members  Develop strong cross-functional partnerships across the company (Data Engineering, Data Technology, Product, Content, Operations) to drive our team's success ", " Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineer, Mathematics or similar required (masters degree is a plus)  5+ years of relevant experience: Delivering business intelligence and data visualization dashboard solutions  Looker or Tableau data visualization design and development  Analyzing, compiling, cleansing, interpreting, joining and staging data  Candidate should be a SQL expert; must be able to optimize queries and join datasets efficiently  For Looker, must be able to configure the entire pipeline - create Views/Models/Explores  Proven track record of performing comprehensive analyses independently  Strong communicator, for both technical and non-technical audiences  Detail oriented and cares about the quality of the input data as well as how the processed data is ultimately interpreted and used  High tolerance for ambiguity and fast-changing environment  Excited to work in the entertainment industry and, in particular, at a premiere video streaming service ", ' Collaborate with engineering partners in creating technical requirements, database design, and reporting solutions. ', ' Analyzing, compiling, cleansing, interpreting, joining and staging data ', ' Act as a visualization subject matter expert providing support to team members ', ' Looker or Tableau data visualization design and development ', ' Delivering business intelligence and data visualization dashboard solutions ', ' Rapidly deliver on concepts through prototypes that can be presented for feedback ']

seeking to add a full time IT Business Analyst (IT BA) to their growing IT Department.\xa0The IT BA is a member of the Agile Product Team responsible for defining Features, and ownership of the This is an instrumental role in driving business value to the organization by enhancing a new billing system rolling out to the organization, with a focus on the implementation of Sales Performance Management and low-code applications supporting the sales organization. The IT BA will be the subject matter expert of these assigned applications. Responsible for maintaining the conceptual integrity of the features/ components for the team, the IT BA has a significant role in ensuring business requirements are met and is the only team member empowered to accept user stories as done. The IT BA will serve as the liaison between the lines of business and IT department of our company, leveraging the data the IT team extrapolates, while also overseeing the selection and implementation of software programs and hardware resources. The ideal candidate for this position is detail-oriented with experience in systems integration and data mapping. He or she will also be responsible for translating business needs to IT solutions, and vice versa, with current programs, projects and initiatives in mind.', 'Program Backlog Ownership/Prioritization', '\xa0', 'Compile and distribute reports on application development and deployment', 'Provide architecture and development teams sufficiently detailed feedback on user stories and product vision to ensure the team maintains the technical integrity of features / functionality', 'Responsible for building, prioritizing, monitoring/editing, and maintaining the flow of Program Backlog to ensure the delivery of business value.', "Ability to follow instructions and respond upper managements' directions accurately.", 'Requirement Definition', 'Potential for up to 10% of travel required.', 'Consideration of usability testing and end-user feedback to ensure product will address and resolve user pain points', "Works with stakeholders to align on business value, problem statements, and pain points that are strategic priorities for the company's initiativesProvides subject matter expertise – explaining product vision and requirements to the team to ensure clarity and customer value is deliveredResponsible for defining and prioritizing stories that will increase velocity and quality of the program.Consideration of usability testing and end-user feedback to ensure product will address and resolve user pain points"]

['', 'Are capable communicators with the spoken and written word.', 'Testing:', 'Prioritization:', 'Technical Specifications: ', 'Client support: When a customer has a question, problem, or suggestion, they come to you! You are known as a subject matter expert and our clients rely on that expertise regularly. With that comes the need to prioritize what, when, and how changes are made. Since you’re working with the software and our clients daily, who better to prioritize than you? Business analysts are constantly asking themselves: Does this feature need to be completed before a certain time? What is the impact of this bug? How can other clients benefit from this change? We use a ticketing system to track pieces of work such as functionality requests and bug fixes. We then prioritize them for developers to work on.', 'Implementations: We’re a growing company and adding new clients is an exciting part of that growth! Five to Eight years’ experience planning, elicit, capture, analyze and validate business, functional and technical requirements. Five to Eight years’ experience performing current state analysis of existing business systems, applications and functions. Three to Five years’ experience with the Agile / Lean methodologies. 5+ years’ effective planning, scheduling, coordinating medium to large projects, meeting deadlines and managing multiple projects concurrently. Understand core systems, applications and technical platforms. Strong understanding of concepts of project planning and project management techniques to assist in small projects and/or group initiatives. Working knowledge of a variety of technologies and platforms, including legacy midrange, client / server and web services. Ability to maintain confidentiality pertaining to non-public business, financial and technological information, plans or data. Ability to think analytically to solve problems individually and in a team environment. Ability to work in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment. Ability to listen, understand, and respond to external and internal customers’ needs in a timely manner. Ability to work the time necessary to complete projects or meet deadlines. Ability to manage multiple, concurrent projects, activities and tasks under time constraints. Ability to effectively interface with staff at all levels. Strong critical / analytical thinking and problem-solving skills. Excellent understanding of concepts of project planning and project management techniques to assist in small projects and/or group initiatives. Ability to influence a culture of embracing change, taking a consultative lead, collaborating for results, putting clients and consumers doing it right and going beyond. Understand core systems, applications and technical platforms. Experience with Microsoft Project, Office and Visio. Experience with Microsoft Team Foundation Server, Microsoft Visual Studio Team Services, and/or Atlassian JIRA is a plus. 5+ years’ SQL skills and experience with Sequel Database Query Analyzer preferred. 5+ years’ experience planning, facilitate and execute system / functional testing and UAT for projects and enhancements preferred. 3+ years’ experience training and mentoring others in business analysis tasks and responsibilities preferred. 3+ years’ experience in modeling / mapping as-is and to-be business processes preferred. 3+ years’ experience in test planning, test case development and execution is a plus.", ' Coordinate projects and delivery proper documentation.', ' Regular and reliable attendance.', ' Excellent understanding of concepts of project planning and project management techniques to assist in small projects and/or group initiatives.', ' Ability to work in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment.', ' Five to Eight years’ experience planning, elicit, capture, analyze and validate business, functional and technical requirements.', ' 5+ years’ SQL skills and experience with Sequel Database Query Analyzer preferred.', ' Experience with Microsoft Team Foundation Server, Microsoft Visual Studio Team Services, and/or Atlassian JIRA is a plus.', 'Requirements', 'Position Description', ' Business requirements and scope development. job_title: Program Management Analyst with Security Clearance
job_text: ['Strong attention to detail.', "Experience with federal planning, programming, and evaluation/execution processes and principles is preferred. Location: Washington, DCTravel: Less than 10%Company Profile:IntelliWare is a privately-owned company founded to provide business and technical services to government and commercial clients. Our business philosophy is to hire the brightest, yet humble, people we can find and provide them with the team, training, and support they need to exceed our customers' mission requirements. Our experienced, cleared, and professional workforce receives compensation and benefits that are intended to be among the best in our industry.", 'Expertise using MS Excel as an analytical tool is preferred.', 'Superior writing skills and experience producing data/resource-focused summary papers, reports, and briefs containing written analyses, justifications, and graphics describing data related to operational outcomes, such as congressional justifications, fiscal summaries, and talking points for executive-level and external agency audiences.', "Minimum 6 years' experience in government (intelligence, defense, law enforcement community) leading and/or coordinating multiple, complex projects with frequent aggressive and/or competing deadlines.", "Bachelor's degree required in Economics, Data Analytics or a related degree.", 'Writing sample required.', 'Demonstrated experience successfully working at an Executive Staff-level.', 'Superior briefing and interpersonal skills.', 'Self-starter with demonstrated initiative.', 'Experience applying operational objectives/outcomes to fiscal goals.', 'High proficiency using MS Excel spreadsheets and pivot tables, PowerPoint presentations and demonstrative graphics, Word documents, and SharePoint lists and workflow tools.', 'Strong skill researching and analyzing data, written information, and programmatic outcomes to assess risks, formulate recommendations, and present written analysis and data which aligns with organizational goals.']

company: New York State Technology Enterprise Corporation (NYSTEC)
job_text: ['', 'Education and Experience', "A minimum of a Bachelor's\xa0degree with at least 3 years of related experience is required. An equivalent combination of advanced education, training, and experience will be considered.", 'About the Role:', 'Proficiency with translating complex analytic ideas into actionable insights for varied levels of audience.', 'NYSTEC is a non-profit technology consulting company, advising agencies, organizations, institutions, and businesses since 1996. We’re independent and vendor-neutral – so we have our clients’ best interests at heart. At NYSTEC, we know that we succeed when individuals and teams flourish personally and professionally, so our benefits and perks support this mindset. Are you ready to contribute to our engaged workforce and deliver the NYSTEC Experience?', 'Serving as a Healthcare Provider\xa0Data Analyst, you will be supporting healthcare technology initiatives for our clients, partners and stakeholders by providing analytical expertise to evaluate provider data across New York State.\xa0', 'If you’re an effective communicator who enjoys working in complex and collaborative environments, utilizing your critical thinking and research skills to develop solutions for clients, providing support to customers, and have the required education, experience and skills, we want to hear from you.', 'Experience writing ad hoc queries in SQL', 'Preferred/Desired Qualifications', 'Experience using provider data and/or payer data to inform decision making', 'Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite, with strong skills in Excel', "It is NYSTEC's policy to provide equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all individuals, regardless of actual or perceived race, color, creed, religion, sex or gender (including pregnancy, childbirth and related medical conditions), gender identity or gender expression (including transgender status), age, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, protected medical condition as defined by applicable state or local law, genetic information, military service and veteran status, sexual orientation, marital status, , or any other characteristic protected by local, state, or federal law and ordinances. NYSTEC is strongly committed to this policy and believes in the concept and spirit of the law.", 'Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future.', 'As a Healthcare Provider Data Analyst in the Population Health - Information Exchange & Interoperability practice, you will collaborate with team members to conceptualize, deliver, and support our clients through today’s ever-changing healthcare landscape. NYSTEC is considered a trusted program advisor, providing subject matter expertise, and connecting the dots for our clients. Over the last five years, NYSTEC has consulted on some of the largest Medicaid initiatives and served in various roles across a multitude of New York State healthcare technology systems.', 'Required Qualifications', 'Strong critical thinking, problem solving, and analytical skills', 'About Us:', 'Experience with data quality analysis', 'Experience using SASExperience using provider data and/or payer data to inform decision makingExperience with data quality analysisMaster’s degree in health informatics, public health, statistics, computer science, or a related discipline', '\ufeff', 'Experience using SAS', 'Experience in health informatics', 'Ability to develop relationships with stakeholders and understand their needs through excellent listening and effective written and verbal communication.', '\xa0', 'About You:', 'Master’s degree in health informatics, public health, statistics, computer science, or a related discipline', 'Experience in health informaticsExperience writing ad hoc queries in SQLStrong critical thinking, problem solving, and analytical skillsProficiency with translating complex analytic ideas into actionable insights for varied levels of audience.Ability to develop relationships with stakeholders and understand their needs through excellent listening and effective written and verbal communication.Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite, with strong skills in Excel']

['', 'Your Tasks And Responsibilities', ' Lead statistical programming and validation activities for clinical study/integrated programming requests in close collaboration with statistical teams; ', ' Create or contribute to SAP, TLF and ADS specs, where applicable; ', ' Provide expertise on the evaluation of process and system requirements including recommendations for improvements; ', ' Excellent computer skills and data analysis knowledge; ', 'Location:', 'Who You Are', ' Possess ability to understand intricacies of various study designs and comprehend analysis plans which may describe methodology to be programmed; ', 'Reference Code:', ' Bachelor of Science in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Natural Sciences, Informatics or related field or equivalent (of theoretical/technical depth) with at least six years of experience in statistical programming or statistics in the pharmaceutical or biotechnology industry or Master of Science in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Natural Sciences, Informatics or related field or equivalent (of theoretical/technical depth) with at least four years of experience in statistical programming or statistics in the pharmaceutical or biotechnology industry; ', ' Fluent in written and spoken English. ['', 'Demonstrated ability to handle multiple high-profile projects simultaneously and ability to take ownership of assigned projects', 'Work Experiences in SQL and Alteryx preferred', "3+ years' experience in reporting functions, business operations, and/or analyst role.", 'Requirements: ', 'Strong ability to assess all assumptions and parameters related to an analysis, and provide an actionable intelligence recommendation to senior leadership.', 'About Kore1', 'Develop workflows to automate data extraction process, as well as creating tools to meet business needs', ' Work Experiences in SQL and Alteryx preferred ', " 3+ years' experience in reporting functions, business operations, and/or analyst role. 3+ years' experience in data analysis; implementing, administering, and customizing reporting/metrics Skill set in data management, analytics, problem solving and business operations knowledge Demonstrated ability to handle multiple high-profile projects simultaneously and ability to take ownership of assigned projects Proficiency with Microsoft Office in Excel and Tableau Bachelor's Degree in Business, Business Analytics, or Information System ", 'Key Responsibility', 'Skill set in data management, analytics, problem solving and business operations knowledge', 'Proficiency with Microsoft Office in Excel and Tableau', "Bachelor's Degree in Business, Business Analytics, or Information System", 'Ability to effectively gather and analyze data across various source systems, and provide ongoing and ad hoc reporting for various supply chain functions.', "Kore1 provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Kore1 complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training. Kore1 expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status.Improper interference with the ability of Kore1's employees to perform their job duties may result in discipline up to and including discharge.", 'Description', 'Job Description', 'Strong ability to receive a request and understand what data is needed to support the request made. Ask clarifying questions to gain an understanding of what the data will be used for and differentiate between what is being requested and what is needed.', "3+ years' experience in data analysis; implementing, administering, and customizing reporting/metrics", ' Perform analysis and provide recommendations to support supply chain improvements and decision making. Areas may include but are not limited to: distribution network optimization, inventory optimization, distribution efficiency, and annual budgeting process. Strong ability to assess all assumptions and parameters related to an analysis, and provide an actionable intelligence recommendation to senior leadership. Ability to effectively gather and analyze data across various source systems, and provide ongoing and ad hoc reporting for various supply chain functions. Strong ability to receive a request and understand what data is needed to support the request made. Ask clarifying questions to gain an understanding of what the data will be used for and differentiate between what is being requested and what is needed. Design and implement reports and dashboards for the Global Supply Chain. Oversee the BW reporting request and manage priority, analyze and validate data for accuracy before providing the reports the end users. Ability to identify a problem, and then independently find and implement a solution without a structured learning environment. Develop workflows to automate data extraction process, as well as creating tools to meet business needs ', 'Perform analysis and provide recommendations to support supply chain improvements and decision making. Areas may include but are not limited to: distribution network optimization, inventory optimization, distribution efficiency, and annual budgeting process.', 'Design and implement reports and dashboards for the Global Supply Chain. Oversee the BW reporting request and manage priority, analyze and validate data for accuracy before providing the reports the end users.', 'Skills/Qualifications', 'Ability to identify a problem, and then independently find and implement a solution without a structured learning environment.']

job_title: Senior Analyst, Finance Technology Solutions, NA
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'Knowledge and experience with customization and enhancements in SAP ECC system, and developing Functional design specifications etc. is required', 'Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills are required', 'Knowledge and experience working with SAP tables, sets, standard configuration, transactions, validation, and substitution rules, ALE & IDocs and interfaces with non-SAP systems is required', 'Experience with system enhancement process, project implementation, IT Service Management and testing protocols and tools such as HP ALM, Jira, Service Now etc. is preferred', 'Passion for data analytics, data modeling and custom data warehouse development, statistical analysis using cutting-edge financial tools and technologies is preferred', 'Must possess the ability to build strong relationships with business partners.', 'Minimum of 3 years of applicable work experience is required, including minimum of 3 years hands on experience in technical / finance roles in SAP ECC focusing on SAP FI/CO modules. (G/L, A/P, A/R, Fixed Assets).', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Working knowledge of reporting and planning tools and applications such as SAP BI/BW, HANA, TM1, Anaplan, Tableau, Blackline, and Alteryx is preferred', 'Must be able to work independently, handle multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively take on leadership roles.', 'Must be able to think creatively, maintain and improve sound business processes while working in a dynamic, team environment.', 'Knowledge and experience of other SAP systems/applications such as S/4 HANA, Central Finance and FSCM etc. is preferred', 'Must be highly motivated, committed, effective and supportive team member, able to work flexibly, quickly, and accurately under tight deadlines.', 'Minimum of a bachelor’s degree is required, preferably in Business, Computer Science, MIS, Finance or Accounting. ', 'Finance Technology Solutions (FTS) North America', 'Strong accounting/finance background and have a technical mindset, with experience in financial systems is required', 'Johnson & Johnson is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.', 'Must be very methodical and accurate, displaying a strong desire for high quality, with attention to detail.', ' Minimum of a bachelor’s degree is required, preferably in Business, Computer Science, MIS, Finance or Accounting.  Minimum of 3 years of applicable work experience is required, including minimum of 3 years hands on experience in technical / finance roles in SAP ECC focusing on SAP FI/CO modules. (G/L, A/P, A/R, Fixed Assets). Knowledge and experience working with SAP tables, sets, standard configuration, transactions, validation, and substitution rules, ALE & IDocs and interfaces with non-SAP systems is required Knowledge and experience with customization and enhancements in SAP ECC system, and developing Functional design specifications etc. is required Ability to drill down into SAP ECC to gain an understanding of the financial postings that are occurring, identify processes driving those postings as well as exceptions to standard configuration is required Strong accounting/finance background and have a technical mindset, with experience in financial systems is required Strong analytical, critical thinking, problem solving, and systems skills are required Prior experience in data analysis, complex data mapping, and data reconciliation is required Must be able to think creatively, maintain and improve sound business processes while working in a dynamic, team environment. Must be able to work independently, handle multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively take on leadership roles. Must possess the ability to organize workload, and the capacity to progress a range of tasks and projects simultaneously. Must possess the ability to build strong relationships with business partners. Must be highly motivated, committed, effective and supportive team member, able to work flexibly, quickly, and accurately under tight deadlines. Must be very methodical and accurate, displaying a strong desire for high quality, with attention to detail. Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills are required Knowledge and experience in SAP Cost accounting modules such as Internal Orders, Product Costing and Profitability Analysis is preferred Technical knowledge of integration of FI/CO with MM and SD modules is preferred Knowledge and experience of other SAP systems/applications such as S/4 HANA, Central Finance and FSCM etc. is preferred Passion for data analytics, data modeling and custom data warehouse development, statistical analysis using cutting-edge financial tools and technologies is preferred Working knowledge of reporting and planning tools and applications such as SAP BI/BW, HANA, TM1, Anaplan, Tableau, Blackline, and Alteryx is preferred Experience with system enhancement process, project implementation, IT Service Management and testing protocols and tools such as HP ALM, Jira, Service Now etc. is preferred This position may require up to 10% travel ', 'Strong analytical, critical thinking, problem solving, and systems skills are required', 'Job Description', 'Must possess the ability to organize workload, and the capacity to progress a range of tasks and projects simultaneously.', 'Knowledge and experience in SAP Cost accounting modules such as Internal Orders, Product Costing and Profitability Analysis is preferred', 'This position may require up to 10% travel', 'Prior experience in data analysis, complex data mapping, and data reconciliation is required', 'Technical knowledge of integration of FI/CO with MM and SD modules is preferred', 'Ability to drill down into SAP ECC to gain an understanding of the financial postings that are occurring, identify processes driving those postings as well as exceptions to standard configuration is required']

job_title: Senior Business Analyst, E&A - Business Growth
job_text: ['', 'Evaluates the potential of new business ventures or additions to current business lines by analyzing markets, costs, benefits, and growth potential. ', 'University Degree in Business Administration or a related fieldFive (5) years of professional level experience within the field of specialization', 'Grow & Achieve We learn, work and grow together with targeted development, reward and recognition programs as well as our very own UL University that offers extensive training programs for employees at all stages, including a technical training track for applicable roles. ', 'Grow & Achieve', 'People Ask any UL employee what they love most about working here, and you’ll almost always hear, “the people.” Going beyond what is possible is the standard at UL. We’re able to deliver the best because we employ the best. ', 'Prepares analyses of new business ventures and expansions of current lines of business, including analyses of markets, costs, benefits, and growth potential.', 'Mission For UL, corporate and social responsibility isn’t new. Making the world a safer, more secure and sustainable place has been our business model for the last 125 years and is deeply engrained in everything we do. People Ask any UL employee what they love most about working here, and you’ll almost always hear, “the people.” Going beyond what is possible is the standard at UL. We’re able to deliver the best because we employ the best. ', 'University Degree in Business Administration or a related field', 'Performs other duties as assigned.', 'Analyzes information regarding customers, products, markets, geographies, and competitors to assist in developing new and current business studies.', 'Interesting work Every day is different for us here as we eagerly anticipate the next innovation that our customers create. We’re inspired to take on the challenge that will transform how people live, work and play. And as a global company, in many roles, you will get international experience working with colleagues around the world. Grow & Achieve We learn, work and grow together with targeted development, reward and recognition programs as well as our very own UL University that offers extensive training programs for employees at all stages, including a technical training track for applicable roles. Total Rewards Total Rewards All employees at UL are eligible for bonus compensation. UL offers a generous 401k matching structure of up to 5% of eligible pay. Additionally, we invest an additional 4% into your retirement saving fund after your first year of continuous employment. We provide Healthcare Reimbursement Accounts and Health Savings Accounts that UL contributes to twice per year! Depending on your role, you can work with your manager on flexible working arrangements. We also provide employees with paid time off including vacation, holiday, sick and volunteer time off. ', 'Assists with communicating business and strategic plan objectives to regional and local management.', 'Five (5) years of professional level experience within the field of specialization', 'Interesting work ', 'Mission ', 'Interesting work Every day is different for us here as we eagerly anticipate the next innovation that our customers create. We’re inspired to take on the challenge that will transform how people live, work and play. And as a global company, in many roles, you will get international experience working with colleagues around the world. ', 'Total Rewards', 'Prepares studies on new and current business opportunities, including collecting and analyzing economic, technological, industry, customer, competitor, and other similar data. ', 'Total Rewards Total Rewards All employees at UL are eligible for bonus compensation. UL offers a generous 401k matching structure of up to 5% of eligible pay. Additionally, we invest an additional 4% into your retirement saving fund after your first year of continuous employment. We provide Healthcare Reimbursement Accounts and Health Savings Accounts that UL contributes to twice per year! Depending on your role, you can work with your manager on flexible working arrangements. We also provide employees with paid time off including vacation, holiday, sick and volunteer time off. ', 'Mission For UL, corporate and social responsibility isn’t new. Making the world a safer, more secure and sustainable place has been our business model for the last 125 years and is deeply engrained in everything we do. ', 'Prepares studies on new and current business opportunities, including collecting and analyzing economic, technological, industry, customer, competitor, and other similar data. Evaluates the potential of new business ventures or additions to current business lines by analyzing markets, costs, benefits, and growth potential. Prepares research analyses and reports regarding business retention and development.Analyzes information regarding customers, products, markets, geographies, and competitors to assist in developing new and current business studies.Interprets information to determine the costs and potential benefits of entering markets.Examines corporate strategies and goals to determine areas where business analysis should be focused.Prepares customer, competitor, and industry profiles, as well as business venture studies and research reports.Prepares analyses of new business ventures and expansions of current lines of business, including analyses of markets, costs, benefits, and growth potential.Assists with communicating business and strategic plan objectives to regional and local management.Performs other duties as assigned.', 'Prepares research analyses and reports regarding business retention and development.', 'Prepares customer, competitor, and industry profiles, as well as business venture studies and research reports.', 'People ', 'Examines corporate strategies and goals to determine areas where business analysis should be focused.', 'Interprets information to determine the costs and potential benefits of entering markets.']

job_title: Fraud Business Analyst II - Enterprise Fraud
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'Work directly with members, department managers, law enforcement officials, and the general public to identify and investigate unusual, suspicious, and potentially fraudulent activities, both external and internal to PenFed. Recommend the appropriate course of action based on the nature of the suspicious activity.', 'Develop data queries, statistical analysis, and reports to identify key data elements that can be used to monitor and identify fraud trends.', 'Clearly articulate findings and observations and make recommendations as appropriate', 'Ensure decision effectiveness through fraud strategy performance evaluation and detection metrics.', 'Ensure proper controls are in place for the detection and prevention of suspicious activity, including the use of systems, reports, and other tools. Develop recommendations for additional control requirements and process enhancements.', 'Work with other business teams to ensure consistent and accurate reporting while minimizing redundancy.', 'Minimum of two (2) years’ experience using in SAS, SQL, R Language, Visual Basic, Tableau, or other business intelligence tools and experience working with large datasets are required.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Economics, Finance, Statistics, Engineering or a related field is required. Master’s Degree in a quantitative or a related field is highly preferred.', 'Lead analysis of emerging fraud trends, fraud risk criteria, and high-risk population segments.Ensure decision effectiveness through fraud strategy performance evaluation and detection metrics.Develop and manage fraud prevention strategies through data analysis and business insight.Develop data queries, statistical analysis, and reports to identify key data elements that can be used to monitor and identify fraud trends.Use data queries, decision tree model, and other decision science tools to predict fraud risk, forecast fraud trends, and provide business insight.Develop, maintain and execute fraud detection processes on a daily/weekly/monthly basis.Work closely with management to share findings and assist in identifying current fraud trends & root causes, identify fraud risk gaps, and collaborate with senior analysts on recommendationsWork directly with members, department managers, law enforcement officials, and the general public to identify and investigate unusual, suspicious, and potentially fraudulent activities, both external and internal to PenFed. Recommend the appropriate course of action based on the nature of the suspicious activity.Gather evidence from multiple sources to include system data, transaction records, online sources, interviews, and various channels. Extract meaning from large quantities of complex data, make connections, and identify anomalies, trends and reoccurrences. Conduct thorough research through available means including systems, records, and archives, phone calls, internet searches, etc. as needed.Provide well-documented results of research and analysis to Fraud management; review circumstances and conclusions and support any ongoing activities. Ensure proper controls are in place for the detection and prevention of suspicious activity, including the use of systems, reports, and other tools. Develop recommendations for additional control requirements and process enhancements.Clearly articulate findings and observations and make recommendations as appropriateWork with other business teams to ensure consistent and accurate reporting while minimizing redundancy.', 'Provide well-documented results of research and analysis to Fraud management; review circumstances and conclusions and support any ongoing activities. ', 'Work Environment', 'Experience using Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, and Word) and other business-related systems is required.', 'Strong interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills with the ability to effectively interact and build trusted relationships across different departments and all levels of management.', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Economics, Finance, Statistics, Engineering or a related field is required. Master’s Degree in a quantitative or a related field is highly preferred.Minimum of three (3) years’ experience in data analytics.Minimum of two (2) years’ experience using in SAS, SQL, R Language, Visual Basic, Tableau, or other business intelligence tools and experience working with large datasets are required.Experience using Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, and Word) and other business-related systems is required.Experience working in a financial institution is strongly preferred.Strong interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills with the ability to effectively interact and build trusted relationships across different departments and all levels of management.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to effectively resolve complex situations and issues.Must be results oriented with the ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills with the ability to manage or lead multiple projects effectively.', 'Lead analysis of emerging fraud trends, fraud risk criteria, and high-risk population segments.', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to effectively resolve complex situations and issues.', 'Develop and manage fraud prevention strategies through data analysis and business insight.', 'Supervisory Responsibility', 'Travel', 'Overview', 'Extract meaning from large quantities of complex data, make connections, and identify anomalies, trends and reoccurrences. Conduct thorough research through available means including systems, records, and archives, phone calls, internet searches, etc. as needed.', 'Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills with the ability to manage or lead multiple projects effectively.', 'Work closely with management to share findings and assist in identifying current fraud trends & root causes, identify fraud risk gaps, and collaborate with senior analysts on recommendations', 'Gather evidence from multiple sources to include system data, transaction records, online sources, interviews, and various channels. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Special Message Regarding COVID 19', 'Experience working in a financial institution is strongly preferred.', 'Use data queries, decision tree model, and other decision science tools to predict fraud risk, forecast fraud trends, and provide business insight.', 'Minimum of three (3) years’ experience in data analytics.', 'Develop, maintain and execute fraud detection processes on a daily/weekly/monthly basis.', 'There Are No Additional Certifications Required.', 'Licenses and Certifications', 'Must be results oriented with the ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.']

job_title: Sr Data Analyst, Product Insights - HBO Max
job_text: ['', ' Detail oriented and cares about the quality of the input data as well as how the processed data is ultimately interpreted and used ', ' High tolerance for ambiguity and fast-changing environment ', 'Company Overview ', ' Establish a close working relationship with key product stakeholders to understand their needs, identify opportunities for leveraging data in their operational decision making, and define clear roadmaps for business intelligence and/or data visualization solutions. ', " Develop strong cross-functional partnerships across the company (Data Engineering, Data Technology, Product, Content, Operations) to drive our team's success ", ' Delivering business intelligence and data visualization dashboard solutions  Looker or Tableau data visualization design and development  Analyzing, compiling, cleansing, interpreting, joining and staging data ', ' Candidate should be a SQL expert; must be able to optimize queries and join datasets efficiently ', ' 5+ years of relevant experience: Delivering business intelligence and data visualization dashboard solutions  Looker or Tableau data visualization design and development  Analyzing, compiling, cleansing, interpreting, joining and staging data ', ' Develop and maintain beautifully designed dashboards consumed by the HBO Max Product Leadership team, and build interactive dashboards to best support self-service BI to users ', ' Work closely with the product insights team under the guidance of the Sr. Product Insights lead to deliver business requirements, interact with product stakeholders and developers based on reporting needs. ', " Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineer, Mathematics or similar required (masters degree is a plus) ", ' Proven track record of performing comprehensive analyses independently ', ' Synthesize large volumes of data and complex concepts into clear accessible learnings ', ' Job ', ' Excited to work in the entertainment industry and, in particular, at a premiere video streaming service ', ' The Daily ', ' Work closely with key product stakeholders to perform ad hoc analyses and also deliver key reporting & insights for the recurring monthly/quarterly business reviews ', ' Strong communicator, for both technical and non-technical audiences ', ' The ', ' The Essentials ', ' Assist in building compelling presentations that communicate clear actionable insights ', ' For Looker, must be able to configure the entire pipeline - create Views/Models/Explores ', " Work closely with the product insights team under the guidance of the Sr. Product Insights lead to deliver business requirements, interact with product stakeholders and developers based on reporting needs.  Establish a close working relationship with key product stakeholders to understand their needs, identify opportunities for leveraging data in their operational decision making, and define clear roadmaps for business intelligence and/or data visualization solutions.  Collaborate with engineering partners in creating technical requirements, database design, and reporting solutions.  Develop and maintain beautifully designed dashboards consumed by the HBO Max Product Leadership team, and build interactive dashboards to best support self-service BI to users  Work closely with key product stakeholders to perform ad hoc analyses and also deliver key reporting & insights for the recurring monthly/quarterly business reviews  Rapidly deliver on concepts through prototypes that can be presented for feedback  Synthesize large volumes of data and complex concepts into clear accessible learnings  Assist in building compelling presentations that communicate clear actionable insights  Act as a visualization subject matter expert providing support to team members  Develop strong cross-functional partnerships across the company (Data Engineering, Data Technology, Product, Content, Operations) to drive our team's success ", " Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineer, Mathematics or similar required (masters degree is a plus)  5+ years of relevant experience: Delivering business intelligence and data visualization dashboard solutions  Looker or Tableau data visualization design and development  Analyzing, compiling, cleansing, interpreting, joining and staging data  Candidate should be a SQL expert; must be able to optimize queries and join datasets efficiently  For Looker, must be able to configure the entire pipeline - create Views/Models/Explores  Proven track record of performing comprehensive analyses independently  Strong communicator, for both technical and non-technical audiences  Detail oriented and cares about the quality of the input data as well as how the processed data is ultimately interpreted and used  High tolerance for ambiguity and fast-changing environment  Excited to work in the entertainment industry and, in particular, at a premiere video streaming service ", ' Collaborate with engineering partners in creating technical requirements, database design, and reporting solutions. ', ' Analyzing, compiling, cleansing, interpreting, joining and staging data ', ' Act as a visualization subject matter expert providing support to team members ', ' Looker or Tableau data visualization design and development ', ' Delivering business intelligence and data visualization dashboard solutions ', ' Rapidly deliver on concepts through prototypes that can be presented for feedback ']

Commercialization drives new scope, scale, and complexity across the network, and requires manufacturing sites, global organizations, and IT systems to work together in new ways.', 'Planning, Procurement, Supply Chain, Master Data (GmP background and Business Process background)', 'Knowledge in operations of validated GmP/GxP systems', 'Understand the project management process and contribute to tracking of individual progress', 'Job responsibilities will include, but are not limited to, the following:', 'Lead PQ activities including but not limited to planning, execution, defect management, and daily reporting.', 'Liaise with IT Validation team and IT SMEs. Create supporting documentation and route for approvals.', 'Deliverables: Test configuration in Client-ALM, Security matrix, Traceability Matrix', 'The Client will be doing the following work:', '2 Client are needed to support an SAP ERP system implementation covering the following workstreams:', 'Collaborate with Business Delivery Team Leads and IT SMEs to build and analyze applicable use cases and user requirements to support daily operational business needs cross-functionally', 'Business Analyst, Business Process Delivery', 'Ability to work independently and cooperatively in a diverse group', 'The Business Analyst is a part of the Business Delivery Support Team engaging in the global CTDP IT systems including SAP, ERP, OBIEE, and SCOPE in support of CTDO late stage clinical and commercial operations. The Business Delivery Support team, reporting to the Business Delivery Support Manager, will work directly with UAT Testing Lead, Business Delivery Managers, IT SMEs, and other delivery resources to document business use cases, user requirements, test scripts, and traceability matrices to support scalable and compliant delivery of business capabilities within assigned systems.', 'Proven awareness of FDA governance concerning computer system validation, regulatory compliance, GMP', ' The Client will be doing the following work: Collaborate with Business Delivery Team Leads and IT SMEs to build and analyze applicable use cases and user requirements to support daily operational business needs cross-functionally Facilitate/ Host requirements gathering workshops Deliverable: Use Cases and User Requirements analysis User Requirement Document (URD) (BluePrint system export) Work with BDTL to sequence testing (string testing) and assist in identifying what data/ infrastructure is necessary to test. Lead PQ activities including but not limited to planning, execution, defect management, and daily reporting. Schedule and support large meetings, including facilitating, preparing agendas, and taking minutes Liaise with IT Validation team and IT SMEs. Create supporting documentation and route for approvals. Deliverables: Test configuration in Client-ALM, Security matrix, Traceability Matrix Provide administrative support in the assigned workstream(s) such as incorporating feedback into documents and routing documents through controlled documentation system(s). Understand the project management process and contribute to tracking of individual progress ', 'Provide administrative support in the assigned workstream(s) such as incorporating feedback into documents and routing documents through controlled documentation system(s).', 'Required Qualifications', 'Facilitate/ Host requirements gathering workshops', ' BluePrint, Client-ALM or electronic testing system experience Understanding of fundamentals of Systems Development Life Cycle and Waterfall/Agile methodologies. GaMP Proven awareness of FDA governance concerning computer system validation, regulatory compliance, GMP Experience in supporting major system implementations/ deployment ', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Manufacturing, Warehousing and Quality Management (GmP background)', ' 2 Client are needed to support an SAP ERP system implementation covering the following workstreams: Manufacturing, Warehousing and Quality Management (GmP background) Planning, Procurement, Supply Chain, Master Data (GmP background and Business Process background) Finance, Product Costing, Logistics, Order to Cash (in addition to a GmP background)', 'Schedule and support large meetings, including facilitating, preparing agendas, and taking minutes', 'Understanding of fundamentals of Systems Development Life Cycle and Waterfall/Agile methodologies.', 'This Business Analysis position focuses on testing end-to-end business processes of system solutions, upgrades, and enhancements, primarily SAP ERP, and will support data transactions with non-ERP systems as needed. The position will be remote and will coordinate work with West Coast and East Coast based Team Members', '3+ years of experience working in the technology/ healthcare/ or supply chain preferably as CSV specialist, technical writer, or business analyst', 'Finance, Product Costing, Logistics, Order to Cash (in addition to a GmP background)', 'Desire and ability to learn new software and applications quickly', 'Job Description', 'Work with BDTL to sequence testing (string testing) and assist in identifying what data/ infrastructure is necessary to test.', 'Notes', 'Demonstrate the ability to work in a high pace and frequently shifting environment', 'GaMP', 'BluePrint, Client-ALM or electronic testing system experience', 'Deliverable: Use Cases and User Requirements analysis User Requirement Document (URD) (BluePrint system export)', ' Organizations Cell Therapy business is entering an exciting new phase as it begins the commercialization of its first CAR T products. Commercialization drives new scope, scale, and complexity across the network, and requires manufacturing sites, global organizations, and IT systems to work together in new ways. The Business Analyst is a part of the Business Delivery Support Team engaging in the global CTDP IT systems including SAP, ERP, OBIEE, and SCOPE in support of CTDO late stage clinical and commercial operations. The Business Delivery Support team, reporting to the Business Delivery Support Manager, will work directly with UAT Testing Lead, Business Delivery Managers, IT SMEs, and other delivery resources to document business use cases, user requirements, test scripts, and traceability matrices to support scalable and compliant delivery of business capabilities within assigned systems. This Business Analysis position focuses on testing end-to-end business processes of system solutions, upgrades, and enhancements, primarily SAP ERP, and will support data transactions with non-ERP systems as needed. The position will be remote and will coordinate work with West Coast and East Coast based Team Members ', ' Knowledge in operations of validated GmP/GxP systems 3+ years of experience working in the technology/ healthcare/ or supply chain preferably as CSV specialist, technical writer, or business analyst Demonstrate excellent written and verbal communication Ability to work independently and cooperatively in a diverse group Attention to detail; strong communication skills, pro-active, good organization skills Experienced in business analysis processes including requirements gathering, requirements documentation, process flow charts, requirements traceability, PQ testing, etc. Strong working knowledge of MS Word, Excel (vlookup) or reporting, PowerPoint, Visio and Project Management tools Desire and ability to learn new software and applications quickly Demonstrate the ability to work in a high pace and frequently shifting environment ', 'Attention to detail; strong communication skills, pro-active, good organization skills', 'Experience in supporting major system implementations/ deployment', 'Strong working knowledge of MS Word, Excel (vlookup) or reporting, PowerPoint, Visio and Project Management tools', 'Demonstrate excellent written and verbal communication']

Manage third-party contractors and vendors engaged in operating and maintaining properties and equipment Comply with SOPs, maintaining standard work Lead and assist in site incident investigation, utilize structured problem solving to identify root cause of failures  Work with Senior Facilities leadership and Operations General Manager to provide the strategy, vision, and continuous improvement to drive the facility personnel to advance the quality of service Provide leadership, mentor and manage site-based Managers and Technicians. ['', 'Are capable communicators with the spoken and written word.', ' Problem Solving: Every day you work to solve complex problems. When you analyze a calculation, investigate the cause of a bug, or propose a new process you are venturing into unfamiliar territory to find a solution. Our clients and developers rely on your problem solving skills to ensure our software is built and supported effectively. Client Support: When a customer has a question, problem, or suggestion, they come to you! You are known as a subject matter expert and our clients rely on that expertise regularly. Whether the issue is major or minor, you know that Grant Street Group takes Software as a Service literally. Prioritization: Our software is ever-changing. With that comes the need to prioritize what, when, and how changes are made. Since you’re working with the software and our clients daily, who better to prioritize than you? Business analysts are constantly asking themselves: Does this feature need to be completed before a certain time? What is the impact of this bug? How can other clients benefit from this change? We use a ticketing system to track pieces of work such as functionality requests and bug fixes. We then prioritize them for developers to work on. Technical Specifications: It’s your job to convey to the developers what changes need to be made. What happens when you click this button? What does the page look like? How is this file transferred to an external system? In this way, you are directly affecting the product and our clients’ experience. Testing: When a developer completes a change, you get to test it out (in a beta environment) to ensure that it’s working correctly. Does the new behavior match the specification? Does everything else surrounding the change still work correctly? Implementations: We’re a growing company and adding new clients is an exciting part of that growth! Since you’re a subject matter expert, you coordinate with new clients to configure the software to best fit their needs. Think of yourself as a consultant. What business processes does the client need to accomplish? How can our software fit in with and help that process? Training: Helping clients learn about how our software works is also part of your role. Whether it’s a new client coming up to speed on how tasks are completed, or an existing client that is incorporating a new feature into their process, you’re a resource for providing the information and tools they need. job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'Knowledge and experience with customization and enhancements in SAP ECC system, and developing Functional design specifications etc. is required', 'Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills are required', 'Knowledge and experience working with SAP tables, sets, standard configuration, transactions, validation, and substitution rules, ALE & IDocs and interfaces with non-SAP systems is required', 'Experience with system enhancement process, project implementation, IT Service Management and testing protocols and tools such as HP ALM, Jira, Service Now etc. is preferred', 'Passion for data analytics, data modeling and custom data warehouse development, statistical analysis using cutting-edge financial tools and technologies is preferred', 'Must possess the ability to build strong relationships with business partners.', 'Minimum of 3 years of applicable work experience is required, including minimum of 3 years hands on experience in technical / finance roles in SAP ECC focusing on SAP FI/CO modules. ', 'Finance Technology Solutions (FTS) North America', 'Strong accounting/finance background and have a technical mindset, with experience in financial systems is required', 'Johnson & Johnson is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer. (G/L, A/P, A/R, Fixed Assets). Knowledge and experience working with SAP tables, sets, standard configuration, transactions, validation, and substitution rules, ALE & IDocs and interfaces with non-SAP systems is required Knowledge and experience with customization and enhancements in SAP ECC system, and developing Functional design specifications etc. is required Ability to drill down into SAP ECC to gain an understanding of the financial postings that are occurring, identify processes driving those postings as well as exceptions to standard configuration is required Strong accounting/finance background and have a technical mindset, with experience in financial systems is required Strong analytical, critical thinking, problem solving, and systems skills are required Prior experience in data analysis, complex data mapping, and data reconciliation is required Must be able to think creatively, maintain and improve sound business processes while working in a dynamic, team environment. Must possess the ability to build strong relationships with business partners. Must be very methodical and accurate, displaying a strong desire for high quality, with attention to detail. job_title: Senior Business Analyst – Clinical / Lab Systems
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', ' Serve as liaison between the Laboratory application users and IT project teams to facilitate efficient development and support; ', ' Bachelor’s degree in business administration, computer science, or information systems;  5+ years of experience in a Software Development environment;  Demonstrated ability to learn new technologies, systems and processes;  Demonstrated business acumen;  Excellent project management skills;  Strong understanding of application programming, database and system design; and  SQL experience preferred. ', ' Medpace ranks amongst top CROs for site ratings across all 10 important attributes including CRA training, preparation & organization, accessibility of staff, open communication, and ensuring timely drug availability ', ' May be responsible for other projects and responsibilities as assigned. ', ' Serve as Subject Matter Expert (SME) for applications that support the Laboratory functional area, as well as related processes; ', ' Bachelor’s degree in business administration, computer science, or information systems; ', ' Why Medpace? ', 'Awards', ' Design and plan the process for the development and implementation of system enhancements and/or the introduction of new systems/applications; ', ' Medpace historically named a Top Cincinnati Workplace by the Cincinnati Enquirer ', ' Continually recognized with CRO Leadership Awards from Life Science Leader magazine based on expertise, quality, capabilities, reliability, and compatibility ', ' SQL experience preferred. ', 'Overview', ' Serve as Subject Matter Expert (SME) for applications that support the Laboratory functional area, as well as related processes;  Serve as liaison between the Laboratory application users and IT project teams to facilitate efficient development and support;  Document, design and implement internal business system processes;  Design and plan the process for the development and implementation of system enhancements and/or the introduction of new systems/applications;  Identify and coordinate process owner reporting and data analytics needs;  Review current and proposed business systems for potential process development and re-engineering, with a goal of improving system effectiveness, efficiency and quality;  Participate in business strategy discussions and present pros and cons of new systems and/or major enhancements to senior management; and  May be responsible for other projects and responsibilities as assigned. ', ' 5+ years of experience in a Software Development environment; ', ' Document, design and implement internal business system processes; ', ' Medpace historically named a Top Cincinnati Workplace by the Cincinnati Enquirer  Medpace ranks amongst top CROs for site ratings across all 10 important attributes including CRA training, preparation & organization, accessibility of staff, open communication, and ensuring timely drug availability  Continually recognized with CRO Leadership Awards from Life Science Leader magazine based on expertise, quality, capabilities, reliability, and compatibility ', 'What To Expect Next', ' Identify and coordinate process owner reporting and data analytics needs; ', ' Review current and proposed business systems for potential process development and re-engineering, with a goal of improving system effectiveness, efficiency and quality; ', 'Job Summary', 'Responsibilities', ' Strong understanding of application programming, database and system design; and ', ' Demonstrated business acumen; ', ' Participate in business strategy discussions and present pros and cons of new systems and/or major enhancements to senior management; and ', ' Excellent project management skills; ', ' Demonstrated ability to learn new technologies, systems and processes; ', 'WARNING: Please beware of phishing scams that offer opportunities with Medpace in exchange for sending money. These scammers pose as legitimate employees from actual companies. Please be advised that a Medpace employee will never ask you for a credit card, send you a check, or ask you for any type of payment as part of consideration for a role with our company. All of our careers require that you first complete an online application and go through some sort of interview process.']

job_text: ['', 'Bachelor’s degree or more than 5 years of experience', 'This temporary role requires a passion for project management, and financial operations analysis to work on a project related to employee mobility and travel.The project will require documenting requirements into an RFP, working cross-functionally with teams to align on project requirements, working with sourcing and potential vendors through the RFP evaluation process, and working cross-functionally with teams to select the best vendor and tools to meet project requirements.', 'At least 5 years of experience in project management required, including with large scale, cross-functional, complex projects that include employee-facing technologyBachelor’s degree or more than 5 years of experiencePayroll, HR, or finance operations knowledge preferredPrior experience with RFP process and drafting business/project requirements preferredCommunication savvy and organizedExperience within finance ops or payroll ops', 'Payroll, HR, or finance operations knowledge preferred', '\xa0', 'Requirements:', 'Prior experience with RFP process and drafting business/project requirements preferred', 'Communication savvy and organized', 'Project Manager/Business Analyst', 'This temporary role requires a passion for project management, and financial operations analysis to work on a project related to employee mobility and travel.', 'The project will require documenting requirements into an RFP, working cross-functionally with teams to align on project requirements, working with sourcing and potential vendors through the RFP evaluation process, and working cross-functionally with teams to select the best vendor and tools to meet project requirements.', 'At least 5 years of experience in project management required, including with large scale, cross-functional, complex projects that include employee-facing technology', 'Experience within finance ops or payroll ops', 'Responsibilities:']

job_text: ['', 'Enhance our operational workflows via process improvements and identification of automation opportunities.', 'Relevant work experience in Internet-based risk, abuse, fraud, data protection or security.', 'Ability to effectively communicate and work cross-functionally.', 'About The Job', 'Collaborate with cross-functional groups such as Engineering, Sales, and Legal to update product policies. Provide a better digital experience for our users.', ' Experience in one of the following: C/C++, Python, Java, HTML, JavaScript, CSS or R, Stata, SPSS, SAS. Relevant work experience in Internet-based risk, abuse, fraud, data protection or security. Ability to effectively communicate and work cross-functionally. Demonstrated problem-solving, critical thinking, and analytical skills. ', 'Experience in one of the following: C/C++, Python, Java, HTML, JavaScript, CSS or R, Stata, SPSS, SAS.', 'Improve tools through data analysis, technical expertise, and presentations to key stakeholders.', 'Perform data analyses to derive insights that help to identify and fight abuse across our products.', 'Sunnyvale, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA; Washington, DC, USA', 'Demonstrated problem-solving, critical thinking, and analytical skills.', 'Conduct investigations, enforce our product policies, and identify product vulnerabilities (may occasionally be exposed to disturbing or offensive content during the process).', '1 year of experience in data analysis, working with databases, and querying (e.g., SQL, MySQL, MapReduce, Hadoop).', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience relaying communications between technical and non-technical teams.', " Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.  1 year of experience in data analysis, working with databases, and querying (e.g., SQL, MySQL, MapReduce, Hadoop). Collaborate with cross-functional groups such as Engineering, Sales, and Legal to update product policies. Provide a better digital experience for our users. Enhance our operational workflows via process improvements and identification of automation opportunities. Improve tools through data analysis, technical expertise, and presentations to key stakeholders. Conduct investigations, enforce our product policies, and identify product vulnerabilities (may occasionally be exposed to disturbing or offensive content during the process). ', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. "]

job_title: Senior Analyst, Finance Technology Solutions, NA
job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', 'Knowledge and experience with customization and enhancements in SAP ECC system, and developing Functional design specifications etc. is required', 'Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills are required', 'Knowledge and experience working with SAP tables, sets, standard configuration, transactions, validation, and substitution rules, ALE & IDocs and interfaces with non-SAP systems is required', 'Experience with system enhancement process, project implementation, IT Service Management and testing protocols and tools such as HP ALM, Jira, Service Now etc. is preferred', 'Passion for data analytics, data modeling and custom data warehouse development, statistical analysis using cutting-edge financial tools and technologies is preferred', 'Must possess the ability to build strong relationships with business partners.', 'Minimum of 3 years of applicable work experience is required, including minimum of 3 years hands on experience in technical / finance roles in SAP ECC focusing on SAP FI/CO modules. (G/L, A/P, A/R, Fixed Assets).', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Working knowledge of reporting and planning tools and applications such as SAP BI/BW, HANA, TM1, Anaplan, Tableau, Blackline, and Alteryx is preferred', 'Must be able to work independently, handle multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively take on leadership roles.', 'Must be able to think creatively, maintain and improve sound business processes while working in a dynamic, team environment.', 'Knowledge and experience of other SAP systems/applications such as S/4 HANA, Central Finance and FSCM etc. is preferred', 'Must be highly motivated, committed, effective and supportive team member, able to work flexibly, quickly, and accurately under tight deadlines.', 'Minimum of a bachelor’s degree is required, preferably in Business, Computer Science, MIS, Finance or Accounting. ', 'Finance Technology Solutions (FTS) North America', 'Strong accounting/finance background and have a technical mindset, with experience in financial systems is required', 'Johnson & Johnson is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.', 'Must be very methodical and accurate, displaying a strong desire for high quality, with attention to detail.', ' Minimum of a bachelor’s degree is required, preferably in Business, Computer Science, MIS, Finance or Accounting.  Minimum of 3 years of applicable work experience is required, including minimum of 3 years hands on experience in technical / finance roles in SAP ECC focusing on SAP FI/CO modules. (G/L, A/P, A/R, Fixed Assets). Knowledge and experience working with SAP tables, sets, standard configuration, transactions, validation, and substitution rules, ALE & IDocs and interfaces with non-SAP systems is required Knowledge and experience with customization and enhancements in SAP ECC system, and developing Functional design specifications etc. is required Ability to drill down into SAP ECC to gain an understanding of the financial postings that are occurring, identify processes driving those postings as well as exceptions to standard configuration is required Strong accounting/finance background and have a technical mindset, with experience in financial systems is required Strong analytical, critical thinking, problem solving, and systems skills are required Prior experience in data analysis, complex data mapping, and data reconciliation is required Must be able to think creatively, maintain and improve sound business processes while working in a dynamic, team environment. Must be able to work independently, handle multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively take on leadership roles. Must possess the ability to organize workload, and the capacity to progress a range of tasks and projects simultaneously. Must possess the ability to build strong relationships with business partners. Must be highly motivated, committed, effective and supportive team member, able to work flexibly, quickly, and accurately under tight deadlines. Must be very methodical and accurate, displaying a strong desire for high quality, with attention to detail. Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills are required Knowledge and experience in SAP Cost accounting modules such as Internal Orders, Product Costing and Profitability Analysis is preferred Technical knowledge of integration of FI/CO with MM and SD modules is preferred Knowledge and experience of other SAP systems/applications such as S/4 HANA, Central Finance and FSCM etc. is preferred Passion for data analytics, data modeling and custom data warehouse development, statistical analysis using cutting-edge financial tools and technologies is preferred Working knowledge of reporting and planning tools and applications such as SAP BI/BW, HANA, TM1, Anaplan, Tableau, Blackline, and Alteryx is preferred Experience with system enhancement process, project implementation, IT Service Management and testing protocols and tools such as HP ALM, Jira, Service Now etc. is preferred This position may require up to 10% travel ', 'Strong analytical, critical thinking, problem solving, and systems skills are required', 'Job Description', 'Must possess the ability to organize workload, and the capacity to progress a range of tasks and projects simultaneously.', 'Knowledge and experience in SAP Cost accounting modules such as Internal Orders, Product Costing and Profitability Analysis is preferred', 'This position may require up to 10% travel', 'Prior experience in data analysis, complex data mapping, and data reconciliation is required', 'Technical knowledge of integration of FI/CO with MM and SD modules is preferred', 'Ability to drill down into SAP ECC to gain an understanding of the financial postings that are occurring, identify processes driving those postings as well as exceptions to standard configuration is required']

job_title: Risk Data Analyst, Trust and Safety
job_text: ['', 'Enhance our operational workflows via process improvements and identification of automation opportunities.', 'Relevant work experience in Internet-based risk, abuse, fraud, data protection or security.', 'Ability to effectively communicate and work cross-functionally.', 'About The Job', 'Collaborate with cross-functional groups such as Engineering, Sales, and Legal to update product policies. Provide a better digital experience for our users.', ' Experience in one of the following: C/C++, Python, Java, HTML, JavaScript, CSS or R, Stata, SPSS, SAS. Relevant work experience in Internet-based risk, abuse, fraud, data protection or security. Ability to effectively communicate and work cross-functionally. Demonstrated problem-solving, critical thinking, and analytical skills. ', 'Experience in one of the following: C/C++, Python, Java, HTML, JavaScript, CSS or R, Stata, SPSS, SAS.', 'Improve tools through data analysis, technical expertise, and presentations to key stakeholders.', 'Perform data analyses to derive insights that help to identify and fight abuse across our products.', 'Sunnyvale, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA; Washington, DC, USA', 'Demonstrated problem-solving, critical thinking, and analytical skills.', 'Conduct investigations, enforce our product policies, and identify product vulnerabilities (may occasionally be exposed to disturbing or offensive content during the process).', '1 year of experience in data analysis, working with databases, and querying (e.g., SQL, MySQL, MapReduce, Hadoop).', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience relaying communications between technical and non-technical teams.', " Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.  1 year of experience in data analysis, working with databases, and querying (e.g., SQL, MySQL, MapReduce, Hadoop). Experience relaying communications between technical and non-technical teams. ", ' Perform data analyses to derive insights that help to identify and fight abuse across our products. Collaborate with cross-functional groups such as Engineering, Sales, and Legal to update product policies. Provide a better digital experience for our users. Enhance our operational workflows via process improvements and identification of automation opportunities. Improve tools through data analysis, technical expertise, and presentations to key stakeholders. Conduct investigations, enforce our product policies, and identify product vulnerabilities (may occasionally be exposed to disturbing or offensive content during the process). ', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. "]
